summary: Order food, get restaurant delivery, or pick up food from restaurants near you!
recentChanges: We've cooked up some improvements and successfully squished some little bugs we found. And as always, we encourage you to order something delicious.
comments: Be careful of the ads for restaurants that are not entirely relevant to your search screwing up your results. Other than this, the app works really well. I've been able to explore bunch of different places that I wouldn't have normally been able to go to. It has become something of a Friday night treat.

It was working very well for some time. However, for the last couple of weeks it keeps on freezing when I try to order. I usually can't even get my order out. It is this app specifically that is causing the issues. Another issue is that on multiple occasions the app tells me I have a coupon for a restaurant or free delivery, but then when I make my order it tells me the coupon doesn't work or is expired. Why advertise the coupon on the app to me if it is already expired? It makes no sense.

Several options don't match what the menus say. There are items that say they include a drink, but you have to choose a drink and be charged extra for it. Several options have only one selection that is required even if you would like to omit it. Someone should review menus thoroughly before releasing them. AI may be a good fit if you don't plan on paying anyone to do it.

The app is generally okay, but it's very buggy with the campus ordering option. There are times my order fails to go through entirely because the app throws an error saying that "this restaurant doesn't accept this payment method" even though it's the OneCard option for a campus dining hall. Moreover, nearly every time I place an order, there are issues with the order timing out on submission so I have to place the order again. For reference, I'm using the most current version of the app.

Good exceptional, it's good service but, can be a bit pricey after tip, service fee, taxes, etc. I'm a little lazy at times so paying the extra money is worth it. Over all, I like the experience, the app is very simple and easy to use, and I like simple. Grubhub is a great idea when you don't feel like going out and getting food at high quality places, just have someone else get it and deliver it for you. I like this app a lot.

title: goPuff: Food & Drink Delivery
description:
EVERYDAY NEEDS, DELIVERED FAST
goPuff delivers thousands of daily essentials in just minutes. Whether you‚Äôre craving late-night snacks or just ran out of laundry detergent, goPuff brings you what you need for a flat $1.95 delivery fee.

ORDER IN SECONDS, DELIVERED IN MINUTES
Download the goPuff app and enter your address. We deliver to 150+ markets and counting, including most major cities. And we‚Äôre quickly expanding!

Add your favorite items to your cart and continue to checkout. We pack your order in our local facility and deliver it straight to you. No middlemen means we‚Äôll get there fast!

THOUSANDS OF CONVENIENT ITEMS
We own and operate our facilities, which service 150+ delivery zones across the country, and stock them with thousands of items from your favorite brands. Order food delivery, from fresh essentials‚Äî eggs, milk, bread & cheeses‚Äîto favorite snacks, like chips, ice cream & candy. Looking for drink delivery? Order from our collection of flat and fancy water, energy drinks, juices, and beer, wine & spirits*. Need paper products delivered? Shop our paper towels, toilet paper & so much more.

DELIVERED 24/7 IN MOST MARKETS
goPuff delivers to 150+ areas, including more than 20 major cities and college campuses: Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Boston, Charlottesville, Chicago, Cincinnati, Cleveland, College Park, Dallas, Denver, Des Moines, Flagstaff, Houston, Indianapolis, Jacksonville, Louisville, Minneapolis, Newark, Oklahoma City, Orlando, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, Raleigh, Richmond, San Antonio, Seattle, State College/Penn State University, St. Louis, Syracuse, Tampa, Towson, Tuscson, Washington, D.C. and more.

Need something late? We deliver 24/7 in most markets, and until 4 a.m. in newly launched areas.

$1.95 FLAT DELIVERY
Some delivery services charge you more when they‚Äôre busy. Not goPuff. Our fast delivery is always just $1.95‚Äîall day, every day. We never surge or hike delivery.

Want free delivery? Join Fam, our membership program that offers free delivery on every order for a low monthly subscription.

GET DELIVERY OF YOUR FAVORITE PRODUCTS
Ben & Jerry‚Äôs, Coca-Cola, Gatorade, Flamin‚Äô Hot Cheetos, M&Ms, Reese‚Äôs, Gushers, Tide, DayQuil, Takis, Dove, Colgate toothpaste & much more. 

EARN POINTS TO REDEEM REWARDS
We love a good deal. Honestly, who doesn‚Äôt? That‚Äôs why we created Puff Points, a rewards program that gives discounts the more you order goPuff. Earn Points with every order & redeem them to unlock different rewards, like daily & weekly discounts. All new users earn 6,000 Puff Points with their first order!

AWESOME CUSTOMER SERVICE
Sometimes things go wrong. We‚Äôre only human. And so are the goPuff Customer Service representatives on the other line. We hope we got your order just right, but in case we didn‚Äôt, give the team a call. 

WAYS TO PAY
goPuff accepts credit cards (Visa, American Express, MasterCard and Discover) and debit cards.
 
*Beer delivery, wine delivery and liquor delivery is available only in select regions. ID verification required for alcohol delivery. Please drink responsibly. 

***goPuff is not available in all markets...yet. Want us where you are? Find us on social media @goPuff.

summary: Snacks, ice cream, beer and thousands of everyday items delivered in minutes!
recentChanges:
Did you know goPuff delivery is always just $1.95? That‚Äôs it. No hidden fees. No surging or price hikes. No nonsense. And we‚Äôre fast‚Äîlike, *really* fast. That means you get what you need, when you need it. For just $1.95. Pretty awesome, right? To keep things running awesome over here, we made some updates.
General performance enhancements and improvements.

Bug fix:
- fixed rare case when an app is stuck after background;
- fixed rare app crash on categories if an app was stopped.
comments: It is a great app, but there is one thing holding me away from it. I uninstalled it by accident, and because of that, I could not get back into the app because MY phone number is taken, i wish you had the ability to log into your pre-existing account. That flaw is why this is 2 stars, I would also not reccomend if your are on a budget (minimum amount to spend). I used it and it went well, but those two flaws are why I am not a big fan . way to lose something I kinda need in a day.

Maybe it's just me, but everything on this app seems extremely overpriced. I think the price kind of takes the convenience out of everything. I mean $6 for 12 slices of cheese is a little ridiculous. I would really only use this app if you are absolutely desperate, otherwise you should try finding a grocery store nearby.

Lots of options. When I'm feeling lazy and like making it a movie day/night...this is my go-to app for ALL of the snacks. For later night deliveries, they call your phone instead of knocking or ringing the doorbell (which I absolutely love as I'm not the only person living in the house). Friendly delivery drivers. I just wish I could see a map of where the delivery driver is located, but they do send a text as they are getting close.

It was amazing the FIRST time. The problem now is that it has a minimum purchase you need to reach or you can't order at all. I think this is the last time I will use GoPuff unless they fix this issue.

At first I downloaded this app and it was pretty cool! Was a bit disappointed with their ice cream selection, but whatever. Soon after installing, however, I updated. The app since then has not loaded, even with changing internet connection, more updates, attempting force stops, and unistalling/reinstalling. Hopefully this issue is fixed, because if it's happening to anyone else, that means there's a lot of people who can't even access the service.

title: delivery.com: Order Food, Alcohol & Laundry
description:
delivery.com is your one-stop shop for fast, local delivery and pickup of food, alcohol, laundry and groceries! Order from the best local stores in your neighborhood.

Search by cuisine (Chinese! Pizza!), dish (spicy tuna roll!), drink (anything from "white wine" or "whiskey" to hard-to-find craft beer)... or whatever you‚Äôre craving. Order from over 15,000 local merchants.

DELIVER TO ANYWHERE 
Order from your favorite restaurant or let us suggest popular places near you. We‚Äôll bring to your home, office, anywhere! 
 
DELIVERY POINTS
Earn Delivery Points with every order. Redeem for free food, donations to charitable organizations (and other great prizes).

PICKUP OR DELIVERY
Order for pickup and skip the line, or get delivery and have it brought to your door.

SCHEDULE & REORDER
Create scheduled orders for future meals, or use our reorder carousel to bring back trusty favorites.

GROUP ORDERING
Use our Group Ordering feature to order with friends, coworkers, neighbors and roommates.
 
OFFICE ORDERING
Ordering at the office has never been easier with Group Ordering, corporate discounts, catering, and paying with credits.

DEALS AND PROMOS
Check out our promo page for access to exclusive promos on your order.

CUSTOMER SERVICE
 Any questions? We‚Äôve got award-winning customer support via phone or live chat.

AVAILABLE NEAR YOU 
Order in NYC, Chicago, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Boston, Washington DC, Philadelphia, Burlington, Madison, Lansing, and hundreds more cities and towns across the US.


WAYS TO PAY
Pay with all major credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Visa Checkout, Masterpass, and PayPal. After your first order, cash payment is accepted. 

GET $10 OFF YOUR FIRST ORDER
Get $10 off your first order with a minimum subtotal of $15 (excluding tax, tip, delivery fee). Just use code APPETITE

You must be 21+ to order or consume alcohol. Please eat and drink responsibly.

recentChanges:
- Bug fixes and other performance enhancements
- Let us know what you think! Send questions and suggestions to feedback@delivery.com
comments: A direct improvement from before the rebranding. Restaurants and dishes are now searchable and the minimum cost has been lowered. Now it's everything I want I a delivery app
Quick and easy! Little to no fuss on ordering and payment.

The app keeps changing the tip amount between Bag and Checkout. EG: I put $7 and it lowers it to $2. Or it removes the tip altogether. Obviously can't place an order now. Reported this bug a half dozen times over the last year. It keeps coming back to screw over delivery people.
Fake restaurant ratings. Everything is 4 stars or better--obviously not real. App can be sluggish. Notification spam.
Tx2go serviced my address just fine. And now I've got to use this and it doesn't service my address. üôÑ

title: Postmates - Local Restaurant Delivery & Takeout
description:
Food delivery from your favorite restaurants, 24/7, 365 days a year. Postmates gets you what you want, when you want it. Just Postmate it.
 
Order burgers, sushi, pizza and more with Postmates:
 
‚Ä¢ 500,000+ local and national restaurants and retailers. 
‚Ä¢ 650,000+ Postmates on the ground, ready to bring you anything.
‚Ä¢ 4,200+ cities and counting in the U.S.
‚Ä¢ Real-time order tracking, keeping you updated on your delivery progress.
‚Ä¢ Free delivery on all orders over $12 with an Unlimited Membership.
‚Ä¢ Use Postmates Pickup for takeout orders, skip the line and the fees.
‚Ä¢ New! Postmates Party section where trending places around you are updated every 5 minutes and have no delivery fees!

GET ANYTHING DELIVERED
Postmates is the first app to deliver whatever you want when you want it. We deliver nearly anything from your favorite restaurant or retailer in minutes.

BRANDS YOU'LL ONLY FIND ON POSTMATES
Sugarfish, Sweetfin, Blaze Pizza, Salt & Straw, The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf, Bluestone Lane, KazuNori, HiHo Cheeseburger, Uovo, Alfred Coffee, Trejo's Tacos, Joan's on Third, Hot Wings Cafe, Backyard Bowls, Roscoe's House of Chicken and Waffles, Pink Dot, 800 Degrees Neapolitan Pizzeria, Moon Juice, and hundreds more.

NATIONAL PARTNERS
Chipotle, sweetgreen, Shake Shack, Subway, Tender Greens, Popeyes, Jack in the Box, By Chloe., Blaze Pizza, Denny‚Äôs, PF Changs, IHOP, Walgreens, The Halal Guys, Panera Bread, Jamba Juice and hundreds more.

ALSO GET DELIVERY FROM
McDonald's, Burger King, Taco Bell, Del Taco, Wendy‚Äôs, Chick-fil-A, Wingstop, The Cheesecake Factory, Starbucks and hundreds more.
 
DELIVERY ANYWHERE, ANYTIME
We‚Äôll deliver to your home, dorm, office, the park, or  your next dinner party‚Äîwherever you‚Äôre at, whenever you want it, just Postmate it.

FAST DELIVERY
Our delivery platform takes time and distance into account to ensure your order is assigned to the best possible Postmate, for the fastest possible delivery.

POSTMATES UNLIMITED
Join Unlimited for $9.99/month and you‚Äôll get free delivery on orders over $12. Love the offer? Save more than 15% when you sign up for an annual plan. 

CUSTOMER SERVICE
Need help? Our world-class customer service team is available 24/7. You can always reach us at: help.postmates.com

ACTIVE IN ALL MAJOR US CITIES
Albuquerque, Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Bellevue, Boston, Brooklyn, Charlotte, Chicago, Cincinnati, Columbus, Cleveland, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, East Bay, Evanston, Fort Lauderdale, Honolulu, Houston, Indianapolis, Jersey City, Kansas City, Las Vegas, Long Beach, Los Angeles, Louisville, Madison, Miami, Milwaukee, Minneapolis, Nashville, New Orleans, Newark, New York City, Oklahoma City, Omaha, Orange County, Orlando, Palm Springs, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, Queens, Raleigh, Sacramento, San Antonio, Santa Barbara, San Bernardino, San Diego, San Francisco, Salt Lake City, Seattle, SF Peninsula / Bay Area, St. Louis, Tampa, Tucson, Virginia Beach, Washington DC.

WAYS TO PAY
Google Pay, Credit Card, Debit Card. Major Credit Cards: Visa, American Express, MasterCard, Discover. All transactions are 100% digital, no need for cash.

PROMOTIONAL TERMS
$100 in delivery fees terms and conditions: Offer valid for first-time customers only. Service fees may vary and apply. Store and offer availability based on user location. Limit 1 use per customer. Offer is not sharable or transferable. Offer only valid for 14 days after redemption. Maximum offer value up to $100. Offer cannot be redeemed for cash or like exchanges. Postmates reserves the right to modify or terminate this offer at any time without notice.

‚Ä¢ Free delivery on all orders over $12 with an Unlimited Membership.
‚Ä¢ Use Postmates Pickup for takeout orders, skip the line and the fees.
‚Ä¢ New! Postmates Party section where trending places around you are updated every 5 minutes and have no delivery fees!

GET ANYTHING DELIVERED
Postmates is the first app to deliver whatever you want when you want it. We deliver nearly anything from your favorite restaurant or retailer in minutes.

BRANDS YOU'LL ONLY FIND ON POSTMATES
Sugarfish, Sweetfin, Blaze Pizza, Salt & Straw, The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf, Bluestone Lane, KazuNori, HiHo Cheeseburger, Uovo, Alfred Coffee, Trejo's Tacos, Joan's on Third, Hot Wings Cafe, Backyard Bowls, Roscoe's House of Chicken and Waffles, Pink Dot, 800 Degrees Neapolitan Pizzeria, Moon Juice, and hundreds more.

NATIONAL PARTNERS
Chipotle, sweetgreen, Shake Shack, Subway, Tender Greens, Popeyes, Jack in the Box, By Chloe., Blaze Pizza, Denny‚Äôs, PF Changs, IHOP, Walgreens, The Halal Guys, Panera Bread, Jamba Juice and hundreds more.

ALSO GET DELIVERY FROM
McDonald's, Burger King, Taco Bell, Del Taco, Wendy‚Äôs, Chick-fil-A, Wingstop, The Cheesecake Factory, Starbucks and hundreds more.

DELIVERY ANYWHERE, ANYTIME
We‚Äôll deliver to your home, dorm, office, the park, or your next dinner party‚Äîwherever you‚Äôre at, whenever you want it, just Postmate it.

FAST DELIVERY
Our delivery platform takes time and distance into account to ensure your order is assigned to the best possible Postmate, for the fastest possible delivery.

POSTMATES UNLIMITED
Join Unlimited for $9.99/month and you‚Äôll get free delivery on orders over $12. Love the offer? Save more than 15% when you sign up for an annual plan.

CUSTOMER SERVICE
Need help? Our world-class customer service team is available 24/7. You can always reach us at: help.postmates.com

ACTIVE IN ALL MAJOR US CITIES
Albuquerque, Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Bellevue, Boston, Brooklyn, Charlotte, Chicago, Cincinnati, Columbus, Cleveland, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, East Bay, Evanston, Fort Lauderdale, Honolulu, Houston, Indianapolis, Jersey City, Kansas City, Las Vegas, Long Beach, Los Angeles, Louisville, Madison, Miami, Milwaukee, Minneapolis, Nashville, New Orleans, Newark, New York City, Oklahoma City, Omaha, Orange County, Orlando, Palm Springs, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, Queens, Raleigh, Sacramento, San Antonio, Santa Barbara, San Bernardino, San Diego, San Francisco, Salt Lake City, Seattle, SF Peninsula / Bay Area, St. Louis, Tampa, Tucson, Virginia Beach, Washington DC.

WAYS TO PAY
Google Pay, Credit Card, Debit Card. Major Credit Cards: Visa, American Express, MasterCard, Discover. All transactions are 100% digital, no need for cash.

PROMOTIONAL TERMS
$100 in delivery fees terms and conditions: Offer valid for first-time customers only. Service fees may vary and apply. Store and offer availability based on user location. Limit 1 use per customer. Offer is not sharable or transferable. Offer only valid for 14 days after redemption. Maximum offer value up to $100. Offer cannot be redeemed for cash or like exchanges. Postmates reserves the right to modify or terminate this offer at any time without notice.
summary: Local Restaurant Delivery & Takeout. Order Food to Your Door! Pizza, Sushi, etc.
recentChanges:
Here‚Äôs what you'll find in our latest update:
‚Ä¢ Look for a new Combos section on our merchant catalog pages for easy, one tap ordering of popular items
comments: I love this service, but I find that there's an issue whenever I'm at a hotel and I try to add a new address. The Enter button on the keyboard works as a carriage return, and not as a submit. Therefore it's really hard to add a new address unless it happens to be the exact same as the My Location option.

The app is fine. The service is terrible. Don't use. If you have an issue you have to submit a help ticket and then if it isn't resolved to your satisfaction you can't contact them again. There is no call in number or anything. Postmates doesn't have a problem taking their customer's money and then not caring about rectifying issues with your order. Don't use them!

Working good until I've just seen a random charge. On top of taking forever to clear on your bank, it'll show up 3 days later on your acct. Ordered for 3 days ago ($22.92), just posted. But I'm looking at it and I see it's a whole other charge of almost $20. ($19.93 to be exact) That's weird because looking at all my orders, there's no such charge or fee! Cancelled being a customer. Refund me asap! Unprofessional!

As a side hustle, Postmates is great. The navigation needs work! It connects to your phone navigation app but only within a block of the delivery address. If you use Postmates' navigation, the arrow pointing your direction is inaccurate. It also, only works if you know the streets you are driving. I have been manually entering the delivery address into my navigation app, works better this way, unless it's an Apt complex, good luck finding the right building.

Useful for getting food delivered straight to your door, but the delivery time is often really long. I've also had multiple times where the food was luke warm and not too appetizing. I've reached out multiple times about updating the menus on the different restaurants because they're mostly out of date and still have items you can order that are no longer available and do not list new items. I'm hoping they will resolve these issues soon, it's a really convenient app!

title: DoorDash - Food Delivery
description:
Delivery anywhere you are. DoorDash offers the greatest selection of your favorite local and national restaurants -- more than 310,000 menus across 4,000+ cities in the U.S.,Canada and Australia. Spend more time doing the things you love -- we'll take care of the rest.

YOUR FAVORITE RESTAURANTS JUST A FEW TAPS AWAY
Choose from a huge variety of cuisines, from your local sushi spot to the comfort food you crave. Get your favorite meals faster with quick and easy ordering.

SUBSCRIBE TO DASHPASS
DashPass offers lower service fees and $0 delivery fees, with thousands of local restaurants recently added.

NO-CONTACT DELIVERY 
Deliveries are now left at your door by default and you have the choice to select ‚ÄúHand it to me‚Äù if you prefer. If a no-contact delivery is requested, the Dasher will know you want them to leave your food in a safe place and alert you when it‚Äôs ready for pickup. 

SCHEDULE DELIVERIES
Advance ordering allows you to get your food when it's most convenient for you.

REAL-TIME TRACKING
See when your order will arrive. From food quality to prep-times to traffic to weather, we've factored in all the elements that come between you and your food.

NO MINIMUMS
Order as little or as much as you want.

PAYMENT
Conveniently pay via Apple Pay or credit card.

ABOUT DOORDASH
DoorDash is a technology company that connects people with the best in their cities. We do this by empowering local businesses and in turn, generate new ways for people to earn, work and live. We started this by facilitating door-to-door delivery, but we see this as just the beginning of connecting people with possibility -- easy evenings, happier days, bigger savings accounts, wider nets and stronger communities.

Growing every day and currently serving over 4,000 cities across the United States, Puerto Rico, Canada, and Australia.

National partners include: Chick-fil-A, Burger King, Wendy‚Äôs, Chipotle, The Cheesecake Factory, Outback Steakhouse, Panera, Chili's, Subway, Dunkin‚Äô Donuts, Jamba Juice, Panda Express, Moe's Southwest Grill, P.F. Chang‚Äôs, Denny‚Äôs, Buffalo Wild Wings, Papa John's, California Pizza Kitchen, Papa Murphy‚Äôs, Jack in the Box, Five Guys, Boston Market, Red Robin, TGI Friday‚Äôs, Red Lobster, Qdoba Mexican Eats, El Pollo Loco, Noodles & Company, Buca di Beppo, White Castle, SmashBurger, Schlotzsky‚Äôs, and many more.

Visit doordash.com to learn more.

summary: Get your favorite restaurants delivered straight to your door.
recentChanges:
Our mission is to deliver good by connecting people and possibility. If we can play a small role in helping you spend more time with your friends and family or get ahead on your favorite projects, then we have delivered good.

We‚Äôre launching a new set of initiatives to deliver good within our communities, and you‚Äôll see a new visual identity that reflects our spirit. Thank you for making DoorDash a success ‚Äî we wouldn‚Äôt be here without you.

Upward and onward!
Tony Xu, CEO and Co-Founder
comments: Update. Nice job! You fixed your app. Works much better now. (Previous review) Fix your app! App works great until checkout. I click "place order" and receive an error message saying my card was declined. I called AMEX and they said my card is working fine. They never even saw a request for a charge come through. Something is wrong in your system. After many tries, sometime it works. Really not good.

App developer should be ashamed at how poorly the UI controls are placed. Buttons over text entry, buttons not visible when the keyboard is up. Choosing Pickup when you don't want to allow location access makes the app STUCK and you have to kill it and reopen it. Back button doesn't work. These bugs have been a problem for at least a year now.

For some reason, I had to retry my card over and over and over again, for it to not take it. I kept going back to see if I made any errors, and I did not. So I then attached my card to my Google pay and tried and tried. After consist trying and changing food decisions, I went back to my original food want, and tried again. Almost a hour passes and the card FINALLY goes through. But I already been waiting for about 15 minutes and I have no sign of a delivery driver. I hope I don't lose my money.

Multiple people in my household have used DoorDash and each person uses a different device. The app will keep saying it has timed out which results in the receipt having multiple copies of the same item. Then the same thing happens when someone tries to remove the duplicates. This causes the app to feel like it is more burdensome than rewarding when trying to quickly order food.

They need to fix the app. Every time I order it keeps loading & loading til it says error, try again. When it finally goes through it shows multiple orders that I never added to my cart. Even when I try to delete the extra orders, it tells me error, try again. Please fix the app. I'm rating it to a 3 for now. Til it's fix, then I'll rate it back to a 5 stars.

title: Uber Eats: Order Food Delivery
description:
Find Food Options For Your Budget. Order food using the Uber Eats app now.

Hungry? Order restaurant food easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your food order in real-time. Get your food delivered by delivery people using the Uber Eats app. 

FIND YOUR FAVORITE RESTAURANTS
Browse nearby restaurants and search for food by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, meal. Choose from a variety of food to order: Pizza. Burritos. Burgers. Sushi. Chinese food. Skip the line and reservations. Order food using the Uber Eats app now.

SIMPLE ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That‚Äôs it.
Order food to be delivered by delivery people as soon as possible
Or, schedule your food order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER AHEAD, PICKUP, OR DELIVERY
Now you can also order food for Pickup and Order Ahead instead of just Delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart and go to the restaurant to get your food. Ordering food for pickup is a convenient way the Uber Eats app adds choice to your life.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated delivery time to your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY
Join the thousands of others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order their favorites restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Abu Dhabi, Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Bogota, Brisbane, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Dubai, Hong Kong, Johannesburg, Glasgow, Liverpool, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Moscow, Mumbai, Nashville, New Delhi, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, Rio de Janeiro, San Diego, San Francisco, Sao Paulo, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Vienna, Warsaw, and Washington DC.  Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, Colombia, France, Japan, India, Mexico, New Zealand, Poland, Russia, South Africa, Spain, Taiwan, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States, and more.

THE APP CHOICE OF MILLIONS

Over 1 billion orders have been delivered by delivery people using the Uber Eats app. Join the millions who choose to order food using the Uber Eats app to get their favorite food today.
The Uber Eats app was selected as a Google Play "Editor's Choice" and was part of the "Best of 2018 Awards" for User‚Äôs Choice.

Visit ubereats.com for more details!

summary: Delicious. Convenient.
comments: I've used this app for a long time and I enjoy the convenience. One complaint is that for many restaurants, a lot of their menu/ordering options are missing from the app. I'm not talking about dessert items, just regular food options, so sometimes I use other delivery methods. Another complaint is all the fees; I don't agree with a "small order" fee when I still have to pay a full delivery fee on that order. So that turns me off from ordering sometimes.

Doesn't deliver in Torres Vedras, Portugal. Requires account creation, phone number, e-mail address, first name, last name, credit card number, and full address before telling you so. Spams you with unsolicited e-mails. No contact form. No website support. No email support. No app support. Uninstalled. Edit (18/03/2020): Now allegedly delivers in Torres Vedras. Reinstalled, logged in, entered my address in Torres Vedras, they still refuse to deliver. Re-uninstalled.

The tracking feature is laggy and not accurate. When looking to seeing where my driver is it, it will show them in one location and freeze them there till I have to close the app and re-open it. My last order placed I ended up having to wait almost 2 hours to recieve my food (which was an item and a half), by then it was cold, soggy and thrown all over the place inside the container. Sent in a help ticket and got a poorly excused "sorry" for a response with a measly $5 credit on the app.

Unable to control payment methods in options due to poor app interface. Edit:I am on a galaxy s10+ and the camera/notification bar blocks the 3 dot setting button for the payment option. I need to delete it because it conflicts with my new payment option and I cant add the new one. The second part makes sense but I dont remember seeing that info. It would be nice to know that then. It would also be helpful to exclude it from the list as I thought it was a bug so I tried again. Thank you.

My experience on this app has been in more cases beenn pleasant rather than an issue. The app is always a 10/10 with how they treat customers. My problem with the app is with the food and the handling of it at times; which I'd rate a 7/10. All in all it's a good app that everyone should in their back.

title: Instacart: Same-day grocery delivery
description:
Tap a button, get your groceries. 
 
With Instacart, you can shop online and get groceries delivered from stores in your neighborhood in as fast as 1 hour. Or you can choose to pick up your order at the store, where it‚Äôll be waiting for you. 
 
Just enter your zip code, choose a store, and add items to your cart‚Äîthen relax as someone handpicks your groceries and household items with care.  
 
And you have complete control with Instacart. If something‚Äôs out of stock, or you need to make an update, you can chat with your Shopper right in the app.
 
Instacart delivers in cities like San Francisco, Los Angeles, Miami, New York City, Chicago, Austin, Washington D.C, Houston, Atlanta, and many more throughout the U.S.
 
Instacart offers the groceries, produce, beer, wine, spirits, and other household items you want from more than 20,000 retailers in North America, including Aldi, Publix, Costco, H-E-B, Wegmans, Lucky, Smart & Final, Safeway, Stater Bros, Petco, CVS‚Äîand we‚Äôre always adding more.
 
 
With Instacart, you can also: 
‚Ä¢ Enjoy exclusive coupons and deals on the products you love
‚Ä¢ Create shopping lists and reorder items from previous purchases
‚Ä¢ View nutrition info and filter by gluten-free, organic or vegan diets
‚Ä¢ Tag favorite items for easier shopping
‚Ä¢ Use Group Carts to easily shop together with friends, family & co-workers

summary: Grocery delivery and pickup in as fast as 1 hour
recentChanges: Delivering fresh groceries on your schedule means our app is always evolving. With this update, we've fixed a few underlying issues to give you the most seamless experience possible. Happy shopping!
comments: Almost perfect. The only issue I encountered was with changing my name. The problem was that whenever I tried to change my name I would save and everything seemed to work, but when I backed out to the dashboard and went to check my name, it didn't change anything. My phone runs off of Andriod Pie (9) Hope this is fixed soon. Otherwise, the app is a great way to shop for groceries and potentially make money.

No doubt this app is conceptually wonderful, but definitely has some hiccups. For one, it's great when it works at all. Sometimes I'm greeted with just a blank page that never resolves despite closing the app/waiting forever/etc. Also, the search algorithm is sometimes very wonky. At least a few times per shop, I can't find by searching what I want, but am offered it as a replacement item when it is running low!

The app certainly works, and I love this service!! There are some quirks that could be improved IMHO. 1. Rating your shoppers on orders from multiple stores is confusing. I could only rate one shopper, and I don't know if it only applied to them or the others as well. 2. Search is usually fine, but can be hit or miss.

Because it adds things to your cart. Have to be very careful. I've been on hold to instacart for 1.5 hours and still holding. Not impressed with the search function while searching for items. Seems it doesn't lists all the items that the store has for example I know that Costco carried frozen french fries but you can't find it using this app. Very disappointed

Easy to use! Very convenient:) Since my last review I have had a couple of issues. Items delivered that rotten or items not purchased. The Customer Support has been quick and they refunded me. Just annoying that I had to go to the store the same day to get the missing and rotten items. Kind of defeats the purpose of this service.

title: 7NOW: Food & Alcohol Delivery
description:
Get alcohol, food, candy, snacks, drinks, ice cream, grocery, health needs and more delivered anywhere you are in about 30 minutes. 7NOW delivers over 3000+ items including Slurpee¬Æ and Big Gulp¬Æ, pizza and sandwiches, and even beer, wine, and liquor (where available, 21 years or older of course) across 43 major metro areas.

$7 OFF YOUR FIRST ORDER + FREE DELIVERY
Offer valid through 12/31/20. Get a $7 off promo code on your first delivery purchase made through the 7NOW App with minimum purchase of $7. Consumer pays all applicable sales taxes and fees.$1.99 small basket fee may apply if $15 minimum purchase requirement is not met.Cannot be combined with any other offer or discount. No cash value. Non-transferable. Limited delivery area. Void where prohibited. 7-Eleven, Inc. reserves the right to modify, change or cancel this offer at any time.

GET WHAT YOU WANT DELIVERED
Choose from a selection of over 3000+ items and counting. We have Beer, Wine, Liquor, Snacks, Food, Candy, Ice Cream, Baked Goods, Frozen Foods, Grocery, Household, Health, Personal Care, Mobile Gadgets and School & Office Supplies.

DELIVERY ANYTIME.
Don‚Äôt want to leave your home or office? Having a party, or friends are over, and need some last minute items? Have a late night craving? No worries! Get your order delivered to your door 24/7.

SUPER FAST DELIVERY
Stay in the moment and don‚Äôt worry, we got your back and will deliver your food, drinks, and more in about 30 minutes. Now that‚Äôs super fast!

ACTIVE IN MOST MAJOR US CITIES
7NOW is currently available in over 200 cities across 43 metro areas including Austin, Baltimore, Boston, Charlotte, Charlottesville Chicago, Colorado Springs, Dallas, Daytona, Denver, Detroit, Elkhart, Fort Collins, Fort Lauderdale, Fort Worth, Fresno, Hartford, Jacksonville, Kansas City, Lansing, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, Milwaukee, New Haven, New York, Norfolk, Orlando ,Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, Portsmouth, Providence, Sacramento, Salt Lake City, San Antonio, San Diego, San Francisco, Santa Barbara, Seattle, South Bend, St. Louis, Tacoma, Tampa, Tucson, Virginia Beach, Visalia and Washington DC. 7NOW PINS
Beach day cravings on the sand‚Äîyou got it. Last minute tailgating supplies at the stadium‚Äîdone. For moments that deserve delivery, we‚Äôll bring your items wherever you need them. Introducing 1000s of 7NOW Pins where we can deliver right to you, including parks, beaches, venues and more.

FLAT DELIVERY FEE
We charge a flat, low delivery fee to make things easy and simple for you. We also have no additional hidden fees or service charges.

NO MINIMUMS

PAYMENTS MADE EASY
Apple Pay, Credit Card, Debit Card. Major Credit Cards: Visa, American Express, MasterCard, Discover. All transactions are 100% digital, no need for cash.

REAL TIME ORDER TRACKING
Want to know where your order is? Track your order and receive notifications.

PROVIDE FEEDBACK
Have a favorite 7-Eleven item that you can‚Äôt live without? Located in a city that we haven‚Äôt expanded to yet? Let us know! We are listening and want to give you everything your heart and stomach desire. You are our number one priority! Yes, you there.

Beach day cravings on the sand‚Äîyou got it. Last minute tailgating supplies at the stadium‚Äîdone. For moments that deserve delivery, we‚Äôll bring your items wherever you need them. Introducing 1000s of 7NOW Pins where we can deliver right to you, including parks, beaches, venues and more.

FLAT DELIVERY FEE
We charge a flat, low delivery fee to make things easy and simple for you. We also have no additional hidden fees or service charges.

NO MINIMUMS
Order as little or as much as you want. A nominal small basket fee may apply on your order.

PAYMENTS MADE EASY
Apple Pay, Credit Card, Debit Card. Major Credit Cards: Visa, American Express, MasterCard, Discover. All transactions are 100% digital, no need for cash.

REAL TIME ORDER TRACKING
Want to know where your order is? Track your order and receive notifications.

PROVIDE FEEDBACK
Have a favorite 7-Eleven item that you can‚Äôt live without? Located in a city that we haven‚Äôt expanded to yet? Let us know! We are listening and want to give you everything your heart and stomach desire. You are our number one priority! Yes, you there.
summary: Order Food, Beer and Snacks
recentChanges:
We have a BRAND NEW shopping experience to get the products you crave to your door faster.
Contact-less Delivery available for most products.
7NOW Delivery's Home and Shop pages allow you to quickly and easily browse more products with larger images and clearer descriptions! Don't forget to try the all new filters experience.
comments: I loved this appt, used it frequently. Always got my rewards and my order correct. Unfortunately, I have not been able to open the appt without it freezing upon opening. I had to uninstall the app and reinstall... reason I have changed my review from 5 stars to a 1 star is due to my acct being deleted + needing to register again and starting over with rewards.

App completely freezes up every time I open it, I have uninstalled and installed app more than anyone should ever have to do with a malfunctioning app. Also, updated each and every time a new update was released. It's pretty freakin sad on their part, as I was using the app a couple times a week because I'm disabled and can't just go to the store whenever I'd like

As a first time user it was pretty convenient. I only got myself a pack a smokes but who hasnt been in a situation where they needed something of the such and wasnt able to leave for A-Z many reasons... Really came in for the rescue! The driver Kirk R. was really curtious as well. Will be ordering again...
It's a convenient app to be sure but it lags a lot and sometimes exits out erasing your cart. Tracking system could be a bit more precise as well. But it is organized and when it works it works well.

I use to really enjoy the app but the options aren't updated so that the options they actually have available in store are available in the app as well and over time there's just less and less items available

title: Favor - Anything Delivered! Food, Beer, and Wine
description:
Favor is the easiest way to get anything you want in your city delivered to your door in under an hour. 

Favor delivers what you want, when you want it. Want to order Chinese food or a quick pizza delivery? Need to order beer or wine? We‚Äôre ready to help with quick delivery from any of your favorite stores.

Whether it‚Äôs lunch at the office, dinner at home, or those quick trips you just don‚Äôt have time for ‚Äî your personal assistant (we call them Runners) can deliver it in just a couple taps.

See why Favor is Texas‚Äô favorite delivery app for local flavor. Download it today!

FAVOR FEATURES: 

ANYTHING DELIVERED
- Shop for anything from bales of hay (true to our Texas roots) and phone chargers to tacos and coffee
- Browse menus from thousands of local restaurants and stores near you
- Don‚Äôt see the store you want? Create a custom Favor in a few taps‚Äîjust let your Runner know where to go and what to get

TEXAS‚Äô BEST DELIVERY SERVICE
- Part of the H-E-B family and available exclusively in Texas
- Favor delivers from the best local restaurants and stores in over 150 cities across the Lone Star State

DELIVERY FROM YOUR FAVORITE STORES & RESTAURANTS
- Order anything and have it delivered right to you in under an hour
- All your favorite local stores and restaurants are just a tap away
- Order vegan food, Mexican food, Chinese food, Korean food or whatever you‚Äôre in the mood for
- Get delivery from anywhere‚ÄîCircle K, H-E-B, Target, or your favorite restaurant

FREE BEER & WINE DELIVERY
- Get Texas‚Äô best selection of beer & wine from H-E-B
- Beer and wine delivered in under an hour with no delivery fee

TRULY PERSONAL SERVICE
- Our Runners are more than delivery drivers‚Äîthey are personal assistants dedicated to saving you time
- Forgot to ask for ketchup or need a roll of paper towels? Just text your Runner, they‚Äôve got you covered

5-STAR SUPPORT
- Need help? Our Favor Care team is available to assist you throughout your ordering experience

ONLY IN TEXAS
- Favor is available in cities across Texas, including Abilene, Amarillo, Arlington, Austin, Baytown, Beaumont, Buda, Brownsville, College Station, Corpus Christi, Dallas, Denton, El Paso, Fort Worth, Georgetown, Houston, Killeen, Kyle, Laredo, Longview, Lubbock, Midland, New Braunfels, Odessa, Port Arthur, San Angelo, the Rio Grande Valley, San Antonio, San Marcos, Temple, Tyler, and Waco

DELIVERING FROM POPULAR RESTAURANTS
- Order from your favorite restaurants and fast food chains, including Fuddruckers, Burger King, Panda Express, Church‚Äôs Chicken, Five Guys, Taco Bell, Dairy Queen, California Pizza Kitchen, Chicken Express, Firehouse Subs, Hooters, Hopdoddy, Jersey Mike‚Äôs Subs, Mama Fu‚Äôs Asian House, P. Terry‚Äôs, Pei Wei, Romano‚Äôs Macaroni Grill, Urban Bricks Pizza, Velvet Taco, Zoe‚Äôs Kitchen and more!

Want to know more? Head over to http://www.favordelivery.com.

Want Doorstep Deliveries?
- Simply tap ‚ÄúLeave items at my door.‚Äò‚Äô in the ‚ÄòDelivery Address Notes‚Äô section at checkout. You will receive a notification when your Favor has arrived.
comments: In this day and age, with technology so advanced, card processing errors are understandable. Glitches happen, but not explaining what the error was is ridiculous. Not only that, but its stinking ridiculous that you dont allow payment methods other than credits, or credit/debit cards. Not only am I uninstalling, but I realized you are part of HEB delivery. I will be ending my relationship with HEB delivery as well. I refuse to do business with a company that makes paying difficult.

It really upsets me that I can't use the app. For whatever reason I cannot reset my password. I've tried over and over but never get the email for a reset. And what's more activating is I know I'm using the right email because I'm getting them Favor, just never the one I need for my password.

This app is horrible. The first time I used it, my food arrived cold and melted. The second time my food never even arrived. The app said it was here. Even the runner text me and told me my order was here. But when I looked outside, nothing was there. Then I put in a report and they tell me that they will contact me between 2-4 business days. I do not recommend this app for anybody.

Love it. They put accurate descriptions on 99% of things. I also love the write in an item option, as well as the drivers communicate with me! My favorite over DoorDash and Uber eats and others by far!!

Great! Only wish the hours were longer, that's the only reason it gets -1 star. Since im a bar tender i get out super late and dont have the energy to cook or go grab food so having extended hours would really make it for me! But overall super user friendly and easy to operate!

title: Bite Squad - Restaurant Food Delivery
description:
Get restaurant food delivered to your door in minutes with the Bite Squad app.


KEY FEATURES

Bite Squad provides a wide range of restaurants to choose from, along with handy filtering tools and a search bar to help you efficiently find the dishes you‚Äôre craving. We also offer low booking fees, speedy delivery and accurate orders.


HOW TO ORDER

Ordering restaurant delivery with the Bite Squad app couldn‚Äôt be easier. Simply download the app, type in your address, choose your favorite restaurant dishes and quickly check out with your credit card.


And if you create an account, we‚Äôll securely save your address, order preferences and payment information for a speedier checkout the next time you order.


THE BITE SQUAD DIFFERENCE

After you‚Äôve placed your order, you can watch its progress on our live tracking system so you know exactly when your food will arrive. If you have any order changes or questions, our Live Chat customer support team will be able to help you in real-time.


Whether you need your food on-demand or would like to schedule an order in advance, the Bite Squad app will get restaurant food to you when you want it.


ABOUT BITE SQUAD

Bite Squad restaurant delivery service is consistently rated best in the category by our customers. Our dedicated delivery squad works hard to bring more choices to our customers who want a great meal from their favorite restaurant delivered to their home or office.


Bite Squad was founded in 2012 in Minneapolis, Minnesota, and today, operates in more than 100 cities and delivers from more than 10,000 restaurants nationwide.

summary: Food for your mood - Delivered from your favorite local restaurants.‚Ä¨
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Always a great experience! Both drivers I have had, professional, kind and quick. My last driver, W-tabius, was awesome! He had no issue getting in the gate and was in a timely manner.
It was working fine earlier but the app is not letting me search restaurants or view profile it just gives me a blank white screen! Please fix

Of all delivery apps I've used, bitesquad is the best. It's perfectly streamlined and the menus most closely resemble the actual restaurant. Other apps include a lot of jumbled unorganized riff Raff that doesn't match the actual menu. Fees easy to understand. Premium service is simple free delivery across the board. The only negative I would say is "biteclub". It gives discount codes for ordering a lot. It's hard to find and not included in the app. Instead, its a sporadic email chain?weird.

Bite squad is so convenient when you don't want to cook, but want a healthier option delivered. It has also saved me on days i have migraines and can't get up to make coffee. The taxes and fees do add up, but all in all it has been extremely worth having the membership. It also is really nice to just have the food handed to youand you don't have to mess around with signing receipts. Also, the drivers are always so nice! Order an hour ahead and you will never be disappointed.

For the most part this app is awesome! But occasionally I'll get a certain estimated time and my food will arrive 20-30 min late which sometimes makes me late to my plans. Other than that, I'm so thankful for this app!. . . Ok, I'm gunna take away a star everytime this app asks me rate them. I rated this app already. Stop asking lol.

title: Waitr‚ÄîFood Delivery & Carryout
description:
Waitr
Food Delivery & Carryout

Welcome to the Wonderful World of Waitr ‚Äî where great local food meets convenience!

Breakfast, brunch, lunch or dinner; have your favorites delivered.
Whether it‚Äôs a small coffee or a four-course meal, you can have it delivered for a flat fee, or order Carryout and pick it up for free. Browse restaurants in your area to find new favorites or order from the ones you already know and love. See your food like never before with our professionally photographed menus. Order the way you like with our customizable menu items and special requests feature. Start a Group Order to eat more conveniently with family, friends, and coworkers. recentChanges:
Nothing quite like that new car smell ‚Äì except the completely redesigned Waitr app!

You won‚Äôt even want a car after you see this update! We put your favorites and recent orders right on the launch screen, added a bottom menu navigation bar, improved Group Ordering, and more!

comments: Good local options available but app interface is not as intuitive as it needs to be. App should default to current location but I have had food delivered to past addresses. Customers - be careful and cognizant to check and verify before finalizing orders. I learned the hard way. Waitr customer service was good about correcting the situation but it seems as this is something that should be addressed with the interface.
Awesome , great way of getting what you need if you're limited on going places or just being lazy at home . Very impressed with the timely service and response to staying in touch .

So, this app does get the job done however this app is missing so many features and it little frustating. This app is not transparent enough. Example, I supposedly received a refund and I have no idea if that is true or not because no where does it tell me that a refund was issued. They sent me a notification, but as soon as I clicked it, it disappeared. When the food is supposedly on the way, and I click on the notification it just disappears. I can't even contact the driver myself.

The app is simple when it comes to delivery apps. There's no information on where the driver is GPS wise or a number to contact. I've also had people who sat in their car on their phone for a long time while I was waiting for my food. Without a GPS function, the drivers can take as long as they want. The support function makes it a hassle because that takes time to input information and finally get answers about something I could have called the driver for. Needs to be customer friendly.
Latest app version is less intuitive than previous incarnation, but still usable.

title: Shipt: Same Day Delivery
description:
Shipt brings the store to your door with same-day delivery on grocery products, household essentials, beauty supplies, and more.

Shop from neighborhood retailers and a professional shopper will handpick and deliver your order, exactly how you want it. And with delivery in as soon as an hour, Shipt saves you time ‚Äì whether you‚Äôre planning a special lunch or dinner, or just need a fresh snack.

Browse millions of fresh grocery products, household essentials, alcohol items like beer, wine, and spirits,* and more from stores you trust like CVS, Harris Teeter, H-E-B, Meijer, Petco, Target, and more.

Schedule same-day delivery, pay, and tip ‚Äì all in the app.

Leave special grocery instructions so your shopper gets exactly what you need, like a perfectly ripe avocados and other produce favorites.

Get access to member-exclusive savings and shop with rewards programs, including mPerks and Costco memberships to save even more.

Save time and place orders easily with go-to grocery lists and favorite items, from breakfast to dessert ‚Äì members save an average of 8 hours a month using Shipt.

Enjoy free same-day delivery on orders over $35.

Have a question? Our 24/7 hour support team is ready to help.

See how easy it is to shop online and get same-day delivery on grocery items and more ‚Äì download the app to try today!

*Alcohol availability varies by location. You must be 21+ with a valid ID to order or receive alcohol. Shipt credits do not count toward alcohol purchases.

summary: Order Grocery & More Online
recentChanges:
This update includes experience enhancements and minor bug fixes based on your feedback.
"He spilled La Croix all over our hearts"
comments: Love The Service. Hate The App. Please don't just delete items from my list when they go out of stock. I add to my list all week. Then suddenly, I notice the bill is $40 lower. Now I have to remember/figure out what was deleted. Instead, why not flag the item on the list and not allow checkout to proceed? Also, the search results are horrendous. Feels like search is returning what they want me to buy, not what I'm actually looking for. Plus wrong/out of date images. Luckily shoppers are great!

Outstanding update. Its still early, but so far Ive noticed a much faster, more stable build, and the new color scheme and design dont hurt either. A very welcome user experience upgrade. Thanks for not being lazy, and making sure this app gets better and better. Update: One unfortunate thing Ive noticed in the last several updates, and still a problem in this one, is that Favorites dont seem to update. I cant delete old ones or add new items. The list appears to change, but doesnt really.

I'm still getting used to shopping by app. Once I thought something was in my cart but I must have just looked at it, not added it so I double check cart now at end. Update: I can't say enough about the shoppers and the billing process. Both exceed my expectations. When I called Customer Service they were just as kind and helpful. 2nd Update: Dec 2019 It's been a year and I still like Shipt. Consistently professional & kind staff. 3rd Update: March 2020 Shipt has the best Shoppers!

We love using Shipt and the app is easy to use. 3* rating currently only because finding an item can sometimes be hard even when you have purchased it in the past from the same store. Not everything shows up in the Buy It Again page. You may have to favorite everything just in case it disappears the next time you want to buy it. This could be easily fixed if you could add items when reviewing prior orders.

This app has truly been a lifesaver for me. Since I am now unable walk, I was worried about how I could get food. The shoppers are very quick (often, they are done picking my order in less time than it would take me to find a parking spot and get to the door), they have always been accurate and friendly. I simply can not say enough about this app. Thank you so much. You really are saving lives with this.

title: Seamless: Restaurant Takeout & Food Delivery App

summary: Order food, get restaurant delivery, or pick up food from restaurants near you!
recentChanges: We've cooked up some improvements and successfully squished some little bugs we found. And as always, we encourage you to order something delicious.
comments: Constantly begs me to rate it, so I did! Seriously though every time you order you get a pop up demanding you rate it before you can do anything else. No way to opt out. Annoying enough that I actively dislike using the app just for that prompt. So when you let me use the app without rating it or constant annoyances to do so, I will happily delete this 1 star rating.

Search is hopelessly broken. I searched for a restaurant right around the corner and it doesn't appear in the results even though seamless does take orders for it. This is like the "Yelp" of food deliveries giving some restaurants preferential treatment over others. It's fine to have promoted restaurants but don't hide them in the search!!!
Overall I've had a great experience using this app. It's pretty easy to use. The only thing I don't like is that I wish it would notify you when your food has left the resturant.

Does exactly what it should. I once had to ask for a refund for a missing item and it was applied instantly through filling out an online form - no communication with a chatbot or anything else required.

Great app for convenience, easy interface, but honestly the fees are a lot and sometimes the delivery people disappear with your order (not the ones hired by the specific restaurants, the ones that are Seamless drivers and just pick up orders)

title: Deliveroo: Restaurant Delivery
description:
Order from the best restaurants in the business ‚Äì from local hotspots to national favourites ‚Äì and get the food you love delivered fast, right to your door.

Choose from hundreds of fine restaurants around the neighbourhood, including Busaba Eathai, Carluccio's, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, MEATliquor, and other top quality independent businesses.

Find your faves or try something new
- Search by cuisine, category or restaurants for your postcode
- Browse by fastest delivery time
- View menus and read dish details
- See popular restaurants and meals in your area 

Ordering made simple
- Easily add and remove items from your basket in a single tap
- Place an order for now, later today or tomorrow
- Pay directly from your phone

Live updates
- Track the progress of your order ‚Äì from cooking to delivery ‚Äì in real time
- Receive notifications on delivery status
- See your rider on the map when they‚Äôre nearby

Everything where you need it
- Save delivery instructions for riders
- Securely store multiple payment methods
- Save and name your different delivery addresses
- View order history and download receipts

summary: Order takeaway food from the best loved restaurants, delivered to your door.
recentChanges: To make our delivery experience even safer, we're introducing a contact-free delivery option. Choose "contact-free" at checkout to ask your rider to limit contact to help keep everyone healthy.
comments: Great UX. Google payment detected. Super comfortable to use. Update: What's in need to write notes to the restaurant? Don't see the "order notes" textarea to fill, I would appreciate it so much. Perhaps in one of the next releases will it be easier to communicate with them directly into a step of the funnel?

App map pin is on my old address and drives keep visiting this address first, not the entered address. I have tried all troubleshooting steps and was notified a tech support request raised, no further updates. Order was delayed by 1 1/2 hour and the support representative couldn't speak to any of the drivers (2 drivers visited) or restaurant. They then decided the best option was cancel my order and refund my payment as credit. Outrageous, offered an insulting ¬£5 credit in return.

Decent user experience but all the additional fees are getting a bit ridiculous. ¬£5 to get a delivery from somewhere a 15min walk away, a new service fee etc. Also so many delivery mistakes have happened, you get credit (forgotten items etc) but then the credit only lasts a short period. Was great, now average.

The app didn't save my new details after I saved them, i placed an order and it came up with my old address automatically. I reached out to support and got nothing but a copy paste reply saying they won't change the Address or refund me and they'll "try harder in the future". I replied and they just stopped responding. Absolutely awful, just use Uber Eats.

Great service, but there are things I'm not happy about... I live in London and I'm already paying ¬£11 monthly for the premium membership to have free deliveries (it would be ¬£4 per delivery without it), but they recently added a ¬£0.50 service fee anyway on each order even with a subscription... I'm about to cancel my subscription and start using a different service

title: Drizly: Alcohol delivery. Order Wine Beer & Liquor
description:
Get the door. It's the liquor store.‚Ñ¢

Looking for your favorite beer, wine or liquor? Wish you could get alcohol right to your door? Don‚Äôt schlep to the liquor store. Use the Drizly alcohol delivery app to shop the biggest selection of beer, wine and liquor and get drinks delivered to you. Order from multiple liquor stores at once and compare prices online. 

You can get almost anything delivered. Pizza? Delivery. Groceries? Delivery. Clothing? Delivery. That random store down the street? Delivery. So why walk to the liquor store to shop for beer, wine and spirits, settle for the drinks they have and pay whatever they say? What if you could shop from more than one liquor store, choose the best price and get your beer, wine or liquor brought to you? Now, you can. Drizly‚Äôs alcohol delivery service gives you the convenience of mobile ordering, more beer, wine and liquor options and alcohol delivery. üç∫üç∑üç∏

üåüKEY FEATURES
‚Ä¢Largest Selection: See thousands of beers, wines & spirits by shopping multiple liquor stores at once.
‚Ä¢ Price Comparison: Compare prices of alcohol from liquor stores in your area.
‚Ä¢ 1-Hour Delivery: Get beer, wine or liquor delivered in under 60 minutes.
‚Ä¢ Shipping: Not in a Drizly city? We offer 2-3 day alcohol shipping ANYWHERE in the states of CA, CO, CT,  FL, IL, MA, MN, MO, NJ, NY, NC, OR & WA.
‚Ä¢ Easy Payment: Pay with your credit card in the Drizly alcohol delivery app & show ID upon delivery or pickup.
‚Ä¢ Top Shelf Service: Have questions about  beer, wine & spirits available in your area? Our customer support team is ready to help.

üì± THE LARGEST LIQUOR STORE IS NOW IN YOUR POCKET

We work with liquor stores to give you the largest selection of beer, wine & spirits at your fingertips. Shop for your favorite bourbon, a new whiskey or champagne, or get the ingredients to make that new cocktail you heard about. 

üè™ WHEN SHOULD YOU USE DRIZLY

Whenever you want your alcohol delivered or shipped. Whether it‚Äôs a new bourbon, a favorite champagne or a new liquor for a cocktail recipe, mobile order your drink of choice, and select delivery to your door. Comes in handy when...

‚Ä¢ Drinks are running low. Order reinforcements when the drinks are running low.
‚Ä¢ Mixing a new cocktail? You focus on the drinks, we‚Äôll provide the alcohol delivery.
‚Ä¢ Missed a friend‚Äôs birthday?  Nothing quite says, ‚Äòhappy belated‚Äô  like a delivery of champagne or a nice bottle of whiskey. üçæ
‚Ä¢ Need more beer or bourbon for poker night? Save yourself from running to the liquor store & order your drinks instead. üçª
‚Ä¢ Traveling for work? Order beer, wine or liquor to your hotel & never spend an arm & a leg on the minibar again.
‚Ä¢ Trying to locate a hard-to-find whiskey? Check multiple liquor stores without taking a step. Select it & order it right to your door.
‚Ä¢ Have something to celebrate? Order a celebratory bottle of champagne, or that bourbon you‚Äôve been eyeing. Cheers to you.
‚Ä¢ When you want to up your home bar status with a new bourbon, an aged whiskey or a unique wine.
‚Ä¢ Now? Yup. Get adventurous & try a new beer, wine or spirit. Or get the goods to your favorite cocktail. Everything tastes better delivered.

üåé CURRENTLY SERVING:

Drizly is now providing alcohol delivery & shipping in more than 100 cities in North America. Check ‚Äòem out: https://drizly.com/cities

Not in your city? Sign up to hear when we‚Äôre bringing the drinks to you. 

Must be of legal drinking age to order from Drizly.

About Permissions:
‚Ä¢ Camera: Scan a credit card to add to your account.
‚Ä¢ Location: Auto-locate your delivery address. (Can be denied in Android 6.0+)
‚Ä¢ Microphone: Used for voice search

Love the Drizly alcohol delivery app? Rate us!

You can opt out of interest-based advertising delivered by third parties that follow the Digital Advertising Alliance's Self-Regulatory Principles for Online Behavioral Advertising at https://youradchoices.com/control.

summary: Drinks delivered in under 60 mins! Find new wine, whiskey, craft beer & more!
recentChanges: We fixed some bugs. Yeah, we‚Äôre pretty stoked too.
comments: It's awesome, really convenient, awesome drivers. I just wish they had more beer selection. I would love to be able to get a sour beer. Also, the search is weird, if you don't select from the drop down menu, nothing really shows up. It's strange. Otherwise I love it.

I've been using Drizly for awhile now and I'm content with the convenience of the transactions. Delivery is fairly prompt and professional. This is all about convenience and if you're willing to pay for it then it's worth it. 5 stars for this awesome app from a dedicated customer. Cheers!!!

Great for last minute alcohol needs. Whether you dont have access to get to a store or need something delivered for a party you're having right now, Drizly is convenient and easy to use. Love having access to this.
Awesome every time! Drivers are always expedient, friendly, and follow the instructions in the notes (which is a huge deal to me. Lol). Love em'!
Awesome Service!!! The delivery driver was on time and very courteous. Super convenient when youre having a party and don't feel like making that last minute run. Arguably, the best app on my phone.

title: Walmart InHome Delivery
description:
Walmart InHome is a new service that takes grocery delivery one step further: filling up your fridge, whether you‚Äôre home or not. Get the same great low priced produce, groceries, and everyday essentials from your local Walmart store, straight to your fridge door, with the help of our trained Grocery Delivery associates. So you can spend more time doing the things you love.
 
We fill your fridge, while you fill your life. 
 
Key features:
-	Order groceries from the Walmart Grocery App and select ‚ÄúInHome‚Äù as your delivery option. 
-	See the delivery associate who will be completing your InHome order, so you always know who is stocking your fridge.  
-	Get notified through every step of your delivery: from placing your order to the livestream of the delivery to locking the door behind them as the associate leaves.  
-	Camera access records your delivery and livestreams it to your app. If the camera isn‚Äôt streaming, our Grocery associate will not be able to access your home. 
-	Watch your delivery live or save for viewing later (up to a week after your delivery is completed).

Do Not Sell My Personal Information
Please scroll down to the footer of our Privacy Policy below to find the "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" link https://corporate.walmart.com/privacy-security

comments: This is an amazing idea. The app looks minimalistic and feels awesome. I cannot wait to wait to try the service. Please bring to NYC soon!!
Loved the concept. App looks so clean and easy to use. Great work!
Pretty good app, easy to use and looks and feels good.
App will not open. Too bad. Was looking forward to using this service.
Such an easy way to get groceries, you don't even have to be home!!

title: Deliv - Driver Delivery App
description:
Looking to earn cash on your schedule? Want to deliver packages not people?

Welcome to the Deliv app for drivers! We‚Äôre a same-day delivery service helping local businesses deliver retail items to their customers. 

BE YOUR OWN BOSS - let us know when you're available, and we'll send you delivery tasks via our app. It's a super flexible way to earn money on your own schedule. 

DELIVER HAPPINESS
Deliver retail items same day and make people‚Äôs day! 
No shopping required. No hot food delivery. Just Deliv retail items. 

APPLY TODAY
Interested in becoming a Delivery Specialist? Apply today or learn more at www.deliv.co/drivers.  Then download the app and Deliv!

OUR RETAIL PARTNERS
We partner with over 5,000 retailers across the country - everything from department stores to local floral shops. 

OUR MARKETS
We are live in 35 markets, covering over 1,400 cities, and are always on the lookout for outstanding Deliv‚Äôers!

Atlanta, Austin, Boston, Charlotte, Chicago, Cincinnati, Columbus, Dallas, Denver, Grand Rapids, Houston, Kansas City, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami / Ft Lauderdale, Minneapolis, NY - Brooklyn/Queens, NY - Manhattan, NY - Yonkers, Northern New Jersey, Orange County, Orlando, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, SF Peninsula & South Bay, Sacramento, San Antonio, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Tampa, Washington DC


Got a question for Deliv? Feel free contact us at support@deliv.co for any further inquiries.

comments: needs a daily pay, cash out feature to our banks or debit, and the option to DECLINE orders we don't want. (sometimes it's too far out, or we do not like the area we're picking up or dropping off from.)

I like it, I've been doing it for a couple of months and it worth it, my issue is the payment because I can't see how much I did for an specific order or delivery, we can't see our progress during a shift, the settlement in my opinion is extremely generic.
I just signed up and it put me on a hold tellimg me waiting for something to open up to finish signing up wth please help

ugh..so sad..this WAS my favorite APP/gig..but over the past 6-8mo the comp atmosphere has chngd, & not for the "better"..seems they are taking everything that was NOT broken & BREAKING it!!..IMO - IF you have a "conservative" leaning viewpoint - DO NOT SHARE/or allow them to kno!! it WILL be your demise w/this comp! They r VERY "liberal" leaning..(they ARE HQ in CA!!) If u can work as &/are a "drone", u will do fine...(do not ask dispatch ??, they hav no clue how to ansr & I'll b punishd)

Downloaded the app filled everything out, waited for several weeks to hear from someone so finally I gave them a call and I was told I had to wait another week or so but never gotten anything or heard from them but yet this app now have all my personal information at hand.

title: BeyondMenu Food Delivery
description:
Order food online with no waiting line! With the BeyondMenu App you can search restaurants online and order for pickup, delivery or even make reservations without ever having to pick up the phone.  Choose from thousands of different local restaurants and over 35 different cuisines. It‚Äôs time you try something new and explore the restaurant community around you to see what you‚Äôve been missing out on all this time. You can browse restaurant delivery menus, read reviews, checkout the local coupons and order takeout right from the palm of your hand. Since we‚Äôre nationwide, you can use the App anywhere you go!

Other awesome app features include:
- Easily enter your location with GPS location services
- Save as many different addresses as you need
- Filter results by cuisine, order type, distance and more
- Explore coupons and restaurant offers and apply to your cart before ordering
- View past orders and re-order with the click of a button
- Easily check out with a scan your credit card function
- Share our app with your network of friends, family and co-workers via messaging, Facebook and more
- Have access to a large network of support representatives
- New updates and features to be released continuously
 
Cities/Areas Served:
Baltimore, Denver, Los Angeles, New York, Phoenix, San Francisco, Boston, Houston, Miami, Omaha, Portland, Seattle, Chicago, Las Vegas, New Jersey, Philadelphia, San Diego, Washington DC, and more!

developerAddress:
10400 W Higgins Rd Ste 205
Rosemont, IL 60018
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Works reliably, menu options are easy to use, and quantities, options, and special requests are available everywhere you'd need them. I entered my entire order without being logged in to my account (acct is not a requirement btw), but even after having to bounce out to reset my password in a browser, I was still able to successfully carry on and finish the order. Seems as if not all apps handle that as well.

I thought the app was very easy to use! It was actually a very fortunate find at the last minute towards the end of the night let's just say it's 8:15 p.m. and they have over 10 options of restaurants to choose from which is pretty cool for it to be an app that you just now starting out I'm assuming it hasn't been out for over a few years now. I look forward to seeing the progress that it's going to make and I like that it gives you the option of being able to use cash!!! Highly recommended!
This is a really good app to have when you want to order food. The app is easy to use and will show nearby food places that delivers or take out. I would recommend this app.

Easy to use ordering from a moderate variety of nearby restaurants. Food always arrives hot and in a very timely manner. (Often earlier than I expected.) I use Beyond Menu more frequently than any of the other restaurant delivery apps. Even my 93 year old mother who is an absolute luddite is able to use Beyond Menu despite her having senile dementia and no experience at all with cell phones. I highly recommend this app for all of the above reasons and a few more!

Very easy to use but it seems that there are hardly any restaurants on this app, at least in my area. I downloaded it because my favorite sushi restaurant uses it, but I only see 8 other in Chinese restaurants on here but nothing else. This can't possibly be the only type of cuisine this app services? Wish there were more pictures or information on the items but it's easy to order and make comments for specific details.

title: EatStreet Food Delivery App
description:
Life‚Äôs complicated enough without worrying about lunch, dinner, or that hellsbells o‚Äô clock hankering. So think of EatStreet as your full-time food hooker-upper ‚Äì we fix you up with whatever food delivery and takeout you crave, fast and easy. 

Dig into our hunger-solving features:

Eat More, Earn More:
When you order EatStreet, we‚Äôll hook you up with exclusive coupons, restaurant specials and rewards. 

A Smorgasbord of Selections:

Hungry. Happy. EatStreet.

recentChanges:
Now offering the option to request contactless delivery! We also improved restaurant search and menus with new filtering tools and design improvements that make it easier for you to find and order the tastiest food from your favorite local and national brand restaurants.

If you like how we hook up your hunger, or have suggestions on what we can do better, drop us a review!
comments: I've enjoyed the app so far. Simple interface, not too cluttered or fancy. I have wondered about what I would characterize as delays between ordering and confirmation of my order, but I suspect that has more to do with the restaurant than the app. I appreciate the ability to leave notes for the driver or the restaurant. Would recommend!

I have nothing bad to say about the app itself, seems to work well, for the most part easy to use...the live chat is a bit of a joke. (3 stars) Eatstreet itself, Ive used the service 3 times, all three experiences were poor; food arrived almost an hour from delivery time everytime.. the food was cold... everytime.. when i contacted support they were patronizing and unhelpful. Offered me a $7 credit for my inedible $30 order. I would not recommend this service.

It finally remembers my address! Its not very simple to search for things and often the restaurant info is inaccurate. But its the only delivery app that has restaurants in my area. I use it because I have to, not because I want to. But its ok.

The app is great you can monitor the delivery process. You can watch your driver on the map while you are anticipating your delivery. But there is a downside that sometimes occurs. There are times where the app will shut itself down while ordering and you are not able to continue.

Great experience ordering from a local favorite. Their prices are wonderful, for where I order, and the app is the only way you can enter coupon codes, making it a must have! Menus are clear and easy to navigate. The text I received, after placing my order, confirmed all the details. It was a fun, little message but I won't ruin the surprise. üòâ

title: Grabit Delivery - Get Anything Delivered
description:
Grabit is the app that delivers. Anything you want, whenever you want it. Grabit delivers food from any restaurant or goods from any business, all in typically less than an hour. Prices start at $4.99. Don't sweat it, Grabit.

DELIVERING EVERYTHING ELSE
We mean everything. As long as it's from a nearby business or restaurant, we'll get it done. Have you ever had a new phone charger delivered to you while you've got 2% battery left? It feels amazing.

EASY ORDERING
Don't bother stumbling through inventories -- you know what you want. Type it in and we'll do the rest.

REAL-TIME TRACKING & SUPPORT
Track your delivery in real time and text directly with your driver if anything changes.

QUESTIONS
Reach out anytime - hello@grabit.delivery

comments: Cannot sign up. I get to the screen to verify my phone number and never receive the verification text.

I love using Grabit when I don't want to leave the house. You just put in where you want the items from, what they are, and BOOMüí• the driver gets it. I really like how there aren't limitations such as distance, what restaurant or store it's from, or time it is; as long as there's a driver willing to take it, they'll grab it! üöóüí® The drivers are very prompt and polite too so I definitely recommend giving them a try! üëå
No driver available to grab what I want
Easiest and smoothest delivery app I've used. Much better than Waitr.
app doesn't work! no drivers! codes not recognizeda

title: Beelivery: Grocery Delivery
description: If you want a 20-90 minute grocery delivery, let our crowd-sourced delivery drivers do all the leg work for you and deliver what you need to your door.  You can simply carry on with what you are doing; whether it's watching the match, preparing for a children's party or just watching your favourite soap. Same day, on demand groceries, delivered instantly.
