summary: Get anything beelivered within 20-90 minutes.
comments: Great app. It was an easy and simple sign up process, and once all was complete and checked, I was able to receive notifications for deliveries instantly
Great service for all parties involved... This could really take off and become a normal way of life for a lot of busy people... A handy back up at least.
Great app for both customer and driver. Very easy to use. Recommended

It's a great service, but needs to be advertised. You'd get alot of customers if you invested in some advertising, I joined over a year ago and found it out of luck, I have never seen any ads for this! As a driver, please advertise your business!
Fantastic app and easy to use. As a driver and customer!!!!

title: Delivery Experience
description: Download, login, and use the features that make your Domino‚Äôs deliveries a whole lot easier.
descriptionHTML: Download, login, and use the features that make your Domino‚Äôs deliveries a whole lot easier.
summary: Delivery made easier.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: I was told the calling feature would use the store's phone number as a mask. It actually uses a number that traces to an area roughly forty minutes north of us and is flagged by many mobile providers as a "likely scam." I suppose that only matters when it successfully connects, though. Can't comment on GPS functionality as I do not need it. The push notifications are a bit excessive and "order dispatched" sticks around even after I'm off the clock. Tips don't enter on busy nights.

Honestly horrible application. What design language were you going for? It's so slow, buggy, deliveries don'toad onto my app all the time, map shortcut that's built in takes you to a block number not the actual address (sometimes being upward of 3 miles off the actually delivery) this makes delivering 10x more difficult. In turn, I don't use it. Fix it for your employees and make sure the app in a position to be deployed reliably. It's actually terrible. Location permissions don't work right.

I should be able to choose "track only when using app". Closed the app normal & Android reported this app checked my location 12 hours later off duty. Would suggest running this on an old phone tethered to your phone hotspot. If customer calls back & changes address app will show correct new address but send old address to gps app. That is a strange & unwelcome flaw to watch out for.

This app has so many bugs that neep to be fixed. One driver in the store has this on the phone and the app calls 911 all by it self. Today I had the app call a random number and I wasnt even touching my phone, on top of this 90% of the time I cant even add the tips thought the app because it does not show all of my deliveries even if I force close the app and restart it.

I've used uber postmates and door dash and this app is just a poor excuse as a competitor it literally cant copy an address from an order to maps. The call portion doesnt work at all and now I get in trouble for not using a worthless piece of trash. I'm tired of this app. It was a waste of money for the company and a waste of storage on my phone

title: Publix Delivery & Curbside
description:
Publix Delivery lets you order groceries from your neighborhood Publix to be shopped and delivered by Instacart* the same day, in as little as one hour. 

‚Ä®SHOP RIGHT FROM THE APP 
‚Ä®Just create an Instacart account and then order from the South‚Äôs favorite supermarket via Instacart. Get fast deliveries to your door on groceries, home essentials, and more. You could also use the Publix Curbside service at select locations, and get your groceries shopped by skilled Publix associates right to your car. 
‚Ä®These convenient services are available in many zip codes across the Southeast, and you can find out if delivery or curbside is available near you in the app. 

‚Ä®WHY PUBLIX DELIVERY, POWERED BY INSTACART: 
‚Ä®‚Ä¢ Instacart shoppers check expiration dates and select quality produce‚Ä®
‚Ä¢ Save with weekly sales
‚Ä¢ Get delivery from Instacart in as little as one hour‚Ä®
‚Ä¢ Order Publix Curbside, drive to a reserved spot, get your groceries to your car 
‚Ä¢ Reorder previous items with ease 
‚Ä¢ Contact your Instacart shopper in real time‚Ä®‚Ä®‚Ä®

*Instacart is an independent business that provides online ordering, shopping and delivery services to Publix‚Äôs customers.

recentChanges: Delivering fresh groceries on your schedule means our app is always evolving. With this update, we've fixed a few underlying issues to give you the most seamless experience possible. Happy shopping!
comments: Very difficult just selecting items as the selections offered or often categorized instead of open selection as you would on a grocery list. Has taken me over two hours in order to find the products and had to put in a lot of special request simply to get normal everyday items worth in Italy tell if any fishing but it's necessary for me right now

This was my first time and it was okay. However, the BOGO items are a bit confusing and the total doesn't always show up prior to check out. Also, there's no option to omit substitutions altogether. You can only approve the substitution or select a product which always seems to be more expensive.

The app won't let you use a card payment that has a different billing address than the delivery address. I tried 4 times and each it said my card was declined because it would only apply the delivery address to the billing address. I was finally able to get it to work by putting in a fake order for my billing address, then putting in my card info and then had to go back and change the delivery address back before confirming the order. Inconvenient that I had to trick the app to get it to work.
Easy to navigate, but not all items were not easy to find. For example, really needed eggs, but a different product list came up each time I searched for eggs. Why?
The site was extremely hard to navigate. I tried to order eggs and everytime I tried something else can up including dog food and spices as well as ordering ground beef. Very frustrating.

title: Fetch - Local Delivery
description:
Fetch is a delivery service that allows you to get what you need from hundreds of local businesses including restaurants, cafes, food trucks, grocery stores, convenience stores, flower shops, dry cleaners, hardware and more‚Ä¶

Anything delivered including food, drug store, pet supplies, and more.

Order from your favorite shops or create custom orders.

Reduced or no delivery fees with Fetch Favorites.

Shop for items from multiple places in the same order.

Get real-time updates and chat with your driver.

"As a busy mom, I love that I can count on Fetch to deliver anything I need whenever I need it." ‚Äì Marianne S.

********
Currently only available in Santa Fe, New Mexico.

comments: Concept is there function has not made it. 7pm nothing showed open, couldnt go through menu. App just needs work. Hopefully they get it worked out. Would have been nice to have in Santa fe as we have never been.
I love fetch it's an awesome delivery system they deliver anything! It's so convenient when your in a rush and you dont have time!
Great local delivery service. Difficult to troubleshoot or reach any kind of customer support if you have a problem with the account or payment processing.
Dumbest app ever. Couldn't tap on anything to order dinner from our hotel. How am I supposed to know what's in town when we are visiting???
I get this is local but literally no food options lead you to another page or anywhere. I can't even look at a menu.

title: Fleet by Postmates
description:
Looking to place an order for delivery? Download the Postmates app: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.postmates.android

Welcome to Fleet 5
This version contains updates to the on-delivery experience. We built the experience with you in mind and redesigned key parts of the app with a focus on ease of use and reliability. This is the first of many updates we will be releasing over the coming weeks and months.

WHAT‚ÄôS NEW
- New home and offer screen that will make it easier than ever to accept offers on the go.
- Redesigned itinerary screen that will help you anticipate your next moves.
- New pickup and dropoff order sheets. Clear instructions and a revamped design will make picking up and dropping off easier and more reliable.
- Redesigned map and routing view.
- Bug fixes and performance tweaks.

Turn your free time into earnings with the Postmates Fleet app‚Äî deliver goods from local merchants to customers. No schedules, no offices, just you and the open road. You can drive, bike, scoot, or walk.


EARN ON YOUR OWN SCHEDULE
It‚Äôs free to sign up and fast to get started. There are no fees or time commitments, so you take home 100% of what you earn every time you complete a delivery.

CLEAR EARNINGS, INSTANT DEPOSITS
Most Postmates make $25+/hr, and earnings are deposited weekly or on demand into your bank account. See how much you earned after each delivery and exactly how your earnings were calculated. Get free weekly deposits or cash out instantly anytime you want.

ALL THE TOOLS YOU NEED
Sign up and we‚Äôll send you a free delivery bag and prepaid card so you can deliver food, drinks, retail, and more‚Äîfrom anywhere in your city‚Äîliterally.

Download now and start earning today.

recentChanges:
What's new in 5.14.1:
- Bug fixes and improvements
comments: Rarely get a ping to get a drop off. App took an entire 24 hours to accept my driver's license. In app camera didn't work to capture my license. Support (as many others have stated) is a joke. I reached out multiple times to get help only to get an email that someone answered my question, however, I can't access the dashboard to see their responses!!! The app also won't allow you to change your pic. The mugshot it captures of you for "ID" purposes becomes your profile pic that customers see ü§¨

Generally pretty straight-forward to use, and great for making some quick bucks. Recently I've been experiencing some very inconvenient problems with location and tracking, forcing me to restart my phone and wait for the app to respond after a few minutes so I can complete a delivery. This needs to be addressed. Please, Postmates. I am aware that this is an issue with other drivers. I've done many, many deliveries for Postmates, and the last couple updates on the app really fudged it up.

üôÑüôÑüôÑ I've been stuck on "photo verification " step 1 for DAYSS now!! But, if I do anything through email and the actual website it worked (like background check ect) but I CAN'T do ANYTHING as far as trying to make money because of this app! Not to mention I continue to get emails saying to connect my PM debit card WHICH I DID the DAY it came in the mail. So I retried and STILL get emails to do so. GET IT TOGETHER GUYS. I wanted to love this. Instead Im still broke

it's a great way to supplement your income. everybody is always happy to see you ( if you're on time) very rewarding. However. There are many glitches inside the code. You never get to speak to a human if you encounter problems.( very stressful) every time they upgrade the algorithm it puts more pressure on postmates drivers.

It's great when it works which is about half the timealways seems to be an issue I have to uninstall it or you got to check every day for updates and Google updates seems like there's always something wrong anyd got to tweak it for you get requests I've had a few good runs but mostly trying to figure out how to get it to work

recentChanges:
Performance improvements to make your Caviar experiences better.

Bug fixes.
comments: The search option does not display all the restaurants that use trycaviar. Apart from that, it was easy to use.

In my experience, it's impossible to edit your cart when items have been added to it. It's also too easy to add all the items from a past order to your cart. I now have a cart full of items that I don't want to order, and no way to remove them, making the app unusable for any future orders.

Terrible UI/UX. Was given a digital gift card for Christmas. Entered the code into the app. Tried to place an order and it did not go through. App showed the credit was applied. Was told I had to enter my credit card. Ended up getting charged on 3 separate occasions.

Worst app and company. Created an order and it was immediately cancelled in error. Contacted support and was told to 'please wait while we look into this' for over 30 minutes. In the end they said 'we do not have the tooling to resubmit an order, please reorder and you should have the refund for the initial order in 2-7 days.' really? I think I'll uninstall and go back to Ubereats/GrubHub/Postmates or any other app that isn't caviar (who is owned by door dash).
Love that I can order from my favorite restaurants when I can't get to them!! Thank you!!

title: Dunzo | Delivery App for Food, Grocery & more
description:
Dunzo is a 24x7 delivery app that delivers anything to your doorstep in 45 minutes. Whether it's food delivery or grocery shopping, Dunzo is the only delivery app you'll ever need.

- Get food delivery from top restaurants in the city
- Get grocery delivery from local grocery stores near you
- Get medicines delivery from local chemists near you
- Send packages anywhere within the city
- Book a bike ride to go anywhere within the city‚Ä®

Why Dunzo? Glad you asked!

- We're the fastest; get home delivery in 45 minutes
- No order is too small for us; we'll deliver anything
- Order from anywhere in the city; we'll deliver
- Save big; get up to 50% OFF on food, groceries and more
- Make payments online for a hassle-free experience and enjoy cashback from Paytm, Amazon Pay, Simpl, Lazy Pay and more

Order Food Online

Order food online from restaurants near and around you. Get home delivery in 45 minutes. Unlike other food delivery apps, you can order from ANY restaurant. Enjoy online food delivery from neighbourhood local joints, cafes, fine-dining restaurants, and fast-food chains like Dominos, KFC, Burger King, Pizza Hut, FreshMenu, Mc Donald‚Äôs, Subway, Faasos, Taco Bell and more.

This is the online food delivery app for every mood. Hot coffee? Spicy biryani? Cheesy pizzas & juicy burgers? Or some healthy salads & juices? You‚Äôll find all your favourite food & beverages on Dunzo. With this food home delivery app, get any cuisines delivered to your doorstep including North Indian, Chinese, South Indian, and even foreign cuisines such as Thai, Vietnamese, and American. Whether it's breakfast, lunch, dinner, an evening snack, or late-night cravings, this online food delivery app will come to your rescue.

Order Grocery Online

Now buy groceries online on Dunzo - shop for grocery, fruits & vegetables, beauty & wellness, personal care, home & household essentials, diapers & baby care, pet care, organic products, meats and seafood on this grocery app. Enjoy grocery delivery to your home in 45 minutes. We‚Äôll deliver even a single item both from your favourite local grocery stores near and around you and top supermarkets in the city.

Buy groceries online through this grocery app including products from Patanjali, Aashirvaad, Saffola, Fortune, Nestle, Amul, Mother Dairy, Coke, Pepsi, Bisleri, Colgate, Dabur, Surf Excel, Maggi, Vim, Haldiram's, Kellogg‚Äôs, Nescafe and Pampers amongst other leading brands. Dunzo is the only grocery shopping app you‚Äôll ever need. Think of us as your online grocery store and supermarket. 

Order Medicines Online

Dunzo is an online chemist in your pocket; you‚Äôll never have to run from one chemist to the next again. Order Allopathic medicines, Homeopathic pills, Ayurvedic herbs, and Over-The-Counter (OTC) health products online from trusted chemists like Apollo Pharmacy, Wellness Forever and Myra Medicines. Get home delivery in 45 minutes.

Avail better discounts and savings on medical bills compared to the local pharmacy. Save up to 50% on medicines and get the lowest prices on OTC health products from brands like Dabur, Himalaya, Piramal, Pediasure, Sri Sri Tattva, Organic India, HealthVit, Baidyanath, Patanjali, and others.

Send Packages Within Your City

Dunzo allows you to send packages anywhere across the city. Use us to pick up and drop off laundry, get forgotten keys, send lunch boxes from home to office, send or collect items for repair or even deliver documents or parcels to clients.

Book a Bike Taxi

Zip through traffic and get to anywhere in the city using Dunzo Bike Taxi. It‚Äôs the fastest and cheapest way to commute in the city. Don‚Äôt waste time waiting for a cab; hop on a Dunzo Bike Taxi now! Available in Gurgaon, Noida & Hyderabad only.

---

We‚Äôre currently present in Bangalore, Mumbai, Gurgaon, Delhi, Noida, Hyderabad, Pune, Chennai, and Jaipur. If you have a complaint or any feedback, drop us an email at reachus@dunzo.in and we will get back to you.

With this food home delivery app, get any cuisines delivered to your doorstep including North Indian, Chinese, South Indian, and even foreign cuisines such as Thai, Vietnamese, and American. Whether it's breakfast, lunch, dinner, an evening snack, or late-night cravings, this online food delivery app will come to your rescue.

Order Grocery Online

Now buy groceries online on Dunzo - shop for grocery, fruits & vegetables, beauty & wellness, personal care, home & household essentials, diapers & baby care, pet care, organic products, meats and seafood on this grocery app. Enjoy grocery delivery to your home in 45 minutes. We‚Äôll deliver even a single item both from your favourite local grocery stores near and around you and top supermarkets in the city.

Buy groceries online through this grocery app including products from Patanjali, Aashirvaad, Saffola, Fortune, Nestle, Amul, Mother Dairy, Coke, Pepsi, Bisleri, Colgate, Dabur, Surf Excel, Maggi, Vim, Haldiram's, Kellogg‚Äôs, Nescafe and Pampers amongst other leading brands. Dunzo is the only grocery shopping app you‚Äôll ever need. Think of us as your online grocery store and supermarket.

Order Medicines Online

Dunzo is an online chemist in your pocket; you‚Äôll never have to run from one chemist to the next again. Order Allopathic medicines, Homeopathic pills, Ayurvedic herbs, and Over-The-Counter (OTC) health products online from trusted chemists like Apollo Pharmacy, Wellness Forever and Myra Medicines. Get home delivery in 45 minutes.

Avail better discounts and savings on medical bills compared to the local pharmacy. Save up to 50% on medicines and get the lowest prices on OTC health products from brands like Dabur, Himalaya, Piramal, Pediasure, Sri Sri Tattva, Organic India, HealthVit, Baidyanath, Patanjali, and others.

Send Packages Within Your City

Dunzo allows you to send packages anywhere across the city. Use us to pick up and drop off laundry, get forgotten keys, send lunch boxes from home to office, send or collect items for repair or even deliver documents or parcels to clients.

Book a Bike Taxi

Zip through traffic and get to anywhere in the city using Dunzo Bike Taxi. It‚Äôs the fastest and cheapest way to commute in the city. Don‚Äôt waste time waiting for a cab; hop on a Dunzo Bike Taxi now! Available in Gurgaon, Noida & Hyderabad only.

---

We‚Äôre currently present in Bangalore, Mumbai, Gurgaon, Delhi, Noida, Hyderabad, Pune, Chennai, and Jaipur. If you have a complaint or any feedback, drop us an email at reachus@dunzo.in and we will get back to you.
summary: Get home delivery in 45 minutes of food, grocery, vegetables, medicines & more.
recentChanges:
No one will miss the dead bugs
Think of it as spring cleaning for tech.
With this update, we have improved the backend of our app to give you a seamless, faster experience. Our engineers have worked hard to kill bugs to give you a reliable Dunzo experience, always.
comments: I didn't like the application. Looks like there is some technical issue. I am not able to login to application. It shows message your account is blocked due to some suspicious activity. Support team is neither trying to solve the issue nor they are telling me reason for why my account got blocked. There is no customer care facility for end users

Very good App.. I usually use this app to order medicines. Even if the medicine is not listed in the app, they have an option to write the medicine name, the delivery person goes to the store, sends the pictures of the medicine and the price. At that time, you have to pay the amount and the item will delivered. And the delivery fee is also very less. Apart from that, the user interface of the app is also very nice. You get notifications for every steps during the delivery.

Far better than what assumed in the first place. Installed this app on refer by one of my friend. But believe me i am very much happy with its services and response from customer care. I had already referred a few of my friends. Its worth to use and share for others. I surely regret my choice selecting Dunzo as my needy partner for deliverables. Recently i found we can't open this app/website in laptop. Dunzo account only accept to link for 1 mobile number which is even more pathetic. Uninstall

I really liked the app before but lately their services have been really poor. The order will not reach you even after 2 hours, yes that is the amount of time I had to wait. And when you are trying to talk to the representative they will give you one line response and will close the chat instead of resolving the issue. This is really poor and I might uninstall the app as well. You lost a customer here Dunzo!

It is not allowing to set up pickup & delivery address. It does not have support features. Chat options has limited option to select from, options not suitable for specific issues. Should provide options to enter problem. Call support not available.

title: Delivery Club ‚Äì –¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∫–∞ –µ–¥—ã
comments: Amazing application, allows me to track down every step of the delivery. Lots of discounts available. The couriers are very lovely too and follow all instructions which are given to them. Thank you!
Some issues, since I often have to use Google translate, but overall it is a 5 star experience with the app
Good app for foodie people's. The app is excellent. Thank you.
Awful experience.. At first it said 45mins then it took almost 80mins.. And there should be english Language option
Am very impressed with the fast delivery

title: GoShare - Move, Haul, Deliver
description:
GoShare connects truck and van owners with businesses and people who need help moving, delivering or hauling on demand. Our delivery professionals will help you load, deliver and unload your cargo when you need it. You can schedule a delivery in advance or get a delivery professional as quickly as 30 minutes from now. Download the app to get a free price estimate before you book. Request one or two movers depending on how much help you need.

GoShare offers same day, last mile delivery for retailers. We are faster, cheaper and easier to use than traditional delivery companies. Businesses who own a fleet of trucks find GoShare to be a low cost and low stress replacement to managing your own fleet. Consider GoShare your personal fleet of trucks.

GoShare is perfect for furniture delivery and a great alternative to truck rentals. Schedule a pickup for your items now through the app or book online in an instant. Connect with local GoShare delivery professionals when you need a moving service on demand.

Our mission is to empower responsible truck and van owners to help others in their community by promoting truck sharing. All of our delivery professionals are friendly, helpful and thoroughly screened before they begin driving for GoShare. They must pass a national background check, driving history check, and vehicle inspection.

GoShare also carries cargo insurance and liability insurance to protect your items that we are delivering. Get the truck and muscle that you need to get the job done fast. You can also request special equipment like a dolly, furniture dolly, or appliance dolly to help deliver really heavy items.

The GoShare app allows you to track the status of your delivery with real time notifications and communicate with your driver with app. You can also rate your delivery professional after every job which helps us ensure that our customers have a great experience every time they use GoShare.

If your business would like to partner with us visit www.goshare.co/business. Watch customer testimonials, driver interviews, press stories and demo videos at www.goshare.co/videos.

GoShare is currently available in Atlanta, Austin, Chicago, Cincinnati, Cleveland, Columbus, Dallas, Denver, Houston, Indianapolis, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Louisville, Miami, Nashville, Orange County, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Sacramento, San Antonio, San Bernardino, San Diego, San Francisco Bay Area, Tucson, Washington DC, and parts of New Jersey.

recentChanges:

comments: This service was amazing. I ordered a desk from Costco and saw the goshare app pictured next to it which peaked my interest cause I didn't have time to assemble this beauty. Downloaded the app, easy to create an acct. Not only do they deliver, you can pay for assemble. My driver picked up my item on time arrived at my house in record time and I'm one happy customer

Don't use them...I've had two guys show up, even tho I sheduled the pick up, not only wrong day , but the wrong time. They also play with your account that you use for the move. They hold the funds (which is normal)....but they don't take the total from that, instead charging you again and making you wait to get your funds back from the original charge. No thanks and.never again. They are not upfront with there prices and unorganized in the way they do business.

Quick and easy. With everything going on with this virus I had to start working from home and needed a computer desk that morning. Sam was amazing and quick! Got it within 30 min. Extremely happy with the service‚ô•Ô∏è

Use a different app. I read their terms and conditions. I dont feel safe using the app. The fact that a driver can decline a request just because it doesnt match the description. I couldnt even find an option for a single couch when I was trying to book my services. This company is a scam company when they obviously dont offer a large range of descriptions and give the mover the option to cancel because of the description. Coincidence, think not.

Fantastic service and the men who delivered were great. I would definitely use this app again and refer others. It's too bad Costco isn't more educated on the service! If I hadn't found a customer in the store, who raved about the service, I would have been leery to use the app. Mike and Ahmad were great!

title: Wefast ‚Äî Courier Delivery Service
description:
Wefast India - same day on demand intra-city courier and delivery service in 60-90 minutes exactly when you need it. Place an order and our system will find the most suitable delivery partner nearby.
 
Completely hassle-free. No need to register to deliver your products
 
Express delivery with Wefast:
 
ü•á ‚Äî really fast
üí∞ ‚Äî  economical - hyperlocal tariffs starting from Rs.60
üåô ‚Äî you choose delivery time
üó∫ ‚Äî thousands delivery partners in Mumbai, Delhi, Bangalore, Hyderabad, etc
üì¶ ‚Äî delivery of gifts, documents, cakes, anything anywhere
 
Courier delivery service Wefast India is a part of global delivery service, which works in 10 countries across the world. In India it is available in cities: Mumbai, Delhi NCR, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Pune, Kolkata, Chennai.
 
‚è± Urgent on time delivery
 
Courier is assigned within 10 minutes of placing an order and can arrive at pickup location within 15-30 minutes (depends on distance)! You can choose time interval with up to 30 minutes precision.
 
Courier will arrive when it is convenient for you, rather than at some random unknown time interval.
 
üíµ Pay by cash or wireless transfer
 
You can pay for express delivery with cash, by wire transfer from your business account, or card-to-card transfer directly to courier. In-built price calculator will show you the cost of delivery online, right in your app.
 
üöò Couriers on foot, motorcycles or trucks/tempos
 
Select the type of delivery that fits your needs:
üö∂üèΩ‚Äç courier on foot ‚Üí fast delivery of parcels, documents, cloth, cakes;
üèç courier with a bike ‚Üí delivery of medium sized boxes, auto parts, fragile items;
üöÄ hyperlocal delivery: cheaper for shorter distances!



üîç Track your delivery on the map in real time
 
Super convenient and easy. Used to seeing your taxi on the map? Now you get the same convenience with delivery. No need to check up on courier status with annoying phone calls.
 
At your discretion, you can turn on or off SMS status notifications for both senders and receivers at each step of delivery.
 
üéì Smart couriers
 
‚ÄúBuy for Me‚Äù Option: Delivery boy can pay for items with their own money and deliver them to you.
 
COD Option: If you sell some items and need to collect cash from your customers upon delivery, the courier will receive the money and wire them to you by the end of the working day.
 
ü§ù  Securing your order
 
You can declare the value of your parcel and for just 0.68% +GST of that amount, Wefast will reimburse you the full amount in case of loss or damage, regardless of the reason and without any hassle.
 
‚úÖ If necessary, the courier can take a picture of your parcel at pickup and drop-off locations. ‚úÖ
 
üç∑ Support
 
Customer support in chat or by phone 022 49054444, 9 AM - 9:00 PM 7 days a week even on public holidays.
Customer service representatives can help you with order status, advise on the best delivery type, explain how our service works and why we have the best couriers.
 
üìñ Order reports
 
Client dashboard contains information about all of your deliveries, including detailed information about each and every route.
 
üîù In 2017 our couriers delivered over 2 million parcels around the world.
 
Over 5 lakhs clients around the world use our app on a regular basis. Give it a try!
 
Should you have any questions or comments about our service, drop us a note at op@wefast.in.


____________________________
üîú Coming soon üîú


‚úàÔ∏è Intercity delivery
üöö pickup cars, vans, trucks ‚Üí good for apartment or office move.
 
Wefast can you help you deliver your packages to other cities in 1-2 days. Our courier will pick up your package when convenient and deliver it to an intercity logistics company. A different courier will pick up the package at the destination city and deliver it securely to the designated recipient.

recentChanges:
‚Äî We have introduced a few technical changes to improve the app's performance.
Nothing visual, but your experience will be smoother!
comments: Worst app, can't trust this app. I placed a delivery for my laptop charger from my parents'home to mine, and they just returned it back to the pick up point a while after picking it up. Can't rely at all, I had to complete very important work and because I relied on this app I got into big trouble

I liked the service but the address map has biggest problem. If i give correct address it points to a very different far away location. I had to manually move the pointer to the right location which took much time. Without search option on map its really hard. I noticed the bug only after the courier guy went to wrong far away location given by the map for pickup.
Really helpful app for sending around stuff within Mumbai...had to send something to a friend from Powai to Wadala and service was very prompt..

It's a very useless app. I scheduled my parcel 2 days earlier and they assigned a courier service also but when the date came i checked and it was looking for courier service again. And the time I schedules was 7:00pm to 7:30pm (if I'm not wrong) and they rescheduled it like 2 - 3 times and made it 11pm. Useless

Extremely disappointing app, do not waste your time on it.. Even if you schedule delivery prior they are never on time. They usually arrive on the delivery time which is 1-2 hours late. Just writing 60 minutes fast delivery and scamming people with wrong information. Rubbish app! CRM sucks, they don't even respond.. Feels like computer generated messages writing apology.

title: foodpanda - Local Food Delivery
description:
TAKE YOUR FIRST BITE OF FOODPANDA


Craving something delicious? If there's one thing we know it‚Äôs food delivery. It‚Äôs our mission to bring tasty food from your favourite local restaurant right to your door so you can eat good food every day.

Check we're in your city by downloading the app.

We'll go the extra mile to make your order the greatest food experience in the world. Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or super fresh sushi? We know the best food for every cuisine that your city has to offer. foodpanda is the best food delivery service in your city -- so let's take the first bite!

SO WHAT‚ÄôS THE DEAL?

You‚Äôre ready and waiting to eat, we‚Äôve all been there, dreaming of Italian food, eating burgers in our dreams. Dream no more - our riders are here to bring the food you've been lusting after right to your door. Dreams really do come true.

HOW IT WORKS

First, enter your address (home/ office/ treehouse). Then, choose your favourite restaurant and place an order. They‚Äôll prepare your food and once it‚Äôs ready, our courier bring it to you. If you need something to watch, you can track your rider in real-time. Then you eat. Food goals.
 
WHAT MAKES US SPECIAL

foodpanda chooses your local favourites; the best food near you. pizza or sushi, healthy salads or food to nurse your hangover -- your dinner will be cooked with love and care. Our riders come to your very doorstep with a smile, while you save time to do something else you love. There's a cuisine and a dish to suit every moment and we'll help you make the first bite last.

TALK TO US

If you‚Äôve ordered with us before, we‚Äôd want to know what you think. Give us your food thoughts/confessionals. Let us be your notepad.
Email us at support@foodpanda.com

For further info, visit
https://www.foodpanda.bn
https://www.foodpanda.co.th
https://www.foodpanda.hk
https://www.foodpanda.ph
https://www.foodpanda.pk
https://www.foodpanda.sg

Enjoy!
comments: The app is not user friendly and worst part of it is that there is no one whom you can talk to if there is an issue. There is a chat channel but does not even reply. No problem with riders but just the app which is difficult to track orders and there are sometime lags or delays. I use this app almost everyday but I think somebody really need to look in to this issue if you want to give a satisfying service to your customer.

There are many improvements needed to be done with the app such as order details (to reflect payment method used and to reflect add-ons in the order status) because currently it's not detailed enough. Also, a review button in the completed orders will be helfpful. Finally, a "chat w/ restaurant" option in the order status might also help to chat w/ the restaurant directly in the event you forgot to specify or mention something regarding your order.

The app itself is great and simple to use. Problem lies in the partnership with local restaurants. There is not a whole lot of choices, plus many are frequently temporarily unavailable to order. P.S. the app is still in the first few months of operations in Yangon where I order. Hopefully things will get better over time.

I can easily use this app and order everyday but my location keeps on changing and it is not accurately pointed at my location, because of this I had to cancel my orders and try again if it can properly point at my location but no luck it never did. Even games such as Pokemon and others can locate my current position accurately but this app just can't. This frustrates me a lot because I do want the foods they offer.

This is a very good app and really helpful. It gives so many discounts and vouchers. The delivery charge is also free. But the problem is that it is a zone based service. As a result we can't order from any restaurant's which is outside of the zone. I prefer to fix an amount of delivery charge outside of the zone so that we can buy foods from any restaurant's.

title: Informed Delivery¬Æ
description:
The Informed Delivery¬Æ application allows you to interact with your incoming mail and packages in one convenient location. Digitally preview your household‚Äôs letter-sized mailpieces and receive USPS Tracking¬Æ updates for incoming packages directly from the app:

‚Ä¢	Verify your identity to ensure you have access to your secure dashboard

‚Ä¢	Digitally preview grayscale images of the exterior, address side of their household‚Äôs letter-sized mailpieces scheduled to arrive soon.

‚Ä¢	Report missing mailpieces, and in some cases, interact with mailer-provided digital content associated with mailpiece images (e.g., special offers, related links).

‚Ä¢	Schedule emails and/or text-based alerts to track the delivery status of your incoming packages.

‚Ä¢	Scan the barcode on shipping labels with a mobile device‚Äôs camera to store the label number and track its status.

‚Ä¢	Leave delivery instructions for incoming packages and schedule a redelivery.

recentChanges: Maintenance and bug fixes including:  an issue where customers were unable to sign in and stability enhancements
comments: It randomly logged me out last week and I haven't been able to log back in since. I can log in fine on my browser, but when I try to log into the app it says "unable to complete the request" Edit: I saw in another review that someone said they were able to get back in once they cleared the cashe/data of that app. I tried that and finally got past the first message, but after I enter the code that was sent to me the screen just sits on the login screen, loading.

It was great when it still worked. I could see 90% of my parcels and envelope mail in a couple taps. However the app has quit working for me since last week and I am sad. The site still lets me log in as normal but it's a pain in the butt to have to pull it up every time and log in. Please fix your app!

02/21/2020 Still not able to log into informed delivery. It's a "work sometimes" app, at least since I've had it on my phone at least once per month I've had to uninstall and reinstall the app to allow it to work. This time today the app won't let me log in. I have checked and changed my password a few time and till no luck in signing in. Guess the last update didn't help...

I love this app because I love being able to see when something is coming but lately I have been having problems and been receiving an error message everytime I try to sign in. Telling me the request can't be completed. However i can sign in to informed delivery on the usps website. I will change my review once you fix the issue.

It said my name/address was already registered, got past the sms verification but it said password was wrong twice then my account was blocked. title: Delivery Dudes
description:
Visit us at: https://deliverydudes.com

Delivery Dudes delivers the food you want, from the places you love.


The Food You Want

Browse menus from all your favorite, local restaurants to find exactly what you‚Äôre looking for. Is it a sushi, tacos and ice cream kind of night? Gross! But with Delivery Dudes, still possible: simply order from multiple restaurants.


When You Want It

Know you need food to remain alive but are really in a groove with the Henderson Report? Place a future order with a note that reads, ‚ÄúHey Lauren, I‚Äôm sorry we couldn‚Äôt be together earlier. Time just wasn‚Äôt on our side, but I‚Äôm here now. Love, Chicken Fajitas‚Äù and have it delivered when the mood is right. (Substitute Lauren and Chicken Fajitas with your name and meal choice for a more personalized experience.)


Where You Want It

Whether you‚Äôre on the couch, at the park, by a horse or in a hole, as long as you‚Äôre in range of one of our territories, and have a working cell phone, one of our Dudes can drop your foods wherever hunger strikes. 


Delivered by Human Beings

Robots are cool. They vacuum your house, catfish your grandmother and monitor your every move. We get it, it‚Äôs the future. But sometimes it‚Äôs nice to talk to a real live, human person. And that is why Delivery Dudes is operated by and for humans. 

Have an issue with your order? Would you like to virtually high-five us for being so damn great? Give us a shout, and a knowledgable, locally-based Dude will get back to you ASAP. 


The App

With the all-new Delivery Dudes app, ordering the food you want from the places you love has never been easier. Not only have we improved navigation throughout the ordering process but we have introduced a number of key features that will allow you to create an account, save addresses, view past orders, enter promo codes, and more.

Welcome to Delivery Dudes. Enjoy!

comments: Very convenient service. They work hard to keep the customer happy.. The app is terrible though. Doesn't close and buggy logging in

Downloaded it, opened it, uninstalling it. Had no search bar at all, which is a joke. On top of that they had less then 25 restaurants listed, all of the same type - Pizza. This app is an actual joke. It's sad to see how downhill it really went. It's upsetting that I spent 10mins downloading this first instead of UberEats or some other one. That's how bad it is. Also, get a graphics designer to help update your app. It looks like someone in a college class designed this app for a class project.

Although my favorite restaurant was on their list, apparently it no longer is. App let me go through the entire order process up until the Place Order point, and then just froze. Tried at least a half dozen times to Place Order thinking I was doing something wrong. Out of frustration (and hunger), cancelled app & installed a different one. There is also a small charge on my bank account which appears to be from some company affiliated with DD. Bank is investigating. Thought app was free? Beware

The services are great but the App itself is glitched. If I switch between different apps it doesn't show back up when I try to open it again. It's like invisible or something and I have close it and restart it everytime.

Great service but.. the app doesnt work anymore. It says 'printing up some menus' etc but never shows any restaurants and menus anymore. I have downloaded and uninstalled it couple of times past few month, it just does not work anymore. Help!

title: Minibar Delivery
description:
Minibar Delivery brings the liquor store to your door. Order alcohol on-demand in just a few taps. Simply enter your delivery address, add your favorite beverages to your cart, and check out. Your order will be delivered in as little as 30-60 minutes.

Perfect for stocking the bar, sending gifts, dinner parties, office events, tailgates, pre-parties, after-parties, or when you just need a cocktail.

App Features include:
- Curated collections to help you make your selection
- Powerful search and filters for finding your favorites
- Wine descriptions and pairings with expert recommendations
- Delivery scheduling up to 14 days in advance
- $10 discount for every friend you refer

One-hour delivery is currently available in select cities including New York, Hoboken, Jersey City, Chicago, Oakland, San Francisco, Dallas, Fort Worth, Austin, Newark, Houston, San Antonio, Miami, Orlando, Palm Beach, Hartford, Baltimore, Boston, New Orleans, San Jose, Tucson, Stamford, Los Angeles, San Diego, Denver, Aspen, Albany, Phoenix, Boulder, Minneapolis, St. Paul, Memphis, Tampa, Louisville, Colorado Springs, Washington DC, El Paso, Westchester, New Haven, Fort Lauderdale, Fort Collins, Jacksonville, Nashville, Westport and more. New locations coming soon!

Plus, shipping available in California, Connecticut, Florida, Illinois, New Jersey, and New York. 

America‚Äôs largest liquor store. You must be 21 to use Minibar. Drink responsibly.

These services are not affiliated with the MINIBAR restaurant or Jose Andres.

summary: The best way to shop for wine, liquor, and beer.
recentChanges: General navigation and performance improvements. Email us at help@minibardelivery.com with any questions. And if you love your Minibar Delivery experience, leave us a review!
comments: It forces me to use the same liquor store for everything that's 4 towns over when there's a dozen other stores between my house and there. It also tells me that the store it's forcing me to buy from is closed at 4pm. I checked online, they're open until 8pm. So I couldn't even make a purchase even if I wanted to. There's definitely a lot more work to be put into this service.

Since they "updated" it the app simply and only gives you the cheapest price of all the sources. Understand each source (store) has a minimum. You have to reach the minimum of each store to get charged a $5 fee. If you want two different items, the least expensive of each is from two different stores, you have to order more from each store to reach the minimum. There are no other options. Bad move on their side.

I absolutely love minibar!!!!! I can't say enough about how great this app is! I have ordered from it 3 times now.. my local store the order gets sent to is Burnham Mart in Chicago. I usually order Camarena Tequila and the price is basically what is pay at the store. There have been items not available that I've ordered but they call within 5 minutes of placing the order and ask me if I would like it substituted for something else. Delivery has been around 30 minutes each time and if you can sign up for shoprunner, it's free delivery always! The staff at Burnham are great and I am very appreciative for the service they provide!!
first time using app .the driver was here in 30 min . and nice n professional.this app is pretty awesome...maybe estimated time of arrival is needed.. but I'm super satisfied
The app is easy to use. Very and friendly customer service. i was able to contact the delivery vendor easily. Thier delivery was on time and successful.

title: GO! Delivery
description:
The Go! Delivery app revolutionizes the delivery process for order delivery. With just a few taps delivery ambassadors can create their own routes, log deliveries, optimize routes, and utilize GPS navigation to each delivery location.

Key Benefits:

‚Ä¢ Delivery Ambassadors can create their own routes within the app reducing time spent in-store
‚Ä¢ Routes created in SMS sync with the app getting drivers on the road faster
‚Ä¢¬†Tickets are logged in real-time providing the most accurate and up-to-date information on deliveries for both store staff and guests
‚Ä¢¬†Optimizes routes to increase efficiency
‚Ä¢¬†Eliminates time spent printing maps or entering addresses into standalone GPS
‚Ä¢¬†Seamlessly passes address information to your phone‚Äôs native GPS
‚Ä¢¬†Delivery Ambassadors can monitor pending deliveries throughout the day
‚Ä¢¬†Supports multiple stores

title: Glovo: Order Anything. Food Delivery and Much More
description:
One of the most downloaded delivery apps with over 30 million installs.

 ‚ÄúGlovo offers a ‚Äòshop on your behalf‚Äô app that promises to let you order anything locally on-demand and have it delivered  ‚Äúwithin minutes‚Äù .‚Äú  (TechCrunch)
 
 ‚ÄúResidents of cities can place an order for the item they want on Glovo‚Äôs app. The nearest courier will go to the closest store that has it available, buy and deliver it to the customer.‚Äù  (Financial Times)

Order anything you want with Glovo and it will be delivered in minutes. You can order from any restaurant in your city, or from any supermarket and shop. 
Food, pharmacy, flowers, alcohol, groceries, games, socks, your favorite burger, pizza, Goiko grill, kebab, tapas, sushi‚Ä¶ we can go and pick up your suit from the dry cleaners or bring you the keys you‚Äôve forgotten. You order, and Glovo gets it for you.
Find great deals nearby. Save time and money. Enjoy 24/7 delivery service. Anything, anywhere.

 
WHY USE GLOVO? 
‚òÖ Among the most downloaded Spanish Lifestyle Apps in 2018 and 2019.
‚òÖ Over 30 million installs worldwide. 
‚òÖ More than 20.000 partner restaurants, shops, stores.
‚òÖ Deliveries from the biggest chains: McDonald‚Äôs, KFC, Papa John‚Äôs and many more.
‚òÖ Easy-to-use and to order. 
‚òÖ Order anything, anywhere, anytime,  locally or further away.
‚òÖ Track your delivery in real time. 
‚òÖ Fast delivery.


WITH GLOVO YOU CAN: 
‚òÖ Order anything you want.
‚òÖ Order from any restaurant in your city. 
‚òÖ Discover local stores. 
‚òÖ Order any product you wish.
‚òÖ Track and follow the delivery in real time.
‚òÖ Receive your delivery in minutes. 
‚òÖ Rate your experience. 
‚òÖ Reorder your favorite items with 1 click.
‚òÖ Share with family and friends: invite your friends and family members. Help them to save time with deliveries. 
‚òÖ Get free delivery with Glovo Prime. (only for specific countries)
 
 
ABOUT GLOVO 
Glovo is an app that allows you to buy, collect and send any product within your city. Glovo is already present in over 26 countries and 200 cities, making life easier and better for millions of people around the world. Download the app for free, and whenever you want something just order a Glovo, and we‚Äôll get it for you. 


TALK TO US! 
We‚Äôll do anything to make your Glovo experience as good as possible. If you need any help, please contact our customer service at https://glovoapp.com/en/support.

recentChanges:
Glovo's mission is to deliver anything you need, fast! And today we're raising the bar with some new improvements.

Loving our app? Remember to leave a review and let everyone know how Glovo is helping you.
comments: Pros: fast delivery, nice interface. Cons: awful support team, glitches with promo codes. I had (and still have) a promo code for a free delivery, was charged the full price for the delivery. The only suggestion from the support team (or a chatbot) was to 'reinstall the app', because they did not see any promo codes on my account. That's probably a bug, or intentionally deceptive advertising.

False advertising: if a supermarket appears you expect to be able to order what they have. But you can't. Only a crippled subset. UX mistakes abound. Poor navigation, you can lose your cart. All the more apalling when you see "delightful" animations. This is the stuff dystopias are made of. Not surprised by Luddites when techies drop the ball like this.

Today installed this and made my order. It seemed convenient, but there were a lot of issues. Here's the story: 1.My card was charged twice for the amount of order. 2.I received my order, one payment was cancelled. Weird, but whatever. 3.In couple hours my card was charged again for an amount slightly larger than the original one. 4.In couple more mins there was one more attempt to change my card, but was rejected, I assume by my bank. Support can't explain this and responds in foreign language

Blown away by this app, got it for McDonalds delivery + discovered a world of restaurants to try. Great interface (photos of products to browse), low delivery fee, lots of special offers/discount codes. Not just food but also shops(KIKO!!üòç). Speedy + hassle free; couriers find location no problem (unlike other delivery services). I think we got priority service with KFC as food came ridiculously fast (15-20mins). Tracks courier with GPS so can see progress in real time. Thank you GLOVO!

Not bad, but could be better. I can't find some products in the supermarket section yet they are obviously stocked up in the supermarket. You should regularly update the app's supermarket items to sync them with the actual products, and prices.

title: Schwan's Home Delivery

recentChanges: We regularly update our app to make it better for you. Download the latest version which includes a few bug fixes.
comments: Help! App says security certificate has expired. Also, can not log in via internet page. I hope this is a temporary issue. 1‚òÜ at the moment. 4‚òÜ for overall experience. Typically a great app. Quick and easy way to place orders. Get push notices and reminders. Oh, yeah, and the foods great too!!!

Cant use the App anymore. Just crashes. Not sure what happen or if anybody else is experiencing this also. Have to get in the actual website to pre-order. Other than that, it's easy to use, food is great, driver is awesome!
Had to delete and download, still won't open, get some strange message, like there is no longer a site ??? Was too hesitant, appears to be fine now....
App will not open. I get a certificate error and cannot use the app. I have a Samsung Galaxy Note 10+ that's up to date.
I can't use this app anymore since I got a security message this time, so I can't use it anymore. Makes no sense to have an app that people can't use. Uninstalling!

recentChanges:
Ol√°, amante lanches deliciosos entregues onde voc√™ estiver. Essa vers√£o n√£o tem grandes mudan√ßas, mas fizemos aquela dedetiza√ß√£o no app pra eliminar bugs e deixar a sua experi√™ncia t√£o incr√≠vel quanto um bolo de cenoura com bastante cobertura de chocolate.

comments: The app is severely annoying for foreigners for two reasons. First, you can not pay with any option that is not in person as you need a CPF for that and it is very bothersome to get one. Second, the in person payment option is not always available because ifood does not provide sufficient machines to the delivery personal and so you need to wait randomly and annoyingly until one delivery person with a machine is avaliable. This sucks as you are probably somebody who values his or her time.
Very nice app, could have the option to debit directly from your bank account, discount coupons are not accepted by most restaurants

It is a love-hate situation with this app. While it is really useful showing restaurants nearby and their menu, iFood's payment system is really annoying and may simply refuses your credit card for no apparent reason, which make the use of their coupons impossible. Besides, it is not rare for your order to arrive late, wrong or not arrive at all.
Easy to use, with a lot option of filters... I recommend.
Rly good app. Only issue is that the tab to get in contact to the restaurant is too confused to find/use

title: Rappi
description:
We've delivered more than 3 million orders!

You no longer have to leave your house or office to enjoy the best of your city. Rappi will bring you ANYTHING in minutes.

Need to do grocery shopping? Our trained shoppers will shop for you in the grocery store and deliver to your home at the exact same price as the stores. Want to eat at your favorite restaurant, but they don't deliver? We will pick up your food and deliver it in minutes. This is a new way of life. The very best of your city, delivered in minutes.

Ideal for FOODIES:
If you appreciate great food, you no longer have to order from the same 10 restaurants that offer fast delivery. Now, you can order from ANY restaurant in your city because we will order and deliver on your behalf.

Ideal for BUSY PEOPLE:
You no longer have to spend 3 hours going to the grocery store every two weeks. Save the trip to the grocery store for a very special occasion, or for when you are looking for that special cheese. Leave the rest to Rappi. Program an order. Save time and money.

Ideal for the GOOD LIFE:
With Rappi, everyone has a personal assistant that can do anything: from picking up medicine and bringing forgotten keys to paying invoices. When it comes to any errand you don't like to do, we are here to take care of you.

Ideal for YOU:
Rappi will change your life. Around the clock service, 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Ideal for urgent needs. Ideal for any craving. Ideal for a better life.

Version 3.0: Order two deliveries at the same time. Pay with credit, debit, or cash. FREE (yes, FREE) products and food every day, thanks to our partners.

The best of Mexico, Colombia, Brazil and Argentina delivered to your house in minutes.

comments: I can't even set up my account with my address because the app keeps changing it automatically. Unresponsive UI, buggy GPS tracking and lazy support that is probably going to reply this rating in spanish. Definitely I don't recommend it.

Very, VERY buggy. Every time y change the payment method the app freezes and when I try to recreate my order, it shows me a different total amount even though the payment method is the sameI had before... Really bad user experience.
Really buggy, won't even let me input my address. Reverses automatically to some random address the app detects. When goes to shopping the product images sometimes obscure the price tags.

These days, it seems, you can't even get passed the first screen to create a new account: the app gives you a socket timeout error all the time. What a waste of time. Edit: Fue una instalaci√≥n nueva de limpio, a√∫n no tengo cuenta.
For some reason it can't even recognize my address whereas I have no problems whatsover with the other two big competitors app. Well, your loss Rappi.

title: Albertsons Delivery & Pick Up
description:
Download the Albertsons Delivery & Pick Up App and get FREE Delivery on your 1st online order at Albertsons. Sign in with your existing Albertsons account or create a new account. Shop for groceries in the app and save time by choosing delivery or pick up.
 
Albertsons Delivery & Pick Up App is convenient, easy and will save you time with these features:
- Delivery - Choose a time when you want your groceries delivered to your doorstep
- Drive Up & Go (Pick Up) - Drive up to your Albertsons store, park, call and we'll bring your groceries to you
- Flexible delivery and pick up times ‚Äì groceries on your schedule
- Shop fast from your previous in-store and online purchases
- Make special requests to your Personal Shopper (e.g. pick green bananas)
- Save money with hundreds of clippable coupons
- Exclusive online savings ‚Äì easily find new weekly deals that matter most to you

Download the Albertsons Delivery & Pick Up App and get FREE Delivery on your 1st online order at Albertsons. Sign in with your existing Albertsons account or create a new account. Shop for groceries in the app and save time by choosing delivery or pick up.

summary: Order groceries any place, any time
recentChanges: Bug fixes and minor improvements
comments: There's a store five blocks away from me, but the app tells me that there is no store available. There are dedicated parking spaces for the service, and have been for several months now. Fix the problem with the app.

Local store announced the service in-store while I was shopping. Nearest store found by app is 17 miles away across a toll bridge. Not impressed. If it's not available in my local store, why announce it in that store? Or is the app not updated for where the service is offered?

My store offers pickup, yet the app tells me it isn't available. There needs to be an update for my area. Edited 2/12/2020: It now shows my store yet when I try to register I get an error and cannot continue. Please fix this!!!
Love it. Downside is people still park in the designated area. Staff is super polite and helpful.
Downloaded app because our store offers pick-up service but can't get past the registration screen. Gives me an error "UcaRegistration - Error Code 406"

title: Slice: Order delicious pizza from local pizzerias!
description:
From pepperoni to deep dish, find all the most delicious pizza at local restaurants in one place: Slice, the pizza app

With over 12,000 mom and pop pizza shops and counting, we give pizza lovers like you an amazing selection of local pizzerias. Not only do you get delicious food for pickup or delivery, you support small businesses and nearby pizzerias in your community.

Build your own delicious pizza.

You‚Äôre not picky, you just like your food how you like it. That‚Äôs why we made it easier to customize pizzas and other dishes, like mozzarella sticks and salads. Now you can add, say, mushrooms to one side of a pizza and extra cheese to another without searching the menu or leaving special instructions. 
 
Small mom and pops save, and so do pizza lovers.

Unlike other apps, we don‚Äôt charge local pizzerias insane commission and fees. They save with us, then pass it right back to you with exclusive pizza deals. Get them by turning on push notifications for promos and looking at the ‚ÄúDeals‚Äù section on every menu. Better yet, some shops surprise you with automatic savings at checkout. 

Reorder for pickup or delivery with one tap.

Found a pizza (or deal) you LOVE? Don‚Äôt search or build it again. Simple check your latest pizza orders and reorder in a tap. 

Hungry yet? We don‚Äôt blame you. Download Slice to order from a local pizzeria or restaurant. Remember: you can pick up food or have it delivered to your door. 

When you do, rate and review us below. It helps pizzerias and foodie near you. Happy eating!

summary: Get food for pickup or delivery at nearby shops on Slice, the local pizza app.
recentChanges: Easier ordering, delivered. This week, we fixed a few bugs. Update your app to enjoy the changes ‚Äî and order more pizza, of course.
comments: I really like this pizza app. It's very clean and simple to use. I like that I can see the whole menu on one page and it saves my information, even previous orders so I can order it again! Very well done! I also liked that I got an email when the order reached the kitchen. The only problem I saw was there were no drinks list. I don't know if it's the fault of the app or the specific restaurant.

Promo codes don't work as advertised. I was emailed a code good for $3 off a minimum purchase of $10.50+ AFTER discounts, but the code wouldn't work until my purchase was $13, so there goes the value of that coupon. App is not the most user friendly. Barely any restaurants on here. Grub hub is simpler and more reliable.

(Update 2/26/2020: Still loving this app). Love this app. I do wish more pizza shops would get on it. Love the coupons I get from the app and the contests they do. And I love how they don't over run me with junk emails. It's so easy to just open the app and pick which place we want to order from and have it only take a few clicks.

Not great, but gave it a go. Kept glitching and it wasnt seamless trying to get what you want done. Also, I used the app for the first time, which was supposed to include a $5 discount. That did not happen. Not entirely sure we'll be using this again, unfortunately. The annoyance wasn't worth it.

After several uses they start charging you covert fees without telling you. I used the app 3 times thinking that it was always free (there's no mention that it's not free), and on the 4th use a 50 cent fee showed up in the fine print right as I placed the order. Needless to say, I'm not too thrilled about their lack of pricing transparency and I'm removing the app permanently. @Slice Pizza Rep: The app description never mentions that you use a paid service model, which seems very deliberate.

title: Little Caesars
description: If you love pizza, you've come to the right app. AND WE DELIVER! Sorry, couldn‚Äôt wait to get that out. This is the app that can make you a pizza artist. Create your own masterpiece online and then get it delivered. Yes, we now deliver! I know, right?! Or use Pizza Portal¬Æ Pickup. Add your favorite toppings on the whole pizza‚Ä¶and maybe others on half. Want extra sauce, light sauce, no cheese? Sure! Why not?! Throw caution to the wind. Just use the custom pizza builder and choose OPTIONS. Create it. Buy it. Have it delivered. Google Pay? Fingerprint? Favorite store selection? It‚Äôs all there and MORE! And did I mention we now deliver? Hey, that‚Äôs Little Caesars 2020! Go! Download the app. Use it now to create your favorite pizza.

summary: Find a location near you & browse through our menu of delicious pizzas & sides
recentChanges: Thanks for using the Little Caesars app. To make your experience better each time, we bring updates to the Play Store regularly. This update includes the delivery option and a number of other enhancements based on your feedback.
comments: First time using this app. It was easy to download, sign up, and use on the first go. I had a hot and fresh pizza for my family within 30 minutes. I had no line to wait for. Went to the pick up portal when I got my push notification, scanned my phone and was in and out of the store within 60 seconds. Really appreciate having the option to order ahead and grab something quickly on the way home or to wait in store and decide. Great Job Little Caesars!

Super easy to use! I've used it 3 times in the last 2 weeks and I love it. I can order a specialty pizza and pick it when I get there instead of always getting the pepperoni pizza because it's convenient and quick. The pizza is always on time on the heat portal. I just put in the 3 digit code and get my hot pizzas. Love it! I'm so glad I started using it.

Pizza has always been great, its the app that sucks. I've been thinking that this app was broken for about 6 months now, because everytime i tried to place an order it would just say "Yikes! There was a problem" This whole time the problem was that the CC info was expired. The date had expired. Had it alerted me to that fact instead of just saying "Yikes!", They probably wouldnt missed out on a fair amount of pizza sales. Fix the stupid error codes to be more specific.

The app is fine and works as it is suppose to. I think a point system or something could improve the restaurant itself, but for the propose of this review and speaking of the app. Itself it is working and doing exactly what it was made for. You order your pizza and pay for it with your card on the app making it quick and painless. Why only 4 stars?? Its not perfect and could use some type of reward system for using the app.

Originally I rated the app 5 stars. It functions just fine, but it posts to your Facebook profile without notifying you. So thank you Little Caesars, all of my Facebook friends probably think I'm a weirdo for posting 8 Little Caesars ads in a row. Not to mention the other things in app permissions; including disabling your phone's autolock feature and controlling vibration settings. It's not worth it lol

title: InstaShop: Grocery delivery
description:
InstaShop is the easiest way to shop your groceries in just a few clicks straight from your mobile! Your order is delivered from a trusted local supermarket to your home or office in about 60 minutes depending on your location üöÄ

Choose your supermarket from a variety of stores, from small neighborhood supermarkets to large chains like Union Coop, Almaya, Zoom, Metro, Spar, Aswaaq, Spinneys and others.

No more stress, traffic or supermarket queues, we are here to make your life easier!

Check the app‚Äôs other services*:
üíä Pharmacy delivery
ü•© Butchery delivery
üê∂ Pet shop supplies
üíê Flower delivery
ü•ë Fresh produce market
üçè Organic products delivery
üíß House cleaning booking

InstaShop is available in the UAE, Bahrain, Egypt, Lebanon and Qatar.

developerAddress: Craigmuir Chambers, Road Town, Tortola, VG 1110, British Virgin Islands
recentChanges:
- New permission for contacts. You can invite your friends and win Instapoints
- New tab bar! Now you can check your account information, past orders and available discounts in one place!
- New permission for camera. Application needs this permission to support pharmacy orders that may require uploading documents such as prescriptions
- (Performance improvements & minor bug fixes. Bzzzzz.. Oh no, there‚Äôs one left... there always is)
comments: Terrible service. Works fine as long as you don't have any concerns. Their customer service takes forever to contact you back. And don't even let me get started on when items are unavaible. Service needs improvement and app needs an overhaul from someone that's actually used the app

The app is really inconvenient! First I thought it was a great idea but turns out your representatives aren't checking what is in stock and what is out of stock nor updating the prices (because when I went to a few markets to check the items the owners of the market told me that no one is passing from InstaShop to check product availability) And when I order usually 90% of my order asks for item replacement because they are out of stock. So either do your job properly or just close down the app
Love it great experience stuff are 100% accurate the only thing I get annoyed by is the out of stock state of some items and the limited network.
I was using this app for few months and now after reinstalling it says we dont deliver to this location. Tried on both devices. ?!?

Best app. Ever! Feeling tired going down and roaming around supermarket? Just download this app. Sit down and check whatever you need in superkarmet and take order. In just a minute you will receive what you need..

title: foodora - Local Food Delivery
description:
TAKE YOUR FIRST BITE OF FOODORA 

Craving something delicious? If there's one thing we know it‚Äôs food delivery. It‚Äôs our mission to bring tasty food from your favourite local restaurant right to your door so you can eat good food everyday. We'll go the extra mile to make your order the greatest food experience in the world. Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or the freshest sushi? We know the best food for every cuisine that your city has to offer. foodora is the best food delivery and take away service in your city -- so let's take the first bite!

Check we're in your city by downloading the app.

SO WHAT‚ÄôS THE DEAL?

You‚Äôre ready and waiting to eat, we‚Äôve all been there, dreaming of thai food, eating burgers in our dreams. Here‚Äôs what we do: first choose between delivery and Pick-Up to fit food ordering seamlessly into your schedule. Pick-Up is simple -- you make your order and then collect your food from the restaurant once it‚Äôs ready. No more queuing, ever (our app is magic). If you choose delivery, our couriers will bring the food you've been lusting after right to your door. Dreams really do come true.

HOW IT WORKS

First, enter your address (home/ office/ treehouse). Then, choose your favourite restaurant and place an order. They‚Äôll prepare your food and once it‚Äôs ready, our courier bring it to you. If you need something to watch, you can track your rider in real-time. Then you eat. Food goals.
 
WHAT MAKES US SPECIAL

foodora chooses your local favourites; the best food near you. Vietnamese or Italian, healthy salads or food to nurse your hangover -- your dinner will be cooked with love and care. Our riders come to your very doorstep with a smile while you save time to do something else you love. There's a cuisine and a dish to suit every moment, and we'll help you make the first bite last.

ANYTHING ELSE? 

Of course your safety is important to us. We guarantee secure, simple mobile payment, so you can eat when you're hungry and pay however you like.

TALK TO US

If you‚Äôve ordered with us before, we‚Äôd want to know what you think. Give us your food thoughts/ teenage confessionals. Let us be your notepad.
Email us at support@foodora.com

For further info, visit
www.foodora.com

recentChanges:
We're always working hard to optimize our app with the latest technologies and best new features. This version includes a number of UI/UX improvements as well as stability enhancements.
Enjoy!
comments: Great options, but it would be nice if restaurants that were closed were just not available... Takes my girlfriend long enough to make a decision, just spent 15 minutes only to get a notification that the restaurant is temporarily closed. No timeline, no explanation...

It's really a hit or miss with this app based service. Is it not possible to build a feature in the app which indicates high demand in an area, which might possibly lead to a bit of a delay? It's not fair to a paying customer when they spend time picking a restaurant with a quick ETA of 25 mins and immediately after placing the order, it changes to 65 mins. Plus, you don't even realize your order hasn't been confirmed by the restaurant due to no driver until you contact customer service

Great service overall. Provides many methods of payment, a progress tracker and the ability to include tips in the bill. There is also a way to browse restaurants by type and frequent promotions. Foodora accepts payment via PayPal.
Super easy. Need a bigger choice of local restaurants though. Also menus in English as well as Norwegian would be great
Easy to use. Excellent UI. Prompt customer service in case of issues. I prefer this over Uber eats or its other competitors on any day.

title: SkipTheDishes - Food Delivery
description:
Food delivery when you want ‚Äî whatever you‚Äôre in the mood for. With SkipTheDishes, you can get food delivered starting as early as 6am, and as late as 2am to satisfy your late-night cravings. Download the SkipTheDishes app and start ordering food delivery today. 

Free Delivery 
Sort restaurants by Delivery Fee to see nearby options that offer $0 delivery. 

Track Your Food
Get real-time order updates and live GPS order tracking, so you know exactly where your food is at all times. You can also get order updates via text.

Easy Payment
Pay quickly when you save your debit or credit card in the app. You can even pay with cash at the door.

Variety
You‚Äôll discover new restaurants every day, and have your choice from a wide range of world cuisines. Craving Chinese, Italian, Indian, or Mexican? From healthy to hearty, pizza to pad thai, fish and chips to falafel, burgers to burritos, and salad to sandwiches ‚Äì we‚Äôve got food for every mood and occasion.

Save Addresses
Save multiple address in your account and have food quickly delivered to your home, office, dorm, friend‚Äôs place, and more.

Re-order
Want to enjoy your favourite dish over and over again? Re-order your favourites in a flash in your order history.

Restaurants
Order from hundreds of local restaurants that deliver near you or pick from popular favourites, like McDonald's, Tim Hortons, Pizza Pizza, Harvey‚Äôs, KFC, Boston Pizza, Wendy‚Äôs, Booster Juice, Mr.Sub, Burger King, Papa John‚Äôs Pizza, and much more.

Stay In The Know 
When creating your account, subscribe to our emails to score exclusive discounts.

Share Your Experience
Good food calls for good feedback. Easily review restaurants and couriers with only a few taps.

We‚Äôre Here For You
Have questions? Our support team is ready to help. Live chat is easily available within the app.

About SkipTheDishes
At SkipTheDishes, we know you deserve great delivery. Our world-class, unparalleled technology powers millions of orders every month to bring hungry Canadians the food they want, delivered. Skip is Canada's leading and largest food delivery network, with tens of thousands of restaurants coast-to-coast in hundreds of communities across Canada. Our headquarters are in the heart of the continent in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

SkipTheDishes is proudly part of Just Eat, a leading global marketplace for online food delivery headquartered in the UK.

Want to learn more? Visit SkipTheDishes.com

summary: You Deserve Great Delivery
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: The app works great. Very handy for finding new places to order out from. I appreciate that it accepts Google Pay as a payment method. My only complaint is that it's missing the obvious feature of letting you favorite restaurants for faster navigation. As for the service itself, I have nothing but postives. The drivers are competent, timely and pleasant. It makes things easy and convenient especially for cryptids like myself. I recommend this entirely.

The app should have a better procedure for refunds, instead of just giving skip credits immediately. It should be my choice. The app should have a little better detailed filters. With the ability to choose multiple filters. App should be able to have sorting options as well, ex. By rating, by closeness, by delivery charge, by coupons, etc. Great app in general, but needs some improvement.

I would say this app is great for convenience, but other than that, you deal with more problems ordering through them, then taking some time to go get it or cook. Even when trying to express problems to the customer service, it seems as though theres no real care for your satisfaction. I have had many issues, and actually lost a good chunk of cash, even when expressed skip did very little to rectify the situation.

Recently the app seems to have been changed, where you now have to enter the buzzer code and apt no every time you make an order. It is simpler to set it up once only. Otherwise, good app, easy to order, and see where your order is. The help desk is very responsive and helpful. Please ask all restaurants to label if dishes contain dairy.

App is easy to use. The selection of food / restaurants is good, not exceptional but still worth a look. I have used this app five times now and am very happy with it. When in final stages of ordering there is a choice of the percentage for the tip but there is the option to enter an amount. Skip The Dishes says the drivers get the total amount of the tip; very good of them to make sure the drivers are fairly paid.

title: KOL - Alcohol delivery
description:
Kol provides a selective range of wines & spirits ready for delivery direct to the customer‚Äôs doorstep in less than 30 minutes, day and night, at tasting temperature. 
Our company is technology driven: the interaction between Kol and its customers is achieved through a user friendly IOS application, Android and e-commerce website, with a fully automated delivery process. Note that all payments are automated (no cash accepted).

Kol‚Äôs aim is to shake-up the alcohol distribution market by establishing a new way of selling and delivering wines & spirits in a sector which lacks imagination, service efficiency and price effectiveness. Kol acts as a new distribution channel by interacting directly between alcohol producers and consumers. Kol offers 6 to 8 brands for each category (each brand within a different price range) and changes these brands on a weekly basis.

Kol is available in Paris and London, we are expanding quickly, please register your email address on our website www.kol-app.com and we will let you know as soon as we come to your area!
 
NB: GPS usage may affect battery consumption.
* Please drink responsibly. Kol can only sell and deliver alcoholic beverages to persons aged 18 or over. Kol operates the Challenge 25 age verification policy.
