comments: So far so good. Just placed my first order. They had a marginally better selection than I thought they would, although still not great. One request, please fix how you enter your DOB on Android. I had to press back 1 month at a time from December 2019 to 1982. It was annoying.
Wont let me sign up and wont let me put in my address correctly keeps going to a address thats not where i am. And wont let me check out with out a location.
Wine for when the spirits start circling. Amazing service.
Yeah. Not a scam. Sorry... I was annoyed. It's not worth engaging with. Don't think they have the back end biz developed yet and their prices reflect that. Sorry guys.
should inform clearly where it operates

title: DoorDash - Driver
description:
Earn extra money as a delivery driver with the DoorDash Driver app. You‚Äôll have the flexibility and freedom to drive when you want, where you want.

BE YOUR OWN BOSS
Sign up to become a driver and choose your own hours. You can dash near your home or in a city you‚Äôre just visiting. Driver jobs are a great alternative to an hourly, seasonal, or full-time gigs. 

HOW IT WORKS
Millions of people order food through DoorDash. When customers place an order, our app offers the deliveries to drivers (aka Dashers), who earn money by picking up and delivering them. 

To start earning money, all you need is a smartphone and a mode of transportation, such as a car, bike, scooter, or motorcycle. We‚Äôll take care of everything else! 

BECOME A DELIVERY DRIVER
Our signup process takes just a few minutes. After signing up, it‚Äôll take 1-2 weeks to get your account fully activated. 


DoorDash is available in over 4,000 cities in all 50 U.S. states, including Washington, D.C. and Puerto Rico; over 80 cities in Canada; and Melbourne, Australia, with more coming soon. 

Find out if we‚Äôre in your area or learn more here: doordash.com/dasher/signup

recentChanges: - Minor fixes and stability improvements
comments: I really like the app and working for Doordash. It's a great summer job, but there are a lot of glitches that make the app frustrating to use. One example is location services are slow to update. I could be sitting in the customer's driveway, but the app will tell me I'm not close enough. Also, the app will sometimes give me a delivery that's 15 mins. away, but only give me 10 mins. in which to pick it up.

It won't let me log into my account. I know the password is correct because I tried it online on the Doordash Dasher site just now. I've uninstalled and reinstalled it and restarted my phone as well. Not sure what's going on with the app. Updated 3/17: I still can't log into the app on my phone. I'm starting to think the app isn't compatible for the Samsung Galaxy S9. I've emil Dasher support. I'm currently waiting for a response.

The app seems to be running much better than it has in the past with minor issues and so i'm giving it a higher rating. If i'm using the map for directions then i'm also recieving texts that says i've missed a run for not responding. There needs to be a sound notification like the other driving apps that lets me know what's going on in the background.the map is often wrong so i have to use a secondary source for accuracy. The pay rate needs to be much higher. My decline rate is all your fault.

Was working fine until my phone had an update on Saturday. I've downloaded and re downloaded the app and it's still not working. It acts like it will after I log in but then just goes back to the login page. I have the samsung galaxy s9 and now I cannot log in. I have spoken with customer service and they are still researching this issue 24 hours later. I need to be on and driving to make an income. Please look into this soon and send a fix!

Have not been able to log into my account for a little over a week now. Every time I try to log in, it directs me right back to the login screen. I did every troubleshooting method I could regarding this matter and when I called support they just told me to do everything I had already done. I enjoy working through Doordash and would like to continue. I hope this issue can be resolved.

title: 1800Flowers: Same-Day Flowers & Gifts Delivery
description:
1-800-Flowers: Send Flowers, Bouquets, & Gifts 

Fresh flower delivery is easy with the 1-800-Flowers app. Send flowers, plants and gifts anywhere or anytime while on the go in just a few easy clicks. From gorgeous flower arrangements to the perfect anniversary roses and centerpieces, gourmet cookies, chocolate covered strawberries, and many other gifts, there is something for everyone. Whether sending flowers in the United States or around the world, we deliver gifts and smiles to 195 countries! 

- 100% Smile Guarantee: Blooms are the best quality and always arrive fresh. 

- Flower types: We offer roses, carnations, tulips, sunflowers, orchids, lilies, daisies, and many more. 

- Quick & Secure Flower Delivery: Experience streamlined browsing and a secure checkout. 

- With same day flower delivery, you will never miss another important occasion! 

We cover all gifting occasions including, but not limited to: 

¬∑ Birthday: No matter their age, birthday flowers are sure to brighten their day! Send timeless birthday flower arrangements from our most popular floral designs or even one of our truly unique arrangements to make their day even more special.

¬∑ Love and Romance: Whether your sweetie lives with you or across the world, send romantic flowers to shower them with love. 

¬∑ Sympathy: Convey your deepest condolences during a difficult time by using our ‚ÄúWhite Glove‚Äù service to send funeral flowers or sympathy gifts to the home. 

¬∑ Special Occasions: We offer gifts including but not limited to: Christmas, New Years, Hanukkah, Thanksgiving, Easter, Valentine‚Äôs Day, Mother‚Äôs Day, Father‚Äôs Day and many other important occasions. 

¬∑ Congratulations: Whether you‚Äôre celebrating graduation, a new job, promotion, first home or retirement, our fresh flowers and gifts are the perfect way to say, ‚Äúyou did it!‚Äù 

¬∑ Just Because: Sometimes you don‚Äôt need a reason to send a smile, send one just because they‚Äôre awesome. Our same day, ‚Äújust because‚Äù flowers and gifts are sure to brighten anyone‚Äôs day! 
¬∑ Thank You: When words are just not enough, show your appreciation and gratitude with a beautiful bouquet they will never forget. 

¬∑ Wedding Flowers: Wedding flowers are easy to order online. Get ready for your special day with our breathtaking bridal bouquets, centerpieces, corsages and boutonnieres. 

So, whether you are saying, ‚ÄúHappy Birthday,‚Äù ‚ÄúCongratulations,‚Äù ‚ÄúI Love You,‚Äù ‚ÄúHappy Valentine‚Äôs Day‚Äù or anything else in between, we have an arrangement that is perfect for you! Send flowers to that someone special today! Every flower delivery includes our 100% smile guarantee! Our caring service team is ready to help you with your order and welcomes your feedback! 

** Meet Our Family of Gift Brands: Harry and David, Cheryl‚Äôs Cookies, Fruit Bouquets by 1800Flowers, 1800Baskets, The Popcorn Factory, Wolferman‚Äôs, Stockyards, Simply Chocolate, Personalization Universe & Goodsey**

comments: App seems easy to use overall, but it tells me my credit card is expired even though the exp date is not until November this year.

Prior to the launch of the Feb 6th update, this app was great on my phone and I used it more than I thought I would. However now, the 1800flowers app keeps crashing and closing down before it even fully loads, within 20 seconds of opening the app. I did not have this issue prior to the most recent update launch. After the launch the first few times this happened, I checked the Google play store and saw there was an update, completed that, and still it crashes/closes down. What is going on? Help

At first the app didn't want to work. Then, when after a fresh install I purchased some flowers, only to be confronted with hidden fees that I thought was an error in reporting the bill. All in all, dishonest company with a clunky, ill-conceived app.
Cant use crashes upon opening still cant use ! I uninstalled an re tried , still crashing
After the latest update, it crashes every time I start it.

Why Desi Meals?

Indian food, infused with spices and delicate flavours, made with the right ingredients, delights not just your taste buds but also satiates your desire for something more.
We wondered, why all the major food chains are from outside India? Why not an authentic Indian-origin brand which champions Indian-food ordering the way it should be? We set out on a journey to fill that void - Making ‚Äòbetter‚Äô Indian food available for all. Anywhere. Anytime. A 'Made in India' brand for Irresistible Desi Meals.

‚ö¨ Corporate Discount - Get 25% OFF on your office lunches every single time when you order food online from BOX8‚Äôs corporate offer section. Just select/register your office address and we‚Äôll take care of your food delivery! Turn your Weekday Blues to Happy Reds ;) (Visit Box8/Corporate)

comments: I have a problem.üòî I bought a new phone, without changing the sims. And when I logged in to my account after reinstalling Box 8 on my new phone, my 20 orders 180 days Box 8 pass for 25% off has vanished. Please try to fix that. It was valid till May, I clearly remember. And I didn't order 20 times, hardly 3-5.

Over Priced !! Everything here is over priced, and the Box8 Pass is an absolute joke. They just double charge you and then give you a 10% discount and share it as they are doing a big favour. Which is completly unfair, where apps like Swiggy & Zomato are playing a fair game. With this review, i am uninstalling the app. Adios Box8. A disheartned Box8 Pass Customer.

It used to be great, but the recent update completely crashed the tracking screen. Now, I don't have an option to call the delivery person, and neither does the tracking option work. I can't see the live position of the delivery person. The only way I know my delivery is out for order is via a notification, with no further information about the ETA from the app. Do fix this.

No proper tracking, No chat and mail support(options added in application as dummy), once you order food for lunch, delivery person will travel around the world and reach you for dinner. Once you ordered you can't cancel because delivery person is on the way ,on the way , on the way ,on the way...... Worst application and worst food delivery network. Order today receive tomorrow -Tagline for Box 8.

Food ordering should be hassle free, this is opposite, the app does not work most times, else there is some problem or other. The prices for the most ordered food also is manipulated. Have seen prices rise by over 35% in last 4 months. Avoid this app.

title: Zippykind Delivery Driver
description:
The delivery company you drive for must have an account with Zippykind before you can use this app.

Zippykind is the easiest way for drivers to manage their deliveries and get to where they need to be.  Sort your delivery tickets based on time of delivery or by route.  Add notes, photos and digital signatures to delivery tickets to build a good chain of custody throughout the delivery process.  Drivers can update dispatch operators and customers through autonomous SMS text messaging and email notifications during each step in the delivery process, including but not limited to: driver accepted ticket, driver started, driver arrived, driver completed delivery and driver failed delivery.  

All of the activity through the driver‚Äôs app is managed through an intelligent backend dispatch software that is available to your delivery companies staff who can view analytics, track drivers and deliveries through a dashboard map and so much more.

title: Lalamove - Express & Reliable Courier Delivery App
description:
Call van, truck or motorcycle and deliver anything real time in 55 minutes, 24/7!

Our delivery app lets you call and hire a van, truck or motorcycle from the palm of your hand! You can rely on our affordable delivery platform for express courier and delivery services, bulky deliveries, food items & more. 
Download Lalamove now!

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Featured by Google as App of the Week!
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Lalamove is all about enabling you to deliver anything, fast. We match you with 2 million drivers that we've screened and trained so that you can relax in knowing your goods are in safe hands.

Lalamove is:
‚úì Fast
‚úì Secure
‚úì On-demand

The Lalamove delivery app isn't just about same day delivery. You can request exact pick up and delivery times and our driver will be there, just like that. Enable proof of delivery and sign off packages to ensure a smooth, secure delivery.

Lalamove delivery app features:

- eWallet - your option to deliver conveniently, go cashless!
- Proof of Delivery - eSignatures will give you peace of mind
- Online Payments - top-up your wallet online, credit cards and bank transfers available
- Instant driver matching - the nearest available drivers will receive your order first, within seconds
- Real-time package tracking - know where your goods are at all times
- Vehicles fleet variety - vans, trucks, lorries, motorcycles, we have vehicles for every situation
- Additional service - help to buy, cash on delivery, hourly rental, house moving assistance & more

Common deliveries our customers make:

‚òÜ food
‚òÜ furniture
‚òÜ bulky items
‚òÜ parcels
‚òÜ construction materials
‚òÜ over-sized goods

Lalamove is used by millions of users across Greater China, Southeast Asia, India and Latin America with 2 million professional drivers across the regions.

3 Easy Steps to Place an Order
1. Plan your route - supports multiple locations
2. Choose your service options and enter any promocodes that you have for discounts
3. Confirm your details - your driver is on the way!

Download Lalamove now for access to our 24/7 instant delivery service! Just Lalamove it!

Lalamove Contact Email: info@lalamove.com

Lalamove Website: https://lalamove.com/

Deliveries placed via computer also available.

comments: Very good app. Bought my 1st purchase ( buy4u) yesterday. Although i wish the rm 100 cap could be increased a little bit. Maybe for the buy4u insurance you could implement to be paid 1st by the customer. Just a suggestion

First time using the app and I can say that I will patrionizing this one. Fast delivery and very accomodating drivers. However, it'll be awesome if we can chat the drivers inside the app instead of using regular load.
Reliable and most helpful among all apps out there. I am really and very much satisfied with your service

Useful app but drivers are taking advantage of app users. Like this one time, a ream of cups would definitely exceed the box but the rider charged 40 pesos because it exceeded the size of the box. My staff could have just split the quantity of the cups so it would not exceed the box. I don't even see a rule in your app that you have to pay extra for that. If you report something like this through email support, you will get no action too.

Not good. Always having a delivery problem status. Manila and Caloocan areas have 2 similar area of choice with no proper distinction. Cannot book the delivery without the AREA selection first then followed by the home address. Kindly, update your GPS. The GPS of Grab and Angkas are much better than yours. Why not derived your GPS from the ones they have or use.

title: Albertsons Delivery & Pick Up
description:
Download the Albertsons Delivery & Pick Up App and get FREE Delivery on your 1st online order at Albertsons. Sign in with your existing Albertsons account or create a new account. Shop for groceries in the app and save time by choosing delivery or pick up.
 
Albertsons Delivery & Pick Up App is convenient, easy and will save you time with these features:
- Delivery - Choose a time when you want your groceries delivered to your doorstep
- Drive Up & Go (Pick Up) - Drive up to your Albertsons store, park, call and we'll bring your groceries to you
- Flexible delivery and pick up times ‚Äì groceries on your schedule
- Shop fast from your previous in-store and online purchases
- Make special requests to your Personal Shopper (e.g. pick green bananas)
- Save money with hundreds of clippable coupons
- Exclusive online savings ‚Äì easily find new weekly deals that matter most to you

comments: There's a store five blocks away from me, but the app tells me that there is no store available. There are dedicated parking spaces for the service, and have been for several months now. Fix the problem with the app.

Local store announced the service in-store while I was shopping. Nearest store found by app is 17 miles away across a toll bridge. Not impressed. If it's not available in my local store, why announce it in that store? Or is the app not updated for where the service is offered?

My store offers pickup, yet the app tells me it isn't available. There needs to be an update for my area. Edited 2/12/2020: It now shows my store yet when I try to register I get an error and cannot continue. Please fix this!!!
Love it. Downside is people still park in the designated area. Staff is super polite and helpful.
Downloaded app because our store offers pick-up service but can't get past the registration screen. Gives me an error "UcaRegistration - Error Code 406"

comments: the app sucks. it wont keep me logged in, every time i try to put in my adress it tells me its wrong, even when its not. i have such a hassal trying to even see if any food is open and it never is at all hours of the day. i would love if i could just open the app without having to input all of my info every time. This app is not user friendly.
I finally got it to save my address after the literal 10th attempt, and only after trying it on a different device.

everything was great. The food was delivered in a short amount of time, it was cooked well, and most importantly, it was hot. The map with the driver en route wasnt working, but overall very pleased and will use again.

Easily the worst of these apps. Bad integration with your phone and the world. You can tell immediately they've spent less time, effort and money developing this app than the other guys. Consistently terrible experience.

I've tried this service multiple times, and they've continued to be inaccurate with their estimates by over an hour. When I've contacted them, they have continued to lie about when things will arrive. Tonight their estimate said 60 minutes. 2.5 hours later, they still haven't been able to get ahold of the driver. Do not use them. Terrible.

title: Carriage - Food Delivery
description:
Carriage - A leading app in online food ordering and delivery in the Middle East.



Tap to order online your favorite food through Carriage‚Äôs app from more than 2000
different restaurants along with a wide variety of cuisines and enjoy your delicious meal.


Carriage offers the fastest food delivery service in the Middle East with estimated
average delivery time of 25 minutes with GPS live tracking that allow you to view your order while being delivery to your premises.

We don‚Äôt just offer food delivery service, Carriage also provide on demand delivery service to Flower shops, Groceries, Electronics & Games, Pharmacies, Pet Supplies, Health Supplement, Optics, Cosmetics & Perfumes and Baby Supplies.

Whether you like Pizza, Burgers, Japanese, Italian, Chinese, Indian, Kuwaiti,
Iranian, Lebanese, Healthy, Mexican or any other of your favorite cuisines, simply download Carriage‚Äôs app on your mobile or tablet with no extra charge, create your personal account by entering your details and address(es) and get ready for the fastest and easiest online food ordering & delivery in the region.



By downloading the app, you will be able to order from your favorite restaurants such as Hardees, KFC, Subway, Slice, Zero Carb, Rock House Slider, Proper Burger, Melenzane, Solo Pizza and many other restaurants.



Available across:

comments: I used to like Carriage over any other food delivery app. But I can't fathom why in today's fast paced world i can't pre-order things on Carriage!!!!!! That should be something easy you can offer your clients! It is a simple algorithm which is used in many other apps. The only option your customer care agent was able to offer me, was cancel my order which was a royal waste of my time .

I would advise all the people I know to not use this app since the latest updates and they merged with talabat they do not give refunds especially when they are in the wrong. It's a fraudulent practice. If I could zero stars I would but cannot
If you have any issue you can only communicate through chat which takes hours... they never resolve anything... and I have never received my promised refund, dont download this app is horrendous.

After the update I lost all my previous orders and I can't find my favorite restaurant and after talking to the help they gave me a link of the restaurants but after I ordered I can't see my order in the app so I can't track it or check if it was accepted , the chat help was with no help to me they said they will take my inquiries to tech support !!!
Before the update the best feature Carriage had was that it wasn't Talabat, now it just looks bad, bad UI, every since the new management - they really should learn from the original Carriage.

title: Deliveries ‚Äì Route Planner for Delivery Driver
description:
This is a route planner for employees of courier companies.
Organizes workday for maximum productivity and effective time management.

The Deliveries app will reorder your delivery list into the most efficient route based on time windows and distances between way points.
Displays the current day delivery route.
Calculates the arrival time.

The Deliveries app is an automated dispatcher/router to solve your logistic tasks.
descriptionHTML:

Organizes workday for maximum productivity and effective time management.

summary: Helps to build a route for delivery staff
comments: I liked it more than other highly rated apps ... But one suggestion .. we don't do new locations every day, so if previously visited address can be "suggested" faster while writing the address it will help a lot ... Otherwise loved it..
Clear easy to use layout. Issues: Can not manually set route, no return to start address and why do you 'have' to add a phone number when adding a client?... Going in the right direction thou ;)
Great for a simple route planner.
Its awesome app, but need the option to delete a delivery..
Keeps crashing ... totally useless!

title: Dolly: Find Movers, Delivery & More On-Demand
description:
Dolly brings you moving and delivery help on your schedule, even same-day. Get help with furniture delivery, large item moving, labor needs, and more from our vetted, independent pickup truck owners. With over one million items moved, Dolly is one of the most trusted names in moving and delivery.

Dolly is a fast, easy, and affordable way to get help with your house or apartment move, to pick up that Craigslist find, or get stuff delivered from stores like Lowe‚Äôs, Costco, and Big Lots.

You can use Dolly to find local moving and delivery help across the U.S. in the following areas: Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Boston, Brooklyn NY, Charlotte, Chicago, Cincinnati, Cleveland, Columbus, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, Fort Lauderdale, Hartford, Houston, Los Angeles, Miami, Milwaukee, Minneapolis, Nashville, New Haven, Orange County, Orlando, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Portland, Queens NY, Raleigh-Durham, San Antonio, San Diego, San Francisco, San Jose, Tampa, and Washington, DC with more coming soon!


HOW IT WORKS:
1. Enter Your Details - Tell us when, where, and what you need help with.
2. Get Your Price - Select one or two Helpers and get an instant, guaranteed price.
3. Book Your Dolly - Get connected to and scheduled with a Helper in minutes.
4. Track and Communicate - contact your Helper in real-time.
 
SERVICES:
‚Ä¢ Retail Store Delivery: Easier, faster, and cheaper than traditional store delivery options, without the 4-hour delivery windows.
‚Ä¢ Small Apartment Moves: For the DIY mover that needs help moving large items like beds, dressers, tables, couches, and more.
‚Ä¢ Craigslist & OfferUp Pick-ups: Don‚Äôt let public transit or a small car keep you from that sweet Craigslist deal.
‚Ä¢ Small Business Moves: Office move? Find help to get settled in fast.
‚Ä¢ Junk Removal: Find a local Helper who will remove and haul away your junk. Includes trash removal and responsible disposal.
‚Ä¢ Donation Drop-off: Pile of stuff collecting dust? Helpers can also do donation runs.

WHY DOLLY:
‚Ä¢ Easy - Dolly is quick, you can book in minutes. Never rent a truck from U-Haul or Home Depot again.
‚Ä¢ Affordable - Use the Dolly app today and get a guaranteed price upfront before you book‚Äîno surprises!
‚Ä¢ Convenient - On your schedule, Book for today, or next month - it‚Äôs up to you!
‚Ä¢ Safe - All Dolly Helpers are independent contractors who are background checked, reviewed, and backed by a commercial insurance policy.

Helpers can also assist with many of your house projects that require an additional set of hands. Don‚Äôt bother your family, friends, or neighbors‚Äîjust book a Dolly and we‚Äôll connect you with a Helper who can take care of furniture relocation and removal, loading and unloading a moving truck, appliance moves, or anything that two people could reasonably move.

There are over 5,000 Helpers who are ready to help you with your apartment move, Costco delivery, furniture delivery, furniture donation, dump run, junk removal, storage unit move, mattress removal, office move, and everything in between.

Additional ways we can help you today:
Office moving, house moving, move to storage, junk pick up, local moving services, retail store delivery, furniture pickup, same day delivery, moving help, heavy lifting, delivery app, moving projects, Uber for moving, hired help, hauling, delivery by truck, on demand moving.
Download Dolly now for all the moving and delivery help you need. https://dolly.com/
 
We‚Äôre obsessed with customer service and delighting our customers. Don‚Äôt take our word for it...read the reviews below.
 
Need help or have a question?
Contact us: support@dolly.com
Tweet us: @dolly_support

comments: Love the app, it made it easier to communicate with movers and keep track of your move/delivery

Was able to schedule a mover and a truck to retrieve a couch I got on Craigslist with only a day's notice for a reasonable price. Our helper was prompt and very resourceful in getting the couch through some narrow areas. Will definitely use again and recommend to others.

Hands down the most affordable efficient way I could have found to move a fridge from one place to the other. Punctual professional and efficient. I will use them anytime I need to move anything anywhere.
Today was the1st time I used this app. Placed a last minute request at 4pm for a 7pm pickup. And it was met with an excellent helper, transport and service. I would recomend this app 100%
Very useful service! Easy to use and a lot less than what others charge. Would definately use again!

title: Sysco Delivery
description:
Sysco Delivery puts the power of real-time delivery tracking at your fingertips.

As a Sysco customer, you can view a map of your truck‚Äôs location, your estimated delivery window, and an overview of your inbound items all in one place.

Receive reliable, real-time status updates for your delivery, and access online invoices and recent order history for easy record-keeping.

Log in using your eSysco.net, Sysco Mobile, or Sysco Market Express password, and start tracking today!
descriptionHTML:
Sysco Delivery puts the power of real-time delivery tracking at your fingertips.

As a Sysco customer, you can view a map of your truck‚Äôs location, your estimated delivery window, and an overview of your inbound items all in one place.

summary: Track Your Sysco Deliveries
developerAddress:
Sysco Corporation
1390 Enclave Parkway
Houston, TX, 77077-2099
recentChanges:
- Stay logged in after installing new updates
- Get notified about new app updates
- Bug fixes and improvements
comments: The app doesn't always update the delivery status in real time. Sometimes it will say the delivery is headed my way then immediately after I will get a notification that it has already arrived.
Really helpful to alert the people who accept the order. Especially outside of the normally expected arrival time.
It is awesome to know when your delivery may arrive at your location, and even better that you receive a notification when they are on their way. Helps me plan my day around my delivery a lot better.
Great way to know when deliveries should arrive and what was ordered with multiple locations.

It's probably the worst ordering app I've ever used. The wording needed to search most products is ridiculous. I have to actually type in specific items, spelt 100% correct or nothing comes back. Sometimes 8m actually too specific for the app... It really needs a predictive text option or some sort of thing like Google has... "Did you mean....". Also, it really sucks that I can't order small amounts of items in my orders .. I'm made to over order on many products.

title: Foodtec Delivery IQ
description:
FoodTec Delivery IQ ‚Äì The first POS-integrated Delivery Optimization App.

 
 

Delivery IQ provides control to managers, efficiency to drivers, and transparency to customers. Now you can truly optimize delivery performance!

 

GPS/location and order status data from the driver app connect the customer, restaurant and driver. Managers, kitchen staff and expeditors now have real-time information that empowers them to make better decisions on timing and order bundling.

 

The simple-to-use Driver App features:

 

‚Ä¢  Signature Capture on Credit Card Voucher

‚Ä¢  Coupon Scanning at the door

‚Ä¢  Order assignment by driver or expeditor

‚Ä¢  Late-status warnings

‚Ä¢  GPS Tracking

‚Ä¢  Map and List Views of Orders

‚Ä¢  Route completion status

‚Ä¢  Driver performance stats

‚Ä¢  Easy tip addition

comments: Multiple issues, cant report technical issues because it says the email isnt in correct format. Also the app asks me if I'm in the right location literally every delivery, even though i am at the location and the app shows me at the location. Also went into dark mode without me telling it to and can't read phone numbers in dark mode. I use a samsung galaxy 10. Please fix the various issues
It gets jam..constantly ,specially when you tap $$.,,or,save. After it jams ,person can't sing for credits ..or and worst.yet..won't display percentages for tips..awful..app.
Works for the most part but since the most recent update takes forever to load the signature page.
App is functional currently. There is now a lag between selecting the tip and the sign screen that wasnt there before.

It works for the most part. I've only had two real problems with the app. First, every time I get to an address, the app says I'm not there and I have to touch the "Map error. I'm at location" button. Second, I wish there was a way to check your stats when you're not clocked in.

recentChanges: We don't have a magic lamp or a Genie, but we have our engineers! In this release, we've removed bugs and included enhancements to improve your experience across the app.
comments: Are you kidding me? It can't locate me, and when I tried contacting you for assistance, the whole app crashed. I had high expectations from people for your app, but all I've seen so far is disappointment... I'm sorry if this seems too harsh, but considering the current condition, I feel you should improve on it to ease things...

It told me i have a limited number of times to put in the pin sent to my mobile number but after 3 times it still didn't send it to me ( i checked my mobile number) and afterwards it told me i had to wait 1 whole day to put it in again for "security reasons". Never using this app again

This is a review of the app, not the goods or delivery service. It's awfully slow, e.g. when scrolling. Worse, it often says, "Hmm, something went wrong. Please try again later." It happens so often that the search function effectively doesn't exist, so you have to scroll through hundreds of randomly ordered items only to find out that they don't have what you want, e.g. a packet of salt.

This app has been installed on my phone for months now but I've never been able to use it because it always says that the service isn't available in my location. I have tried different locations and it always shows just the same for grocery and food. Pls fix this. My phone model is Samsung Galaxy S10e.

Was working a few months ago for at least a year... Now they disincluded my location without an advance notice... When i tried refreshing it, it still would not work. No matter what account or phone number i put in. Fyi I'm in marikina heights. The closest markets near me are puregold, parco, and welcome and it still won't show...

title: Roadie Sender
description:
Earn Cash for Driving
Earn more money per trip with Roadie. Drivers earn up to $60 on local Gigs, and up to $650 on long haul deliveries. From side hustle to full-time and everything in between, Roadie is the most flexible way to earn money in the Gig economy. Whether you drive across town or across the country, Roadie is an easy, flexible way to make money driving.


‚Ä¢ Choose deliveries that fit your schedule
‚Ä¢ See pickup and dropoff details before you offer
‚Ä¢ Deliver packages not people
‚Ä¢ Enjoy direct deposit into your bank account
‚Ä¢ Get live customer support from real humans


Got Something to Send? Roadie Delivers!
From cupcakes to couches, Roadie is a faster, cheaper, easier way to send urgent or oversized items. Forget something last minute? Don‚Äôt have enough space to bring home that new TV? Visit www.roadie.com and send something today!


‚Ä¢ Save time on errands
‚Ä¢ Get it there faster
‚Ä¢ Send oversized items for less
‚Ä¢ Get personalized pick-up and delivery
‚Ä¢ Get peace of mind with $500 coverage on every Gig

summary: Roadie connects people with stuff to send with drivers already going that way.
recentChanges: Driver payouts now display cents for Gigs that pay more than even dollar amounts.
comments: Neat app. There are tons of bugs, one main issue is the tolls, you have to submit a copy of the tolls in order to get reimbursed for them, which is a huge pain, and to add to this issue, you are supposed to submit the receipt of the tolls upon completion of the gig. Another issue is customer service is hit or miss as to whether you will actually get someone when you call, or it will say, sorry no one is available to help you right now. -edit* downloaded the beta app, it looks promising

Changes have been made but not for the better in my opinion. The app and its logic are lacking in several ways. I receive notifications of gigs very sporadically the last week or two. Unless I'm by the airport or pharmacy/hub physically, I'm not getting gigs anymore either Maybe because they hired tons of new drivers for Walmart? Sad.

First time I've used the app and for whatever reason my gig was canceled and I was charged $10! On top of that I ended up having to drive to the airport to pick up my bag. The app was difficult to navigate and the cancelling of my gig made no sense!!

I signed up but haven't ran any gigs yet. This app doesn't seem to be real popular in Texas yet especially here in Houston since only the two airports use them. And they are located on total opposite sides of the city north and south. I have to drive 25 miles to 1 or 15 miles to the other forget that don't seem to pay very well for the distance you have to deliver. I didn't found for me driving 20 to 35 miles across a major metropolitan area for twenty bucks NAHH

I've done 2 trips with Delta. I've had no problems so far. DELTA in Des Moines IA are quick to help you. This is a great side hustle! App needs work though, its not the smoothest running app and notifications dont show up right away, you have to keep checking the app.. Oh.. and more badge would be fun :)

title: Deliveree - Delivery Logistics

Deliveree is a full service on-demand transportation and logistics provider at the tip of your fingers. Use our mobile app to book and manage pickups and deliveries of anything and let our drivers handle the rest. The ooking ran late bcoz driver got stucked in Jatinegara for abt 23 mins. But driver was communicative, helpful, & always updated me with his current location. This app has been very useful for me to order Double engkel from duren sawit to kuningan. Price was also affordable enough only 745.000.

title: Talabatey Online Food Delivery
description:
Hungry? 
All the delicious food can be speedily and efficiently delivered to your door steps by ‚ÄúTalabatey According to your Orders‚Äù. 
All you need to do is to download the application ‚ÄúTalabatey‚Äù or ‚ÄúItlib wa Tadalal‚Äù. We have chosen this slogan because our objective is to make your life easier since we care for all your daily diet demands.
‚ÄúTalabatey‚Äù can meet all your food desires promptly and easily whether you prefer popular, eastern or western dishes, fast food, sweets, or drinks. 
By using Talabatey application, you will be able to order any type of food you like from more than 1000 restaurants in Iraq and Sudan and in Syria.
The Application advantages:
Simple, easy to use and speedy; all that you need to do is to determine your location and then to choose your favorite dish; that is all.
Extensive choices of restaurants: more than 1000 restaurant in Iraq and Sudan and in Syria
You have the option to select the meal that you like.
You can also get discounts and special offers from the restaurants on Talabatey application
It clarifies to you the meal cost together with the delivery cost if required
It will also tell you when the restaurants are open or closed.
On the application, there are lists of the meals that are in demand to help you choose if you prefer any of them
The countries available are Iraq, Sudan and Syria and Kenya soon

The worst by far delivery service. You started out just fine, but now I can't imagine you can get worse. I already uninstalled your app. It is not about the app, it is about the service itself. For weeks every time I order the order is cancelled because "one of my order items is not available ", "the restaurant cancelled the order", "no delivery person is available ". one order took two hours to be canceled at the end. If I could give you zero starts I would have.

title: Papa John's Pizza
description:
The Papa John's App makes ordering your favorite pizza even easier. You can earn free food, find Papa John's locations near you, get special online offers, and track your order right to your door.

FEATURES

Earn Free Food 
Earn Papa Rewards points and redeem your Papa Dough towards any menu item (account login required). 

Push Notifications 
Get special offers and notifications delivered to your mobile device.

Special Offers 
Get offers from your neighborhood Papa John‚Äôs. Receive and store super deal offers in the app inbox. 

Faves and Past Orders 
Save up to four of your favorite orders, and save past orders for 90 days (account login required).

Find a PJ Near You 
Enter your zip code or city to find your local Papa John‚Äôs for delivery or carryout. 

Pay Your Way 
Choose from cash, credit card or Google Pay. 

Plan Ahead 
Use Future Ordering to plan ahead. Order tomorrow‚Äôs lunch or this weekend's party spread right now. Choose when you'd like your order to be delivered or ready for pick-up.

Papa Track
Track your delivery order from dough to door. Get push notifications when your order is on its way.

For use at U.S. locations only. Have questions or comments about this app? Contact us at http://www.papajohns.com/contact-us/

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: This app covers all of the details so that we can easily utilize a coupon and select if we want to have items be applied to 1/2 or the whole pizza. The carryout special comes in handy also for us. I love how they keep track of our points and we can decide how much of our Papa John's points will be applied to our bill.

It lost the extra two stars because first of all if you accidentally exit out of your tracking section to see where your pizza is at it does not save your tracking so that means your lost when they're coming so you really have to be out on a lookout and 2nd I hate it when apps like this blow my phone up with notifications saying "oh try our new special blah blah blah And all this for only $19.99!" Yay. Other than that it works so that's cool.

I changed my phone number and the phone number changed back. I do expect better service coming from this application be in the fact that it has worked for me for so long. I think this is a lot better than door - where I get horrible customer service I just hope that you can fix this

Love being able to browse the menu and not feel rushed to make a decision. Great app, easy to use. Promo codes are nice to use and we can usually use a Promo with our Papa Dough, got an even bigger discount.

Love it. Easy to use, all the deals are there, easy to customize/edit orders, and the tracker is awesome. You can also pay extra for Papa Priority to get your delivery quicker. Plus on top of all of that the rewards are great! Those new Jalape√±o Poppers are lit!

title: Zomato - Restaurant Finder and Food Delivery App
description:
Zomato helps users find high-quality food at restaurants through search and discovery services across 24 countries, and food delivery present in India, UAE, and Lebanon.

Download the Zomato app and plan your next meal by browsing through restaurant menus, photos, user ratings and reviews. 

Key app features ‚Äì

* Search for restaurants, cuisines, or even a dish. We‚Äôve got you covered.

* Discover restaurants for dining or delivery and use search filters to find what suits you best. Also, refer to our theme-based curated lists called ‚ÄòCollections‚Äô to discover places for the best burgers, perfect date spots, or the top trending restaurants in your city.

* Get access to menus, photos, contact details, directions, and all the other essential information you need to pick a restaurant.

* Rate and review restaurants you've been to or have ordered in from, and share photos of your foodie moments.

* Unlock Gold (applicable in selected markets only) to get flat discounts of up to 40% on your total bill, 1+1 on food or 2+2 on drinks.

* Book a Table (applicable in selected markets only) to avoid queues at partner restaurants.

* Use food@work (applicable for limited locations) to pay online for all your work meals with exciting new offers available almost every day.

* Get tickets to Zomaland (applicable for limited locations) ‚Äì the grandest food and entertainment carnival. Stay updated on the artist line-up and events by keeping an eye on the Zomaland section on your app.


* Bookmark your favourites to maintain an easy reference list of places you love or places you want to visit.

* Navigate using our map view to explore restaurants around.

* Find and follow your friends to see where they're eating at and what they like best.

Zomato is available in India, UAE, Portugal, Australia, New Zealand, the USA, Lebanon, the Philippines, Indonesia, Turkey, the UK, Canada, Ireland, South Africa, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Poland, Chile, Italy, Brazil, Sri Lanka, Qatar, Malaysia and Singapore.

summary: Search for and discover great restaurants to eat out at or order in from.
recentChanges:
In light of the growing concerns around COVID-19, we would encourage you to opt in for contactless deliveries*, a feature that has been made more prominent for you in our latest update.

How can you do this?

- Opt in on the cart or order tracking page to ensure that your valet leaves your delivery on a clean surface outside your door
- Receive a photo of your delivered order
- Pick it up at your own convenience

*contactless deliveries are only available in case of online paid orders
comments: The address and the maps are totally out of sync, once it picks the random place in the map, then it hides and doesn't allow the user to see let alone edit the address. The chat with us option is nothing but an FAQ page, there is no chat option in that page. The only way to reach zomato to give feedback about this issue in playstore, that says a lot about their app.

it's certainly used to be the best app for food but off late their quality of service have gone down drastically. For instance your food gets delayed or arrive in bad shape, they try to throw some discount coupons to resolve your issue. That's insane. Also for basics, if you request that the delivery boy should ring the bell, the instruction goes unnoticed. Even if you ask them not to send cutlery they don't inform restaurant

Please fix the issue with your app. When I opened the app all restaurants were unavailable. For the past 3 days I was unable to order anything and today I tried changing the location a bit. I selected junction which is only 300meters away from my actual home, then all the restaurants were available, so I added the food to my cart and then went into the cart and changed the location back to my actual one and then I ordered the food. I used to order food to this location. But now error in the app.

Too many pop-ups irritates me a lot of time.. most of the times I will stop the process of the app but after few hours the app starts by its own which sounds malicious. Therefore everytime I have to un-instal the app and re-install again each and every time. Also 30% off,40% off and 50% off max value of discount is always ‚Çπ75.. if you can atleast stop generating pop-ups and make sure that the app does starts processing by its own then I would be really happy to keep the app installed.

There is an issue with coupons application. It's written 50 Percent off but actually we don't get it. Only some times it is allowed. Kind of disappointing. I have brought this issue up several times with your customer service but never got satisfactory response. If you don't want to give the consumer actual discount then why do you claim to give. ! It's like a fraud. Upset with the service

title: Safeway Delivery & Pick Up
description:
Download the Safeway Delivery & Pick Up App and get FREE Delivery on your 1st online order at Safeway. Sign in with your existing Safeway account or create a new account. Shop for groceries in the app and save time by choosing delivery or pick up.
 
Safeway Delivery & Pick Up App is convenient, easy and will save you time with these features:
- Delivery - Choose a time when you want your groceries delivered to your doorstep
- Drive Up & Go (Pick Up) - Drive up to your Safeway store, park, call and we'll bring your groceries to you
- Flexible delivery and pick up times ‚Äì groceries on your schedule
- Shop fast from your previous in-store and online purchases
- Make special requests to your Personal Shopper (e.g. pick green bananas)
- Save money with hundreds of clippable coupons
- Exclusive online savings ‚Äì easily find new weekly deals that matter most to you

summary: Order groceries any place, any time
recentChanges: Bug fixes and minor improvements.
comments: I am trying to use the app but during registration it gives me a service error asking for a phone number or club number that's 10 digits. It doesn't ask me to enter my phone number or club number at all! It only lets me enter my email address linked to my phone number/club number. This is the same problem I had two years ago when trying to start using this app.
Unable to log on keep getting error message to call a toll free number...got frustrated & deleted the app.
I appreciate being able to get the coupons without cutting and using the app right in Safeway while shopping and the discounts are automatically taken at the register.

I found ordering site to be cumbersome, not used friendly. I'm old but have been using computers at work and home since 1983. Created account. Logged out to make shopping list. Tried to log in. Told password not valid. Spent an hour changing password 3x before successful log in. Frustrated with finding items from long aisle lists so searched each item. Placed order early Tue a.m. Was given pick up date-Thurs at 1 p.m. Tues p.m. received email that pick up was cancelled.

I really enjoyed this app, however every order lately (and I order every week) the list of things on the "out of stock" items is growing! Basic items. I spend time shopping the app. And now double the time because i actually have to go in the store and shop for my items they were "out of stock" on. Uggg so frustrating.

title: Talabat: Food Delivery
description:
Ordering food online made simple. Download the free Talabat app and get access to over thousands of delivery restaurants straight from your smartphone or tablet. Order food online in Kuwait, United Arab Emirates, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar and Jordan

Enough wasting time searching for restaurants‚Äô phone numbers or for paper menus to make an order. You can now browse and filter cuisine types of thousands of restaurant menus near you using the Talabat app. Check out food images before adding them to your cart, customize your food the way you want it and find the latest promotions and deals all in one place. Pay online by card, or Cash on Delivery, get the door and enjoy your food!

Talabat app at a glance:
‚Ä¢	Select your area to find local restaurants near you serving wide variety of cuisines such as Indian, Chinese,     American, Italian, Healthy food and much more.
‚Ä¢	Explore locally reviewed restaurants‚Äô menus at your fingertips.
‚Ä¢	Discover and receive updates on latest restaurant offers, promotions and discounts available near you.
‚Ä¢	Easily control the restaurants you see using sort, filter, cuisines and search.
‚Ä¢	Use smart search to find what you are looking for.
‚Ä¢	View restaurant‚Äôs menu with updated images, prices and choices.
‚Ä¢	Add your personal special request to any food item you choose.
‚Ä¢	Choose when you want your order to be delivered.
‚Ä¢	Pay securely online with Debit card, Credit card or Cash on Delivery.
‚Ä¢	You can save your delivery addresses for a faster ordering process.
‚Ä¢	Share your food experience online by rating and reviewing your order.
‚Ä¢	Login using your account details or take a moment and create an account. You may order without an account, but members benefit from a better personalized ordering experience.
‚Ä¢	Craving something you ordered before? Get access to your previous orders and reorder with ease.
‚Ä¢	Need help? Get instant assistance using our Live Chat, our customer service agents are available 24 hours 7 days a week.

We would love to hear from you, let us know your thoughts and suggestions. You can provide feedback at any time from ‚ÄòAbout App‚Äô menu, or just shake your device. For more information, you may contact us info@talabat.com

Connect with us:
-	www.facebook.com/Talabat
-	www.instagram.com/Talabat
-	www.twitter.com/Talabat 

Happy Ordering!

recentChanges: We've been busy in the kitchen cooking up something awesome. Now, talabat is back with an edge. We're everyday, right away. Check out our refreshed app!
comments: Good app, only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is becuase my credit card never works with the app. I've contacted by bank and everything, but the problem is on Talabats end.

App doesn't let you change from one restaurant to another if you choose the offers that last for 15 mins.. very much need to have the option to change to another restaurant without having to leave the offer keeping the remaining time the same.
The app is has modern look, easy to personalize, and the variety of quality restaurants is abundant . It is handy to use not only for food ordering but groceries, flowers and medicines too.
Please do something about saving address, it always ask about address when placing a new order, why it can't be saved ! It's nice and easy app though.

The app is fantastic and the customer service is excellent! However, the restaurants are letting the app down by being 1. Unrealibe, 2. Ignoring special requests, 3. Not being consistent in food quality. Overall, it's great and I recommend it for its variety of restaurants and convenience.

title: GoShare Delivery Pro - Trucks & Vans
description:
Earn money driving your pickup truck, cargo van or box truck. Be your own boss, work, when you want, and get paid weekly! GoShare connects truck and van owners with businesses and people who need help moving, hauling, or delivering large items on demand. Our delivery professionals earn between $47.52-$71.52 per hour plus tips. Turn your truck from a liability that is costing you money every month into an asset that is earning you money every day.

All delivery professionals must be at least 18 years old and have your own pickup truck, box truck or cargo van that is year 2005 or newer. You will need to pass a background check, driving history check, and vehicle inspection. You will also need to be able to lift and carry up to 50 lbs.

The service is currently available in Atlanta, Austin, Chicago, Cincinnati, Cleveland, Columbus, Dallas, Denver, Houston, Indianapolis, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Louisville, Miami, Nashville, Orange County, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Sacramento, San Antonio, San Bernardino, San Diego, San Francisco Bay Area, Tucson, Washington DC, and parts of New Jersey with plans to expand internationally.

If you would like to be notified when we launch in your city you can apply online at www.goshare.co/trucks/drivers/apply

If you are looking for a part time job, full time job or hot shot jobs GoShare may be a good fit. Learn more and apply online in the app or visit www.goshare.co/drivers

GoShare delivery professionals can earn money helping people and businesses with furniture delivery, junk hauling, last mile delivery, local moves, courier services, and more. GoShare projects can be booked by customers on demand or scheduled in advance, allowing delivery professionals to accept requests when they want and earn income on a flexible schedule.

summary: Earn Money Driving Your Pickup Truck, Cargo Van, or Box Truck
recentChanges:
Improve UI/UX
Fix minor issues
comments: Love this app. Easy money in spare time. I usually make 30+ dollars for 30 minutes of work (including driving). I hear people complain about not getting paid for gas. I recommend quickbooks. If you use your vehicle for work just click a button to track your miles driven to and from jobs on that app. Then you get compensation when tax time comes around.

Not many project jobs to take and to many drivers because I get 1 project request per week and by the time I open the app to accept project it says project is no longer available because someone else already took it even though I opened app as soon as I get notify. This has been going on for for more than a month so this is not job security because you have to be awake and aware all the time waiting for the app to let you know that there is a project available.

App works but instructions for customer's aren't clear. People should be prompted if they need a helper before completing project. I have accepted many projects where the customer didn't request helper but needed one. Also takes way to long to disperse payments driver retention will drop if they don't figure out a way to increase payments speed.
Every since I have had this app I have not been able to receive any jobs. When a job does come through I try to accept it and it say the the job is now available

It seems that the app delays acceptance of jobs for people who have a pick up trucks and favors cargo vans maybe because it's a higher rate. I have been looking directly at the app and accepted a job as soon as It pops up and there is always a lag. I have accepted a job and arrived and the police were waiting for me and was questioned. a criminal was using the app to delivery goods bought with a stolen credit card. Reported it too go share they didn't even pay me for my time and fuel wasted.

title: Grubhub for Drivers
description:
Become a Grubhub Driver and deliver customers the food they love from their favorite restaurants. With the largest restaurant and diner network, Grubhub offers more opportunities to make money on your own schedule. 

Why drive with Grubhub?

MAKE GREAT MONEY
Earn competitive money and keep 100% of your tips as a Grubhub delivery person.

WORK WHEN YOU WANT
Work part time, full time or in your spare time. You can schedule your hours in advance or have the flexibility to deliver on short notice. Create a schedule that works for you!

BE YOUR OWN BOSS
Grubhub for Drivers is built to help you earn ‚Äî make deliveries, track your hours, see how much you‚Äôve made and manage your schedule.

NO CAR NEEDED
Whether you‚Äôre a driver, biker or delivering on your moped, the Grubhub for Drivers app was built to help you succeed.

EASY SIGN UP
Download the Grubhub for Drivers app and sign up to work at driver.grubhub.com. We‚Äôll walk you through each step along the way.

MORE ORDERS, MORE OPPORTUNITIES TO EARN
Grubhub has the largest restaurant and diner network of any other food delivery platform.

Grubhub drivers are earning money in cities across the US, including: Albany, Atlanta, Austin, Baltimore, Boston, Bridgeport, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Hartford, Houston, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, Minneapolis, Nashville, New York City, Orlando, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, San Diego, San Francisco, San Jose, Seattle, St. Louis, Sacramento, Tampa, Washington DC ‚Ä¶ and many more.

summary: Drive and earn extra money
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ New functionality for healthy and safety precautions and contact-free deliveries.
comments: The latest update to this app does not let it run in the background. If im online and go do something else while im waiting for an offer, when i come back to the app it says "Looks like your offline" and refreshes. Please FIX this. It was never like this and it also marks you absent if you dont have only the Grubhub screen on. This is ridiculous!

It's pretty good, but cannot detect when you have arrived or are leaving the restaurant. "Delivered" button is easy to acvidentally tap when arriving at the diner's location or gathering everything to take to the door. Should be a swipe or second tap to confirm. It takes days to switch bank cards/accounts. Maps should be better integrated. It doesn't calculate distances or ETAs to the pick up and drop off to help the driver judge if he can make the pickup or delivery on time.

No longer working on Galaxy Note 8. I uninstalled and reinstalled 5+ times. Restarted my phone countless times. When I try to open the app, it shows a blank white screen for about 5-10 seconds, and then return to my phone's app screen. It closes itself out. It keeps doing this. BEFORE THIS, the app wouldn't constantly log itself out and vibrate continuously with the login screen continously sliding. Thank God I have the Samsung J7, works on that with WiFi/Hotspot. Or else I'd have no income.

The new update 3.8 screwed my app up. In the middle of a job after I updated it the app crashed. It would not open up again. I tried deleting and reinstalling several times, restarting the phone. Nothing worked. Luckily I had 2 phones and my other phone was an iPhone. I downloaded it there and had no issues. I deleted the update 3.8 and looked online for the last stable update 3.54. After I downloaded that one everything worked out fine. DON'T UPDATE TO 3.8!! Wait for the next update.

this app is one of the better written ones. The best is still doordash's app but this one is a close second period The only thing that is annoying is having to go to tasks after accepting an offer It's on a whole separate screen I don't see why they just don't make it go up on the screen you're on like the door dash app. This would help a lot especially when you're driving because you get these offers when you're driving It's the nature of the job Make it easier for us

title: Delivery Tip Tracker Free
description:
Keep track of your tips as well as delivery addresses, mileage, and more. Made by a delivery driver and intended specifically for delivery drivers. Upgrade to the Pro version to unlock order history, customer profiles, and lots of other cool stuff.

Standard features:

‚Ä¢ Enter tips using voice or by a speedy touch interface.
‚Ä¢ Retrieve delivery location and driving distance automatically by GPS or by manually entering address.
‚Ä¢ View useful delivery info like average tip, earnings per mile driven, orders per hour, amount owed to store, and lots more.
‚Ä¢ View your tips on a color-coded map.
‚Ä¢ Plan your delivery route by viewing your orders in progress on a map.
‚Ä¢ Use voice or touch to quickly start turn-by-turn navigation or call a customer.
‚Ä¢ Options to specify tip payment method, order price, prepaid tip amounts, and more.
‚Ä¢ Mileage tracker with several options to fit how your store pays mileage.
‚Ä¢ Make earnings adjustments to account for miscellaneous earnings or expenditures.
‚Ä¢ Prefill order details for multiple orders at once.
‚Ä¢ Tailor the app's behavior to your preferences with numerous customization options.

Pro-exclusive features:

‚Ä¢ Comprehensive order history. View orders, stats, and tip maps by day, week, month, year, or all-time.
‚Ä¢ Customer history. View a customer's previous orders, average tip amount, and more.
‚Ä¢ Choice of day or night theme. Also an option to automatically switch theme based on time of day.
‚Ä¢ Export order history data to a spreadsheet.
‚Ä¢ Back up and restore order history data.
‚Ä¢ "Nearby orders" feature shows you how a given tip stacks up against others in that same area.
‚Ä¢ Track your hours worked throughout each shift and see extra stats like earnings per hour and orders per hour.
‚Ä¢ Track hourly wages earned throughout each shift.
‚Ä¢ Track your odometer readings for each shift. 
‚Ä¢ Enter multiple store addresses and easily switch between them before starting a shift.

This app does it all. In a hurry? Simply enter the tip amount and it'll automatically find the delivery address, driving distance, and mileage amount. Want more functionality? Dig a bit deeper and you'll find a rich set of features. Enter an address to get turn-by-turn navigation. Enter a customer's phone number and you can call them with the press of a button. Prefill order details when taking multiple orders at once. Use custom voice functionality for speedy user input. Upgrade to the Pro version and you'll unlock even more features. Store customer info, including phone numbers, names, notes, and previous orders. Track your hours worked and odometer readings for each shift.

Your data is presented in plenty of useful ways. Stats such as earnings per mile, orders per hour, and miles per order are at your disposal. The "Tip Map" feature shows where in your delivery area you got good tips and where you got bad ones. Pro users get even more. Comprehensive order history allows you to inspect everything from individual orders to entire years worth of data. "Nearby orders" lets you quickly see how a given tip stacks up to others in that same area. 

Clever innovations result in a superior user experience. Order data, such as GPS position, delivery address, and driving distance are all fetched in the background. Voice input intelligently distinguishes between tip amounts, addresses, and phone numbers, so you can do more without typing. Effortlessly juggle multiple orders at once by swiping up from the bottom to reveal inputs for each order.
descriptionHTML:

comments: Reccomend allowing for partial voice commands such as "amount received equals ####" to also accept "amount received ####" Edit: You know what, 5 stars for your quick response and lovely app. Do consider the partial voice command thing, maybe make it a paid feature? I'd be okay with that. Thank you for responding ^.^
This absolutely is an awesome and great tool for me to use while making deliveries very easy and simple to use track my deliveries extremely happy and satisfied makes my life very easy

Would be Nice to be able to keep track of total tickets. I have to settle up at the end of the shift. Your ap gives me an idea what I have earned but not what I owe the store. Also alot of the time cash tips are given on credit cards. And that is accounted differently. If credit card has a tip that gets paid on my paycheck as opposed to cash tips. The app is better than having nothing. Also for repeat customers if it would retain their address after you enter their phone number it be faster
Love this app, however, on occasion, the maps does not give correct directions...
This is GREAT! It really helps me keep track of how much I'm making so I don't have to attempt to do it in my head.

comments: App is pretty good now but the app still exposes the drivers location in real time for as long as you keep the app open. This is very bad and needs to be fixed. I told them about this weeks ago.
Couldn't even log in. Just says unable to create account. Won't tell me why and won't log in through Facebook either. Waste of time

Great service, arrived before they said it would, people are friendly seriously recommend if you're looking for a good food delivery app download this i had some speculations when i first got it but it exceeded my expectations:) only problem was that you can't pay with anything except credit card but other than that great app

would've been great but it never let me add items to my cart after selecting what i wanted, so i never got to check out, very frustrating, please fix. can't login on the main screen, it's like that part of the ap Ip has no response.

I ordered a few times and everything went pretty smooth this last time ordering though my food came completely cold I got a hold of texoma delivery. They said it's basically up to the fast food place to make things right. They said it's not their fault and there's nothing they can do. I will never use that service again. If I'm going to put my money through and pay them extra for delivery and I still have a mandatory tip to pay, and they can't get my food to me hot. What good are they!

title: Toters:Food Delivery & More
description:
Food delivery & much more!

YOUR FAVORITES
Star your favorite stores to keep them at the top of your screen - for easy access.

MEALS, MEALS, MEALS
Search for our meal suggestions we probably heard your belly growling before you did. It‚Äôs 9 am, and you‚Äôre hungry for carbs. It‚Äôs almost summer, and you‚Äôre on a diet. It‚Äôs time for a cheat meal, and you deserve the best burger. We do the thinking, you do the ordering.

FILTER IT OUT
Filter our selection by offers, price ranges, cuisine types, delivery time and more.

SCHEDULE DELIVERIES
Let us know when you need your food at 1:15 pm in five days, as precise as that sounds.

SAME ORDER, DIFFERENT DAY
Get your dose of a large cappuccino with skimmed milk, easy on the foam, one click away, every day.

YOUR PREFERENCES, SAVED
Save your payment information securely and your best friend‚Äôs home address, just once/ save
your payment information and address securely, because who wants to type that in every. single. time?

REAL-TIME TRACKING
Watch your order arriving: from confirmation to preparation and on the way to almost there. We get hangry and impatient too.

WE‚ÄôRE HERE FOR YOU
Reach out to us. Five-star service gets you what you need, right when you need it.

GET ANYTHING DELIVERED
With our Butler service, we can pick up or buy and deliver anything that fits on a bike.

WE‚ÄôRE ALREADY THERE - with more than just lunch
Forgot mom‚Äôs birthday? We‚Äôre already there - with a hand-picked bouquet.
One percent battery? We‚Äôre already there - with a phone charger.
Friends just showed up? We‚Äôre already there - with theater popcorn & a dozen of donuts.
Empty fridge? We‚Äôre already there - with fresh produce.
Business trip to Lebanon, Iraq, Saudi Arabia, or the U.S.? You guessed it. We‚Äôre already there.

title: Zipit Delivery - Food Delivery
description:
Zipit Delivery is St. Augustine, FL's favorite restaurant food delivery and takeout service. We are now powered by Bite Squad so you may enjoy a wider restaurant selection, no menu mark-ups, no order minimums and live order tracking.

Here in St. Augustine we are blessed with an abundance of amazing restaurants that people from all over the country come to visit, unfortunately we don't all have the time to get down town or the will to deal with traffic and parking that comes with living in such a popular destination, so we started Zipit. We are a fast, friendly, local delivery service that provides an affordable and convenient way to get St. Augustine's wonderful cuisine to your home or business. 
Use our state of the art ordering software that makes it fast and easy to order from your favorite restaurants quickly and accurately using your computer or phone. Your food will be delivered quick and fresh to your door by a friendly driver. We even deliver to some of the popular docks and beaches for you hungry fishermen and beach goers. 

We have a great group of restaurants and are adding more all the time but we need your help! Please let us know what restaurants YOU want to order from. We hope you enjoy our service and give us a honk when you see the ZipIt car on the road!

Zipit Delivery serves the St. Augustine, FL area with online ordering, takeout and restaurant delivery and is now powered by Bite Squad.

title: PedidosYa - Delivery Online
description:
Whatever you need, we deliver it to you!

With PedidosYa on your phone, you'll be able to fly into a world of wonder! The best part? We deliver your deepest cravings wherever you want in just minutes!

You can order online straight from the best restaurants, grocery stores, pharmacies and many more! Anything you want in just three steps: Choose from the menu, order what you want and we deliver it to you!

title: Detrack Proof Of Delivery POD
description:
Detrack is a very easy to use Proof Of Delivery (POD) app that lets your drivers submit instant PODs and delivery notifications to you and your customers with just a few quick taps.


Detrack supports capturing of signature, photos, barcodes, location, arrival time, driver's notes, partial deliveries (items), COD payments & more...


Features of our Detrack app:
- Suitable for any business, in any industry, in any country around the world
- Lightweight & very easy to use!
- Reliable - work even in areas with poor 3G connection
- Can be used for delivery, collection, and even service jobs i.e. Proof Of Service
- Detrack smart sort - automatically sort job list according to the driver's location
- Capture name, signature, photos, barcode, location, timestamp, arrival info, driver's notes & more!
- Call, text or send pre-delivery text with ETA to recipient with just a tap of a button
- Navigate to destination directly from app (GPS navigation with voice guidance)
- Send real time delivery notifications (optionally with POD attached)
- Capture non-delivery reason
- Display delivery time & instructions for drivers
- Display the items for every job (SKU, description, quantity)
- Support partial delivery - capture rejected quantity & reason for every rejected item
- Support multiple deliveries at the same location
- Custom URL scheme detrack:// and detrack://?do=DO_NUMBER to easily integrate our POD app with your app or website
- Make signature mandatory, photo mandatory, either signature or photo mandatory, or notes mandatory when photo is taken (select from more than 40 options!)
- Push notifications to alert drivers of updates to jobs
- Mobile job dispatch - assign jobs "over the air" or open jobs to your private fleet of drivers to grab!
- Driver to driver job transfer
- Mass POD - sign once, submit all selected
- Send pre-delivery text to recipient with ETA
- Multiple barcodes per item
- Change item quantity
- Scan QR / barcodes to capture serial numbers for every delivery and every delivery item
- Free & easy Detrack app download and update from Google Play by your drivers


Supported languages: English, Bahasa Melayu, Bahasa Indonesia, Greek, Spanish, French, Dutch, German, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese (Hong Kong), Japanese, Thai, Vietnamese, and Burmese.


Benefits of our Detrack service:
- Paperless delivery system for reduced carbon footprint
- Greater control over delivery operations
- Faster response time to incidents
- Reduced customer support calls (our tracking widget lets your customers track your deliveries on your own website)
- Improved service reliability & accountability
- Higher customer satisfaction
- Better cashflow with faster billing
- SaaS convenience and affordability
- Import your jobs with just the click of a button
- API available for full automation - no data entry required
- Deploy to your entire fleet in no time!


Many of our users are small and medium enterprises (SMEs) based in the US, UK, Australia, South Africa, Dubai, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, Nigera, Canada & more!


Our clients include:
- Reebonz (online shop for luxury goods)
- Beeflowers (florist)
- FirstFence (established fence manufacturer)
- RAK Insurance (public listed insurance company)
- aCommerce (e-Commerce fulfillment)
- In & Out Publications (magazine publisher)
- Cat & The Fiddle (online shop for gourmet cheesecakes)
- Transfleur (specializes in flowers delivery)
- Thirsty (online beer shop)
- Tiger Light (supplier of energy efficient lighting)
- Austin Fire Department (fire service)
- One Girl Cookies (hand made cookies)
- Influence Graphics (digital printing company)
- Clippa Sales (sweets distributor)
- Hematmart (online grocery store)
- BrightStar Fireworks (fireworks supplier)


"We signed up a few weeks back with Detrack for our delivery system and so far we are loving it. Well done guys for creating something that allows SMEs like us to manage delivery like professionals!" - Roland Utama

title: dumpling | grocery delivery
description:
Take control of your grocery delivery experience!  Connect with a personal shopper near you and place orders from ANY local store.

First, connect with your shopper. If you've been invited by a shopper or have been referred from a shopper's website, you will automatically be connected to that shopper.

Otherwise, search for a shopper near you by entering your zip code and we‚Äôll tell you who‚Äôs in your area. Check out the shopper profiles to find the best shopper for you.

Next, pick ANY local store. Don‚Äôt worry about memberships or shopper cards, your shopper‚Äôs got you covered and will pass along any discounts!

Then, build your list. You can browse store categories, search by product name, or create custom items. Additional planning features include price estimates, product details, and large item images.

With every order, your shopper hones in on your specific preferences. Before you know it, they'll be shopping for you better than you could yourself.

Otherwise, search for a shopper near you by entering your zip code and we‚Äôll tell you who‚Äôs in your area. Check out the shopper profiles to find the best shopper for you.

Next, pick ANY local store. Don‚Äôt worry about memberships or shopper cards, your shopper‚Äôs got you covered and will pass along any discounts!

comments: Great service, great people, great app

Dumpling is a great alternative to exploitative gig economy services -- but the app needs a _lot_ of work to be user-friendly. For example: 1) It took me many tries to find the list of items that I bought, which is hidden behind the name of the store (absolutely counter-intuitive); 2) You have to remember to manually save certain actions like adding notes, or they'll just be forgotten, 3) Sometimes you delete items by selecting "0", sometimes by clicking a "Trash" icon, 4) You can't create custom items from a failed search result (that should be the default); 5) Simple quality of life features (e.g. "no results for polato, here are results for potato") are not implemented. If the company is too small to fix these issues, maybe open source the app so others can help?
It would be nice if the shopper can add items into the shopping list app while they are shopping. And even better if the shopper can leave a note of the changes in the order
Amazing service! I get the same personal shopper every time and they can shop ANY store debit and credit cards are accepted. Highly recommend.

My first time using it was a disaster. They flagged my card and put a 50$ hold on my card it was just a mess Okay I will update this!!! My "shopper" messaged me asking me questions after questions why I rated them so low it's very unprofessional and this was absolutely disgusting I cannot believe that someone who shopped one time and and gets 20 by the driver. I will never use this again.

title: Supr Daily ‚Äì Milk & Groceries Delivered Daily
description:
Fresh milk & other groceries delivered to your doorstep every day by 7 am.

We ensure timely delivery of milk, bread, eggs, curd, dosa/idli batter, coconut water, fresh fruits, vegetables, and other groceries right to your doorstep by 7 am, every single day. Our service is currently available in Mumbai, Pune, Bengaluru/Bangalore, Delhi, Noida, Gurgaon, Chennai and Hyderabad.

Here‚Äôs how we make everyday Supr:

Order Tonight and We Deliver by Morning!
Place an order by 11 pm tonight and we‚Äôll deliver the items by 7 am tomorrow.

No Minimum Order
When we say no minimum order, we mean it. If all you need is a dozen eggs or two fruits, we‚Äôll deliver.

Set a Schedule for Repeated Delivery
No need to place the same order every day. Our ‚ÄòSubscription‚Äô option gives you the ability to set a delivery schedule for items that you use regularly and get them delivered to your doorstep. Whether it‚Äôs just one packet of milk daily, dosa batter on alternate days, a dozen eggs over the weekend or fruits and vegetables delivered on a specific day - customise it the way you want!

Easy Payments
Once you download the app, just top up your wallet once, add items to your cart and schedule your deliveries.

We Have Partnered with Your Favourite Brands
We have partnered with multiple brands across different cities to ensure that you have fresh milk, fresh fruits and vegetables delivered daily from their factory, to your doorstep:

Types of milk available: Full cream, toned, double toned and organic.

Milk brand partners: Amul, Mother Dairy, Warana, Nestle, Mahananda, Danone, Gokul, Chitale, Katraj, Nandini, Heritage, Nilgiris, Thirumala, Akshayakalpa, Vrindavan, Vijaya, Dodla, Jersey, Aavin.

At Your Service 24X7
Need help? Raise a complaint on the app and we will try our best to resolve the problem immediately. Our customer service team will get back to you as soon as possible!

Install the Supr Daily app today and wake up to Supr Mornings every day!
