comments: The app is very slow. User experience is very bad. Edit: Clearing cache and reinstall is not helping. Its actually your app performance. I guess this app is made on something like cordova. Even though I have issue with your app, your delivery is very good and has been always on time. You are doing good job in that area. Please improve your app performance as well.

App doesn't provide the exact details of subscriptions, you will loose track.. new payments are taken to their wallet and it gets stuck their, you can't buy anything, the support staff is another bunch of time passers ; for everything they just have one solution, whatzap..I find this as some kind of fraud..

Great app. Great service. But I couldn't find any way to set vacation/cancel delivery for multiple days. I always have to do one day at a time. Edit: Customer Support called me and helped me resolve this. Very helpful. I'd give higher rating but I have already given 5 so...

Update The app is smooth and working flawless now From 3 stars giving it 1 star as they again didn't show up. But what pissed me off is the lack of customer alerts as they want you to give calls ans check the status.(you can take them only as plan b or alternative) While even every other app sents an easy notification, I don't see that happening for them. While the negatives are of this sort the app developers have put a very neat and easy app to order and operations team a big thumbs down

Love the timely service and products but an essential part of a shopping app is missing, there is no orders page, no past order summary and no invoices. I cannot go back and see how much I've paid for an item I've ordered in the past. Update: dropping the rating further as I'm facing a lot of quality issues. Every single time I'm told that the issue will not be repeated but then it happens again.

title: Track-POD Proof of Delivery - ePOD for drivers
description:
Track-POD is advanced electronic Proof of Delivery app (ePOD) that allows your field staff, drivers, carriers to receive route with orders or jobs and lets you submit instant delivery notifications easily, report performance online. It makes real-time delivery tracking and route planning effortless and effective. 

System consists of two parts: delivery driver app and dashboard in the cloud.  Please register business account at https://www.track-pod.com then add accounts for your drivers or carriers as you need.

Features of our Proof of Delivery app:

- Works anywhere & anytime - in any industry, in any country around the world
 -Works both online and offline (resubmits upon re-connection)
- Extremely easy to use and free for your drivers and carriers

- Display all routes for driver or carrier on smartphone
- List of sites and expected time slots of deliveries
- List of orders/waybills/tasks
- Delivery details (SKU, description, q-ty, unit measure, weight, packages and etc)
- New orders, waybills or jobs online
- Mass POD - sign once, submit all selected
- COD (Cash on Delivery) payment 
- Display notes for driver

-Vehicle check & Safety check features:
*Manage vehicle details
*Defect reporting
*Record multiple checks against vehicles

- Possibility to call direct from app
- Navigate  to destination direct from app (support Google Maps, Sygic GPS Navigation, Here Maps, OSM maps, Yandex navigation with Voice Guidance)
- Multiple deliveries and collections (pick up) at the same location/site
- Support multiple depots or "depart from" points
- Delivery status notification in real time automatically

- Capture non-delivery reason
- Capture  eSignature (Captures Signature and Name), photo
- Support partial delivery
- Capture rejected quantity and reason for every rejected item
- Putting driver's comment
- Scan QR / barcodes to capture serial numbers for every delivery and every delivery item
- Instant updates on delivery issues with photos
- Sync photos and documents with back office portal
- Comprehensive delivery tracking, capture geotags & timestamps to know when/where ePODs are received
- Send POD documents in real time 

- Two-way communication - lite chat
- GPS tracking with track recording

- Registering arrival and departure time
- Registering/checking odometer broken down by truck/trailer 
- Registering/checking fuel
- Workflow for shipment/loading 
- Workflow for returnable containers and other equipment
- Summary report of goods for delivery and collection



Benefits for your business:

- Increase productivity by 30% with efficient scheduling 
- Administration costs reduction by 50%
- Sending information in real time for faster invoicing
- Paperless and reduced calls
- Customer service quality improvement
- Full workflow management and control in real time
- Improvement of operations management
- Faster response time to incidents
- Reduced customer support calls
- Less mistakes and no discrepancy acts
- No upfront investment
- Easy to deploy
- BYOD


Application areas:

Logistics, Distribution, 3PL, Cargo Service, Service Industry, Manufacturing, Construction, Trade and other industries where many employees work on the field

* Some features not available in all countries.
* Please register business account at https://www.track-pod.com and add logins for your drivers or carriers.

comments: We use this for our small dairy delivery business in the U.S. It's easy to use, fairly intuitive, and reasonably priced. Best features (for us) are route optimization, SMS delivery notification, and the mobile app. Mobile UI could stand a bit of a redesign to be more intuitive for drivers, but once you learn it it's easy. Would also be nice if driving directions were native in the app rather than punting to Google Maps...currently you have to switch back and forth when you arrive/depart if you're getting directions. Not a huge problem, but just enough of a hassle to make you aware that you're doing extra work as you use it.

Can't use the app, it ask for login details without giving the option to register. If I need to create an account, why can't I do it from the app; or why don't you indicate as such on the app. If this communication is so poor, how can I trust you with the POD info?
Once in a delivery note and accidentally press arrived by just catching it , you can't come back out of delivery so I can't do the ones before that one
Greate, user frendly and easy to use for my drivers
is this for anyone to use.. because it asks for an ID straight away.. no option to set anything up?

title: Delivery Bite - Food Delivery
description:
DeliveryBite.com is the best restaurant food delivery service in McAllen, Mission, and Edinburg, Texas. We have partnered with your favorite local restaurants to offer the added convenience of delivery. We are now powered by Bite Squad so you may enjoy a wider restaurant selection, no menu mark-ups, no order minimums, and live order tracking.

Ordering online is now simple -- breakfast, lunch or dinner, 7 days a week! You can also pre-order your meal to schedule deliveries! Then use our live Order Tracker to watch your food arrive to your door!

comments: Love this app. Drivers are always friendly and arrive within a reasonable time.
First time ordering... Order was late. Order was wrong and food was cold. Probably gonna give it one more try, if it's a minute late, deleting and going to another company.
I honestly hate that because of my location, I cant get a delivery :/
Horrible dispatchers, no care for their employees smh DeliveryBite was so legit and the dispatchers back then were very professional but BiteSquad is simply horrible
What's the app if someone wants to be a delivery driver? Gave one star since over never used the app

title: Deliveries Package Tracker
description:
With "Deliveries" for Android you can keep track of all your parcels at a glance. Wherever you are, just add the delivery via its tracking ID and find out where it is. It's just one click away!

Currently, the following providers are supported:
- Amazon
- An Post
- bpost / TAXIPOST
- BRT
- Chronopost
- City Link
- CitySprint (Amazon orders only)
- Collect+
- Courierit, CouriersPlease
- Correos
- Dawn Wing
- DHL, DHL Express International, DHL Global Mail
- DPD, DPD.co.uk
- eBay
- ELTA, ELTA Courier
- EMS Korea
- EWC Express
- Fastway
- FedEx
- Globeflight
- GLS, GLS.it
- Hermes, Hermes.co.uk
- Hunter Trading Group
- i-parcel
- International Bridge
- kuriero
- LaserShip
- LogoiX
- OnTrac
- Parcelforce Worldwide
- Post: Australia, Austria, Canada, China, Czech, Denmark, Finland, France (La Poste), Germany, Hongkong, Israel, Italy, Japan, Mexico (Mexpost), Moldova, Netherlands (PostNL), New Zealand, Norway, Singapore (SingPost), Sweden, Switzerland (Swiss)
- Prestige
- Purolator
- P&T Luxembourg
- Royal Mail
- SDA
- Seabourne Express
- SFS
- SkyNet
- Stadtbote
- StarTrack
- STL
- TNT, TNT Innight, TNT Fashion
- UPS
- USPS
- Yodel
- Full list: https://deliveries.oRRs.de
Got suggestions for more? Please send us a functional tracking ID and the tracking URL via E-Mail and we will try our best to support that provider as soon as possible.

Background Notifications:
You don't have to open the app and check for new statuses. For natively supported providers, "Deliveries" offers the option to send you a notification when there is a updated shipping status.

Sync:
Synchronize deliveries across different devices via our synchronization service.

Trace:
Tracing the package via Google Maps is available for many logistic partners.

Tablet-optimized:
"Deliveries" was designed to provide a pleasing experience on both smartphones and tablets.

Widget:
For a quick overview without opening the app, you can add widgets to your home screen

Pro-Version:
You can buy the extended version of "Deliveries" right within the app! Your purchase will remove all ads and unlock many more customization options. Just hit the cart button in the main list and follow the steps.
- no ads
- easily import your Amazon and eBay orders and keep them synced
- set a quiet mode for notifications
- access to different app themes
- many useful convenience settings
- browser access to sync data via https://deliveries.orrs.de/sync/
- shake to refresh, ...

Online Shopping-Integration:
Pro users can easily import all their Amazon and eBay orders in the synchronization settings. On top of that, tracking continues after the order is passed to DHL, UPS, USPS etc. (only for traceable, direct purchases).

Translations:
Help us translate deliveries to more languages! You can now be part of the development, just head over to https://localize.oRRs.de and submit your translations!

Questions?
Please don't hesitate to contact us with your questions via our Q&A portal https://help.orrs.de

recentChanges:
New in v5.7.4:
- native support for Cargo International, Correos El Salvador, Dicom, Hermes World, Paquetexpress and Zajil (ÿ≤ÿßÿ¨ŸÑ)
- support for Deutsche Post Packet Plus and jadlog (non-native)
- fixed issues with 28 carriers
- fixed Amazon partial deliveries getting mixed up and duplicated
- removed native support for CNE, CorreosChile and PPL CZ üôÅ
- removed rate limit from Tasker refresh plugin
- bug fixes

All changes: https://c.orrs.de
comments: Awesome app. Great UI. Been using it for years. Only caveat is that I wish the app would automatically recognize the carrier when you input the tracking number... The only other package delivery app I've ever used had this feature and it was pretty nice. As of now you have to manually enter the carrier yourself even after inputting the tracking number. This is my only "wish", but it's a very small issue in comparison to how well the app actually works.

It's a good app, used to be that is. Now it has become super annoying with daily full screen nagging about permission for personalized ads. I give the permission but each day it comes again, trying to push me to buy the ad-free version. Bugger! Time to look for another tracking app. Edit: after a couple of updates the problem disappeared. Therefore I'm giving it now 4 stars instead of the original 2 :-)

Exactly what I need when I have multiple incoming orders from different shipping providers from around the world. I also think this app might be more trustworthy with my data compared to other similar apps (you can see the country that the developer registers themselves under).
Awesome app. Consolidates all my deliveries in one central location and updates me in a timely manner. Incredibly useful for big batch of deliveries like my new PC build order(s) that I'm waiting on.

This app is great tracking packages it can show on the map details and you can watch as the carriers dont move your packages for days sometimes. This app is accurate and is the best for tracking multiple different carriers.

title: Scootsy Online Food Delivery Restaurants and More
description:
Scootsy is a Mumbai-based intra-city delivery service that delivers food, sweets, bakes, and gifts from the best restaurants, food stores, fashion boutiques, gift shops, beauty stores, and more. We carefully curate the best, so you‚Äôre never disappointed. Working with local merchants and businesses enables us to get you what you want at your doorstep. We currently deliver in South Mumbai, Bandra, Andheri East, Andheri West, Powai, Ghatkopar, and Malad, but will be expanding to other areas and cities soon.

Special Features

- Track your order using our special Scootsy MapTech, which lets you see in real time where your rider is and what time he‚Äôll reach you. Scootsy riders are speedy and visible - their orange outfits make them easily distinguishable as they deliver your order.

- Get personalised recommendations, as Scootsy learns what you like and where you often hang out.

- Pay by COD, Credit Card, Debit Card, Paytm or NetBanking.

- An email purchase receipt is sent to you upon delivery.

- Available for android devices with OS - JELLY_BEAN and above.

- A desktop version is also available on scootsy.com, or you can order through our call

centre 022 6221 1200.

+ + + +

About Scootsy

Get what you need, now.

Pay online or pay COD and get what you want delivered to wherever you choose.

It‚Äôs as magical as that!

Discover Mumbai like never before!

All our products have been specially vetted and selected for you. You're bound to find new restaurants and boutiques that you didn't already know about.

How to use:

1) Browse through our selection by type or discover what‚Äôs popular around you.

2) Make your selections by adding to your cart and pressing order.

3) Pay via Cash On Delivery OR online payment.

4) A Scootsy rep calls you to confirm your first order (only on COD).

5) Your Scootsy rider arrives with your order.

+ + + +

Why Use Scootsy?

Want food fast from the finest restaurants in the city, but don‚Äôt want to deal with the traffic and the heat?

We‚Äôve got the best of Mumbai‚Äôs restaurants on Scootsy, often exclusively. Our roster is

constantly growing and includes many that don‚Äôt otherwise deliver.

Forgot to buy a gift for that special someone, or simply don‚Äôt know what to get them?


Scootsy has selected the best gifts to make it super easy for you! From flowers, mugs, lamps, and shot glasses to keychains, cushions, bags and more, you‚Äôll get it all on Scootsy. Going to be late in the office, and just don‚Äôt have time to order dinner?

We offer pre-orders on several restaurants, and will deliver it to you at your chosen place and time.

Have last-minute guests and not sure of what to serve them?

We have a number of gourmet food stores and restaurants from which we can deliver your favourite snacks and ingredients.

+ + + +

For any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at info@scootsy.com.

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram @ScootsyIt.

title: GotChew Food Delivery & Takeout
description:
The app to satisfy your appetite is here. Order delivery and pick-up from your favorite local restaurants in the Greater New Bedford & Fall River area with a few quick clicks.

We offer a fast and friendly online ordering service that makes it easy for you to get the food you crave, when and where you want it.  The options are limitless to suit all of your needs for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

title: DeliveryCircle
description:
We designed DeliveryCircle to be a simple, easy-to-use, cost-effective alternative to standard delivery services, and we didn‚Äôt want customers to have to factor in delivery costs or availability before they pulled out their wallets. We deliver stuff cheaply and on a flexible schedule.

Shoppers get their purchases delivered quickly at a reasonable cost. Merchants take customer relationships to a new and deeper level and differentiate themselves from competitors by offering free (or low-cost) delivery to customers without the capital investment of offering delivery services. Drivers work the hours they want and set their own prices. In many cases, they‚Äôre already heading in your direction with other deliveries, making this a green alternatives.

title: DASH Delivery Services
description:
DASH is Brunei‚Äôs #1 on-demand delivery service with live tracking. 

Get items (such as gifts, parcels, ordered food) delivered to your families, friends, customers and business partners. 

> Convenient 
Instantly request a delivery using the DASH app 

> Safe 
Monitor your items with real-time end-to-end delivery tracking 

> Fast and Reliable 
Items are delivered within the specified time 

> Affordable 
Low rates. FREE pickup. Pay upon delivery. 

How It Works? 

1. Go to the DASH App 
If you are a new user, Sign Up for a new account. If you already have an account, Sign In to your account. 

2. Complete Pick-Up and Delivery Details 
Fill in address, name, mobile number, email, pick-up time, delivery time, description of item, payment method. Click ‚ÄúSubmit‚Äù. 

3. Start of Pick-Up or Delivery 
The nearest DASHer will accept your request. You will receive an app alert or SMS/email notification to inform you that the DASHer is on the way to pick-up or deliver your item. 

4. Track Your Delivery 
You can track your delivery real-time in the DASH app. Your recipient will also receive an SMS/email notification with a tracking URL to monitor the delivery progress. 

5. Arrival at Pick-Up or Delivery Location 
You will receive an app alert or SMS/email notifcation to inform you that the DASHer has arrived at the pick-up or delivery location. 

6. Delivery Successful and Payment 
Once your item has been picked up and delivered, you will settle the payment directly to the DASHer, either by cash or online bank transfer. 

7. Rate Your Experience 
Your honest feedback and rating will help us improve and serve you better.

title: Patriot Delivery
description:
As society has continued to evolve, so too has the way about which people eat. Until very recently when people thought of food delivery there were two options, pizza and Chinese, and it had to be called in over the phone. With Patriot Restaurant Delivery you can now order food from your favorite restaurant with a few swipes of your finger on our app or mobile website, a few clicks on your computer, or a quick call to our professionally trained call center. And NEW with Patriot Restaurant Delivery, you can even pickup your food yourself if your on your way home or browse dine-in coupons from your favorite restaurants if you are up for a night out!

Patriot Delivery serves the Tyler, TX area.

comments: App is great! I love the option to pay cash! Some of the delivery fee's are a little high. I would love to see a loyalty rewards program. Maybe something like, free delivery after so many orders, or save $_ after spending $_. Or maybe a point system to earn rewards. Just s suggestion but please keep up the great work!

When I got this app I was disappointed with the lack of options at first but ignored it. Then upon finding what we wanted to order we were unable to add the item to our cart or scroll in the item menu, i couldn't see all of the toppings or add the pizza to my order.

I have used this app several times now, more often than not food arrived before the estimated delivery time. Food is always hot, no missing items. Drivers are friendly, even on bad weather days. One time my order was late but that was because when our driver picked up the food it was cold and he asked them to remake it. Prices may be a little steep, and restaurant options are limited in my area, but the quality of the food and customer service is well worth it.

Loved ordering from them and when I worked for them it was a great environment and the money actually went to the drivers & and not a corporate giant. I highly recommend PRD if you want your money to be reinvested in your home town community, you want quick and professional delivery, and service that will go out of their way to make sure you have the best experience.
Horrible service

title: Freshly - Food Delivery
description:
Food delivery that's nutritious and convenient in a weekly subscription delivery service.  Freshly meals use only the freshest food and ingredients (never frozen), made by our team of chefs and nutritionists.  Each meal is ready to eat in only 3 minutes‚Äîthey‚Äôre fully cooked so all you have to do is heat ‚Äòem up.

NUTRITIOUS FOOD DELIVERY
Freshly cooks nutritious and delicious food, delivered to your door on a weekly plan.  From 4 meals up to 12 meals a week, Freshly is your app for tasty and nutritious food delivery.

DELIVERY FLEXIBILITY
Not at home for your food delivery?  Easily update your delivery day in the app to select any day of the week!  Change your meal plan food delivery to wherever you are, home, work, or school, you just need an address to start receiving incredible food delivery!

SAVING TIME
Take the stress out of meal prep, recipes, restaurants, reservations, take out, and cooking.  Freshly delivers food that satisfies.  No artificial sugars, healthy ingredients, gluten free, keto friendly, low carb, with plenty of options to delight everyone.

DESIGNED TO FIT YOUR LIFESTYLE
Our meals are crafted by our team of nutritionists and chefs to be nutritious and delicious.  With Freshly meals, you get to say no to artificial ingredients, preservatives, gluten, and refined sugars.  Our food can meet your needs for various diets including gluten free, keto friendly, low carb, high protein, and other lifestyles.

CUSTOMER SERVICE
Our customer service team is available 24/7 around the clock to help you pick out meals, learn details about your food delivery, assist with any delivery issue, or any other questions you have.  Chat directly from the app or place a phone call, we're always here to help.


Now you can manage everything related to your Freshly subscription right in the app and start receiving deliveries today!

‚Ä¢ Update your upcoming delivery, or skip a week in seconds.
‚Ä¢ Track your food delivery in one tap, so you know when to expect your delicious and tasty meals at your door.
‚Ä¢ Quickly change your delivery address in a dash!
‚Ä¢ Browse delicious meals, customize your order, and see what‚Äôs new.
‚Ä¢ Dig into everything you need to know about a meal‚Äîingredients, nutrition, and what makes your food tasty.
‚Ä¢ Set your dietary preferences.
‚Ä¢ Quickly contact our customer care team via live chat, email, or phone.
 
About Freshly:
 
We started Freshly because we believe eating fresh, nutritious food every day should be easy for everyone. So we do all the hard work for you‚Äîsourcing high-quality ingredients, making sure each meal you eat is nutrient dense and packed with the good stuff, and expertly cooking your food to order so it tastes fresh and delicious.
 
No shopping, chopping, cleanup, recipes, meal prep, or worrying about what‚Äôs for dinner. And with Freshly meals, you get to say no to artificial ingredients, preservatives, gluten, and refined sugars.

With Freshly meals, you get to say no to artificial ingredients, preservatives, gluten, and refined sugars. Our food can meet your needs for various diets including gluten free, keto friendly, low carb, high protein, and other lifestyles.

CUSTOMER SERVICE
Our customer service team is available 24/7 around the clock to help you pick out meals, learn details about your food delivery, assist with any delivery issue, or any other questions you have. Chat directly from the app or place a phone call, we're always here to help.


Now you can manage everything related to your Freshly subscription right in the app and start receiving deliveries today!

‚Ä¢ Update your upcoming delivery, or skip a week in seconds.
‚Ä¢ Track your food delivery in one tap, so you know when to expect your delicious and tasty meals at your door.
‚Ä¢ Quickly change your delivery address in a dash!
‚Ä¢ Browse delicious meals, customize your order, and see what‚Äôs new.
‚Ä¢ Dig into everything you need to know about a meal‚Äîingredients, nutrition, and what makes your food tasty.
‚Ä¢ Set your dietary preferences.
‚Ä¢ Quickly contact our customer care team via live chat, email, or phone.

About Freshly:

We started Freshly because we believe eating fresh, nutritious food every day should be easy for everyone. So we do all the hard work for you‚Äîsourcing high-quality ingredients, making sure each meal you eat is nutrient dense and packed with the good stuff, and expertly cooking your food to order so it tastes fresh and delicious.

No shopping, chopping, cleanup, recipes, meal prep, or worrying about what‚Äôs for dinner. And with Freshly meals, you get to say no to artificial ingredients, preservatives, gluten, and refined sugars.
summary: Freshly is a subscription food delivery service, offering ready to eat meals.
recentChanges: Bug fixes, performance improvements üõ†
comments: Love Love Love this! My husband and I hate to cook and this is an amazing option for dinners. It's ready in about 5 minutes and tastes like it was just freshly made and not microwaved. Everything is delicious and healthy. It's easy to tell that its fresh ingredients when you taste it. Plenty of options although I wish they would do more fish cuz the few times they have its Absolutely delicious! App is easy too! This has changed our lives and opened up so much time in the evening! Many thanks!

The app works fine, but the food has definitely declined in quality and value since I signed up a little less than a year ago. And unless you like chicken, chicken, or chicken, I'd suggest passing entirely. UPDATE 3/10: freshly responds one way here, but today I receive an order consisting of meals I didn't order and can't eat. Just called them and their responses to credit me 11 bucks... Nothing they can do to get any food 2 me before my next order. Guess you shouldn't complain publicly?

This is amazing. Medical issues were the reason I started this, but taste, ease if use- the skip feature! - even changing the plan as needed... all these make Freshly great if you don't prepare meals. I don't and now I get fresh prepared meals I genuinely like. Worth it. I'm on the 12 meal plan. I've skipped a week with no issues. It comes the day I scheduled every week, no hassle. This is a blessing for my health, my nutritional need, to take to work! I'm picky and these taste GREAT!!

Couldn't be easier! Order, deliver, heat and enjoy. I've tried several of the meals in the low calorie section and I've enjoyed every one. Really delicious food. And it saves me money. Shopping and cooking for one is challenging and I found myself throwing out so much food. Now I'm not wasting a thing!

I really like freshly. I have a tendency to get busy and then eat out instead of making dinner. Having the healthy and delicious options delivered every week and the fact that you just need to microwave them has changed my eating habits for the better. I also like that the menu changes and they email you new options, it keeps me from getting bored. My only critique is that they are a bit pricey compared to store bought meals, or cooking. But they are less than fast food, and way better for me.

title: Lugg - Moving & Delivery
description:
Lugg connects you with professional vetted movers and a truck, anytime you need it. It's the perfect alternative to traditional movers, renting a truck and doing it yourself- our app connects you with vetted, independent strong luggers to help with moving, hauling and junk removal. 

Lugg is a fast, easy, and affordable way to get help with your apartment move, to pick up that new sofa purchased on Craigslist LetGo Offerup, or new stuff delivered from stores like West Elm, Pottery Barn, Crate & Barrel, World Market, Wayfair, HomeGoods, Best Buy, Target and IKEA. 

Use Lugg to get local moving and delivery help in the following cities: San Francisco, Silicon Valley, Los Angeles, Seattle, San Diego. More coming soon!

Why Lugg:
‚Ä¢ Easy - Save yourself the time and headache. Schedule a Lugg in minutes.
‚Ä¢ Stress free - Rest easy, unlike Dolly, Task Rabbit & Thumbtack, every job is accepted and completed for a 5 star experience.
‚Ä¢ Affordable - Get a guaranteed price upfront before you book‚Äîno surprises!
‚Ä¢ Convenient - On-demand, on your schedule. Choose as soon as 30 minutes from when you book. Book for today, or next month - it‚Äôs up to you!¬†
‚Ä¢ Safe - All Lugg Luggers are independent contractors who are background checked, reviewed, and backed by a commercial insurance policy.

Use Lugg to find help with the following moving services & more:¬†
‚Ä¢ Small Apartment Moves. For the DIY mover that needs help moving large items like beds, dressers, tables, couches, and more.¬†
‚Ä¢ Retail Store Delivery. More convenient, faster, and often cheaper than traditional home delivery options.
‚Ä¢ Craigslist, OfferUp, letgo, Pick-ups. Don‚Äôt let public transit or a small car keep you from that sweet Craigslist deal.¬†
‚Ä¢ Small Business Moves. Office move? Find help to get settled in quick.
‚Ä¢ Junk Removal. Book a Lugg to remove and haul away your junk. Includes trash removal and responsible disposal.
‚Ä¢ Donation Drop-off. Pile of stuff collecting dust? Luggers can also do donation runs.¬†
‚Ä¢ Move your stuff into your Public storage, U-Haul, Extra Space Storage unit with Lugg. It‚Äôs easier than renting a truck and doing all the heavy lifting yourself!

Don‚Äôt need a truck, just some extra muscle? Luggers can also assist with many of your house projects that require an additional set of hands. Don‚Äôt bother your family, friends, or neighbors‚Äîbook a Lugg to help.
‚Ä¢ Furniture relocation and removal
‚Ä¢ Loading and unloading a box truck
‚Ä¢ Appliance moves
‚Ä¢ Anything that two people could reasonably move

How it Works
1. Enter Your Details - Tell us when, where, and what you need help with.
2. Get Your Price - Get an instant, guaranteed price.
3. Schedule Your Lugg - Rest easy, one more thing checked of your list!
4. Track and communicate with your Luggers in real-time

Renting a U-Haul, Penske, Budget or enterprise truck is a thing of the past. Luggers are ready to help you with your apartment move, IKEA delivery, furniture delivery, furniture donation, dump run, junk removal, storage unit move, mattress removal, office move, and everything in between.

Say hello to your personal movers ready to load, haul and delivery anything for you. 

We'd love to hear from you.
Email: hello@lugg.com
Twitter: @lugg

recentChanges:
- You can now share your upcoming and in-progress Luggs. Share them using the Share icon on the top right of your requested Lugg.
- Tip options are now calculated based on a percentage of your Lugg's total.
- Bug fixes.

If you have any other fantastic ideas or find a bug in this update please reach out to feedback@lugg.com.

Happy moving from the team at Lugg <3
comments: Love love love this app and I use them all the time to haul stuff here and there for me. Great for anytime you need something moved last-minute, on the spur of the moment, etc.
Great experience overall. Super easy to use. It was a little pricier than I expected. It was a fair price, but I wish there been clearer and more up front about costs.
I've used this app to move twice now. The movers have been great and efficient. This is way cheaper than hiring movers to just move a bedroom full of stuff. It's saved me money and hassle!
Useless app. Tried booking a move, took forever. Driver didn't show up, support was non existent

The movers are awesome but they are not upfront about the price they quote you for on thing and then are waaay off about the actual price. And they have alot of hidden fees they like the add, which leaves u better off just using a regular moving company.

title: Careem NOW: Order food & more
description:
We deliver food‚Ä¶ and much more!

Careem NOW is your new delivery app, powered by Careem. Download it for free and get your order straight to your door.

Food
Hosting movie night and need pizza to share? Busy day at work and need lunch to come to you? Or is it just a no-cook day? Browse & discover nearby restaurants, order your favorites - and that‚Äôs it! We‚Äôre on our way with your meal.


Order anything on demand with Shop & Courier - in select cities*

Shop
Need eggs and milk twice a week? Crave late-night snacks every weekend? Pounding headache, and you need a Panadol? We‚Äôll buy and deliver it for you, right away. 

Courier
Need that document dropped off at the visa office, or want to send your shoes for repair? Forgot your charger at your friend‚Äôs place? We‚Äôll pick it up and drop it off.


Tell us anything you want to buy, get or send, and we‚Äôll be on it right away.

* Currently in Dubai & Amman - and more to come soon! 
But do you know what really make us awesome in all cities?

YOUR WISH IS OUR COMMAND
Browse restaurants near you. Tell us what you need, tap to order, we‚Äôll bring it to you right away.

IT‚ÄôS SUPER EASY
Search for the food you love and enjoy easy check-out by cash, card or Careem PAY.

TRACK YOUR ORDER
Watch your order make its way to you.

WANT THE USUAL?
For restaurant deliveries, re-order your favourite meals in one tap & we‚Äôll bring it over (again) with love.

comments: Very bad app can't retrieve my password. I call ü§ô customer service many times and no is not on service in Saudi. I recieve the authentication no then enter the right password and didn't logged in. Then I request for new password the app asked me for my full name I entered my name then got message wrong name. It is suck application as I am logging in into a bank account. Give me phone no for easy correspondence.

Most of the time it's perfect but sometimes the ordder is getting canceld after 5 minutes which i personlly understand but its annoying like imagine the user ordering food from the app then he/she didnt pay attention to the notification that will cause waste of time for the user may be you can put an alarm or something if the order get cancelled like a feature
It's very easy to use and as soon as you enable the location they come at the exact location. Not like other apps. and the food comes hot. Definitely would recommend
It keeps hanging and crashing, plus it suddenly just out of nowhere logs you out automatically and then when you try to sign in, it hangs on the sign in page and wouldn't let you proceed.
Careem seems to be working fine and all, but the problem is it does not support Many Areas. I live in North Karachi and Careem Services are not in this are *According to the app*. Plz fix this

title: Shipt Shopper: Shop for Pay
description:
GET PAID TO SHOP AND DELIVER GROCERIES

Shipt is on the lookout for friendly, reliable shoppers to earn money helping Shipt members get the things they need from stores they trust. Apply at shipt.com/shopper to become a shopper and earn up to $22/hour (or more!), set your own schedule, shop and deliver from local stores, and join a thriving community of Shipt Shoppers. If you‚Äôre looking for a flexible gig job and want to earn on your own schedule, then apply today.

EARN UP TO $22 PER HOUR AND GET PAID FAST

Apply to be a Shipt Shopper to start earning on your own schedule. Each delivery takes about an hour and can pay as much as $22 or more including tips. You‚Äôll receive a direct deposit every Friday for the deliveries you completed and any in-app tips you‚Äôve earned that week ‚Äì we make sure you always receive 100% of your tips!

CREATE A SCHEDULE THAT WORKS FOR YOU

Your schedule is based on when you want to shop and deliver, so you can choose to work and earn as little ‚Äì or as much ‚Äì as you like. So whether you‚Äôre looking to shop part time or shop full time, you can set your perfect schedule. 

APPLY, SHOP, AND EARN MORE MONEY

With no cap on how many orders you can shop, earn what‚Äôs right for you! You can even increase the number of orders you‚Äôre offered ‚Äì simply shop and deliver during your preferred times, and strive to deliver 5 star service!

JOIN A COMMUNITY OF SHOPPERS AND CUSTOMERS

More than just a gig economy job, you‚Äôll join a community of shoppers. Share inside tips and stories with other shoppers, and take pride in providing a valuable service to the people in your community that need it most.

JOIN THE TEAM

We‚Äôre always on the lookout for hiring shoppers that can help us deliver happiness.
Visit shipt.com/shopper/ to learn more and apply!

recentChanges:
Now THIS is an app update...
- App rebuilt on a new foundation to be faster and more seamless
- More consistent look and feel across the app
- New scanner
- Interactive map
comments: Update has been a mixed bag. Though the scanner is noticeably faster with the update, the scanner placement has to be just right the first time or else I have to re-scan. Also, the "almost done" text notification pops up but does not connect to my messaging app. I have also experienced app freezing, particularly during order processing. In fact, overall order processing time in the app could be improved. On a positive note, I am no longer having to re-take receipt pictures with the update.

Since the most recent update, I cannot even open the app. I've uninstalled and reinstalled several times to no avail. I continue to get prompts for promo orders though. However, as the pay rate has continued to diminish, it may just be time for me and Shipt to part ways. Not worth the two hours of driving, shopping, and delivering for $11.

Needs improvement. Needs to be easier to substitute items or force add something when the barcode wont scan. Needs to show the price for items as this can help you find the right thing. Needs isle numbers for some stores as the categories system can out two things in the same categories even if they are on different sides of the store. No pay for mileage so you can only accept the limited number of orders nearby. The worst part is support takes 15-30min to get and help. Even on an active order.

They just launched a new version of the application, and with everything digital you have to wonder what they were thinking? Who did they ask for information? Big change, let's give it more color and make it harder on humans eyes. I can't wait to lose more of my eyesight! Why do I have to see my profile picture? The font is smaller! When you created this did you use it as a practical application, or did you think , we want it to look cool! Getting an alert at 50 mph with 60 seconds to claim!

So far the new app updates are working great for me. EXCEPT the issue that I cannot access my delivery history prior to December 2019. Hoping my communications with HQ will get this resolved quickly as it is a necessary tool I use to reconcile for tax prep. I am not the only Shopper with this issue.

title: Vons Delivery & Pick Up
description:
Download the Vons Delivery & Pick Up App and get FREE Delivery on your 1st online order at Vons. Sign in with your existing Vons account or create a new account. Shop for groceries in the app and save time by choosing delivery or pick up.
 
Vons Delivery & Pick Up App is convenient, easy and will save you time with these features:
- Delivery - Choose a time when you want your groceries delivered to your doorstep
- Drive Up & Go (Pick Up) - Drive up to your Vons store, park, call and we'll bring your groceries to you
- Flexible delivery and pick up times ‚Äì groceries on your schedule
- Shop fast from your previous in-store and online purchases
- Make special requests to your Personal Shopper (e.g. pick green bananas)
- Save money with hundreds of clippable coupons
- Exclusive online savings ‚Äì easily find new weekly deals that matter most to you

recentChanges: Bug fixes and minor improvements
comments: Pages frequently won't load! Frequently adding items to cart requires multiple tries! Frequently the app does not save items that you add to your cart! So, if you need to stop shopping for any reason when you come back most of the items that you added to your cart aren't there anymore! Very frustrating! But, once the order is placed the service is excellent.

This has been the best app so far, especially in this Pandemic..the company has been up to date informative daily. I use delivery I actually got help via the BOT that gave me what I needed..not Amazon(on hold 45 min & bot hung up)and just try to update my payment with new card..that took, seriously 3 DAYS and its still not done! Im looking for a new cellphone service asap. Dont use SHIPT OR those services they charge too much Stay aware stay safe STAY HOME..DONT HOARD please

App errors out during registration. I get to the page with the TOS checkbox & a drop down asking how you heard about the app. However, when select continue, it errors out stating i have to enter a valid vons club card number. There is no where to enter the number on that page or any of the prevoius pages, so i cannot use the app.

App registration failures! Very very poor customer service to fix it. I had the same error with entering my phone number as with the other 1 star reviews. There are data entry conflicts that migrate across the desktop page & several apps with no way to confirm or fix these issues - rerouting to customer support.
Great so nice to have everything delivered. Easy to use. Saves me time and is nice to have groceries set on my table. It was so hard to carry them into my house at my age 81.

title: Pickkup - Pickup & Delivery
description:
Order on PICKKUP and get all your orders delivered in 60 minutes.

Hey busy bee!! We are your task masters.

We know that you running with time in your busy lifestyle. You somehow make sure that you finish all your activities. In the process, you feel that you wish you had more time to spend with your loved ones.
No more thinking !! It is time to take action with one click !!

Use PICKKUP and order anything you want to get done from anywhere in the city and at anytime of your convenience. We will deliver groceries, meat, stationery, medicines, food, toys, etc. from any store you wish. You can also order any pick up and drop service or a personal assistant service on the app to complete all your tasks without the hassles of time or running around the city.

We love long-distance relationships. We will also complete your long distance orders which may be time consuming for you. Our delivery executives will make sure that you can relax while you out-source the activity to us.
You need something done by the time you reach home? You need any activity to start at a particular time? You can use our scheduled activity option to pick the right time to complete it.

We are committed to completing your activities ASAP. Our delivery activities are spread across the city in every nook and corner. They take your timing very seriously and complete your activities at lightning fast speed at any time you desire.

With live order tracking, you will be able to check the status of the order and give guiding instructions to the delivery executive before the activity is completed.

Pay anytime you want ‚Äì before the order is delivered or after. You can chose any mode of payment as per your convenience. It may be VISA/Master Card Credit or Debit Cards, Net Banking, Phone Pay, PayTM or you can pay through cash at the time of delivery.

Why wait for time to complete your activities? You can rely on us while you relax. Get sorted and leave your running around to us. Install the app and get PickkupNow. We are currently available in Hyderabad. We will come soon to your city to help you.

recentChanges: Fixed Bugs
comments: One of the best delivery apps. Clean and user friendly screens and navigation.
Wow what a delivery app. Awesome experience. Quick and fast delivery. Better than expected.

Literally the best app for delivering anything in Hyderabad. Literally the best, other apps do not deliver to some location but this app delivers to many locations in Hyderabad and the personal assistant option is very good. Deliveries may be a bit late as they deliver to even faraway locations but it's not a big deal considering their work

This app is good and the UI is clean and efficient .In my phone at some places the some layout items are not correctly aligned , for example in the order page "Any instructions ?" text is hidden under "coupon code " link . Except for that this app is great . Good luck developer .

When i first came across this app i thought it was too good to be true because it didn't have one bad review. I thought the app is rigged and i was scared to order. But then i got exactly what i wanted and with reasonable fee charged. I really like this app. One thing I'd like to change is the tracking system. It would be helpful to have an live tracking system and the updates shown on the app are slow. I got my delivery but the app showed that the agent was still on his way. Loved it
